jp:
このorangeは素直で悪そうな音がいいね。ドライブ感が好き。

試しに弾かせてもらってる。
ライブでも使うからお楽しみに。

sunnのコンボはどこに落ちてるのかな。はじめてあれと出逢った時ほんとに1音音出した瞬間に好きになったんだけど。。
guyatoneも好き。
落ちてたら情報頼む…。
en:
This orange has a nice, straightforward yet mischievous sound. I love the driving feel of it.

I’m getting a chance to play around with it. We’ll be using it in our live shows, so look forward to it!

I wonder where the sunn combo is hiding. The first time I encountered it, I fell in love the moment I heard that one note... I also like guyatone. If you find it, please let me know...

jp:
昨日ワールドツアーから一旦帰国したわけですがすぐした事はシルバーアクセのメンテ。

やっぱり海外に行くと酸化が激しい気がするけど気がするだけか。

ピカピカになったので明日のお給仕もやったります。
よろしくお願いしますね。

#bandmaid #saiki #cromehearts
en:
I returned home from the world tour yesterday, and the first thing I did was maintenance on my silver accessories.

I feel like they oxidize a lot more when I travel abroad, but maybe that's just my imagination.

They’re all shiny now, so I’ll be ready for tomorrow’s okyuji too. Looking forward to it!

#bandmaid #saiki #cromehearts

jp:

してくれるっぽよね？🕊
期待させてっぽ？
全力でお給仕するっぽー🕊🕊
en:
Our one-man okyuji overseas had the most amazing view!  
Today we're at Shimokitazawa Garden.  
Of course, you’ll join us for a wonderful okyuji, right? 🕊  
Are you excited?  
We’ll give it our all for the okyuji! 🕊🕊

jp:
本日は、ドラムテックとして日頃お世話になっているUNCHAINの吉田さんのお誕生日🎂🎉 おめでとうございます✨

お洒落ぶりたい優雅な気分の時&学生時代の登校BGMは必ずUNCHAINでした！笑

そんな大好きで聴きまくっていたUNCHAINの吉田さんと、こうして現在音楽で関わる事が出来て本当に嬉しいです！これからも宜しくお願いします♪
en:
Today is the birthday of Yoshida-san from UNCHAIN, who has been taking care of us as our drum tech! 🎂🎉 Happy Birthday! ✨

Whenever I wanted to feel stylish and elegant, UNCHAIN was always my go-to background music during my school days! 😂

I'm truly happy to be able to work with Yoshida-san, someone I loved and listened to so much from UNCHAIN, in the music scene now! Looking forward to continuing this journey together! ♪

jp: Good Night🌙

かなみとSANTANA来日公演@武道館！

4年前の来日公演もかなみと2人で観に行ったんだなぁ〜。その頃はまだBAND-MAID結成される前だったなぁ～。感慨深すぎ！！ こうして今年もかなみと一緒にSANTANA観に来れて良かった！幸せ！ありがとう❤️ シンディのドラムソロからのSmoothは最強に痺れたぁあぁあぁ😂✨ 音楽の素晴らしさを再確認出来た最高の1日でした！！！ #santana
en:
Kanami and I are at the SANTANA concert in Budokan! 

It's hard to believe it’s been 4 years since we went to the last concert together—back when BAND-MAID hadn’t even formed yet! So many feelings!! I’m so glad I could come to see SANTANA with Kanami again this year! I’m so happy! Thank you ❤️ Cindy's drum solo leading into Smooth was absolutely mind-blowing! 😂✨ It was the best day to reaffirm the greatness of music!!! #santana

photo by 
@tamaishingo22
en:
Kubi: "Crack!" 

Yesterday was the first day of our one-man tour at Kinema Club. I didn't know that May 10th is Maid Day until this live was decided! 

Photo by @tamaishingo22

jp:
ライブの写真って、たまにすごいとてつもなく顎が割れてたり、白目むいてたり、ものすんごい顔のときある。そういう写真を集めたい。。今回は手元にあんまりなかったので次回に期待。
手元に届いてないだけで、実はたくさんあるのかもしれないけど。
photo by @tamaishingo22
en:
Sometimes in live photos, I look really crazy with my jaw all weird or my eyes rolled back. I want to collect those kinds of pictures... I didn't have many this time, so I'm looking forward to next time. There might actually be a ton out there that just haven't reached me yet!  
photo by @tamaishingo22

jp:
展示会の後は、ピアニストのゆかちゃんとTRIPLE AXE TOUR'17へ刺激もらいに行ってきました！

バッチバチに刺激受けた💥！！！ 愛しのちかこにも会えた✌️💓 COASTへ行く度に、私もこのステージで演奏したいって思う！！絶対COASTでお給仕するぞ！！！！
en:
After the exhibition, I went to get some inspiration at the TRIPLE AXE TOUR '17 with pianist Yuka-chan! 

I was totally fired up 💥!!! I also got to see my beloved Chikako ✌️💓 Every time I go to COAST, I think to myself that I want to perform on that stage too!! I’m definitely going to do okyuji at COAST!!!!

時々ロングをやめたくなるけどヘアビューザーやらヘアビューロン使うとやっぱロング☺️ってなる😂💕💞💕 #saiki #bandmaid
en:
Since my hair is long, I can't live without my Hair Beater 😕 It's great for my face too 💕💕💕  
Even though my long hair doesn't show much of my waves, I can't part with my Hair Buran either ☹️ It makes my hair so shiny 💞  

Sometimes I feel like giving up on long hair, but when I use my Hair Beater and Hair Buran, I just think, "Long hair it is!" 😂💕💞💕 #saiki #bandmaid

jp:
個人練～！スタジオで借りたツインペダルがDEMONだった！

専門学生時代にDEMON使ってる男子が、DEMON使ってるってだけの理由で「デーモン」というあだ名を付けられてたの思い出した。懐かしい。

デーモン、元気にしてるかなぁ。
en:
Personal practice~! The twin pedal I borrowed from the studio was a DEMON! 

I remembered a guy from my vocational school days who used a DEMON and got nicknamed "Demon" just for that reason. Such nostalgia. 

I wonder how Demon is doing these days.

jp:
#GPRepost,#reposter,#notetag @reina_nagata via @RepostApp ======> @reina_nagata:LACHIC CENTURY SESSION
今日のゲストは BAND-MAIDから、
小鳩ミクさん、KANAMIさんでした！
.
初登場のBAND-MAID。
先日初めてライブ、いやお給仕を観させていただいてから
あまりのかっこよさにすっかりファンになり
今日お会いできるのを楽しみにしておりました！
これまでにない独特の世界観を
en:
#GPRepost, #reposter, #notetag @reina_nagata via @RepostApp ======> @reina_nagata: LACHIC CENTURY SESSION  
Today's guests were Miku Kobato and Kanami from BAND-MAID!  
It was my first time seeing BAND-MAID. After experiencing their live performance, or rather, their okyuji, for the first time the other day, I was blown away by how cool they are and became a total fan! I was really looking forward to meeting them today! They have a unique world view like nothing I've seen before.

jp:
新しい機材を購入しに銀座へ！

そして機材購入後は、西尾維新大辞展へ行ってまいりました！なんて素晴らしいんだ…！ 入った瞬間から壁一面に西尾維新のキャラ達がお出迎えしてくれてニヤニヤが止まりませんでした。忍ちゃん愛しすぎる…

#西尾維新大辞展 #化物語 #物語シリーズ #忍野忍
en:
We headed to Ginza to purchase new equipment! 

After buying the gear, we went to the Nishio Ishin Grand Exhibition! It was absolutely amazing…! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted by characters from Nishio Ishin covering an entire wall, and I couldn't stop grinning. I love Shinobu-chan so much…!

#NishioIshinGrandExhibition #Bakemonogatari #MonogatariSeries #ShinobuOshino

jp:
RISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2017 in EZO

高校生の頃からずっと行きたかったRSR。まさか自分がステージに立てる日が来るとは。さらにこんな最高の景色を見せてもらえるとは。感無量です。本当に幸せな時間でした。

さいちゃんの復活お給仕がRSRだなんて最高だね！さいちゃんおかえりなさい♪

BLUE ENCOUNTの先輩方、フジファブリックのダイスケさん、BOBOさん、ROTH BART BARONのエミリオさん

いつも優しく接してくださる尊敬する大先輩方々に
en:
RISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2017 in EZO

I've wanted to go to RSR since high school. I never imagined the day would come when I could stand on that stage. And to be able to see such an amazing view is just overwhelming. I’m truly grateful. It was such a happy time.

It's the best that Sai-chan's comeback okyuji is at RSR! Welcome back, Sai-chan♪ 

To the seniors from BLUE ENCOUNT, Daisuke from Fujifabric, and Emilio from ROTH BART BARON,

Thank you always for your kindness and for being such respected seniors.

San Franciscoの肉とポテト

お腹の調子が悪かったけど、
アメリカで生活してたら胃腸が元気になった。
去年シアトルに行った時も初日は風邪ひいてたけど、何日かアメリカの食べ物食べてたら日本にいる時より元気になりました
en:
Meat and potatoes in San Francisco 🍖🥔

I wasn't feeling well at first, but living in America has really perked up my stomach! Last year when I went to Seattle, I was sick on the first day too, but after a few days of eating American food, I felt better than when I was in Japan!

It turned out really great, so look forward to it! 👍 

The outfit is from the September Me brand by the amazing Aira Kishinami, called "LISTLESS." It's super easy to play drums in, and I've been wearing it a lot!

jp:
昨日の熊本のお給仕前の出来事💞

楽屋から出たら、MISAが拳に白いものを付けて不自然な動きをしていたの。スタッフさん達が「お弁当のタルタルソースをこぼしてしまった。」と言っていたので、夕ご飯はタルタルソースのお弁当か〜楽しみだな〜(*´꒳`*)と思いつつ別室へ…

その後、楽屋へ戻ったらメンバーから思いがけないサプライズ！！✨ あとで教えて貰ったら、さいちゃんがケーキを用意してくれてた時に、MISAが気付かず振り向いた際に拳がケーキに入ったそうです(*´꒳`*)笑笑

面白かったな〜〜(*
en:
Yesterday's events before the okyuji in Kumamoto 💞

When I stepped out of the dressing room, MISA was making strange movements with something white on her fist. The staff said, "She spilled the tartar sauce from the bento." So I thought, "Dinner is going to be a bento with tartar sauce—I'm looking forward to it!" (*´꒳`*) and headed to another room...

Later, when I returned to the dressing room, the members surprised me unexpectedly!! ✨ I found out later that when Sai-chan was preparing a cake, MISA turned around without noticing and her fist ended up in the cake! (*´꒳`*) LOL

It was so funny~~ (*

jp:
‪何をやっても全く長続きしなかった私が、唯一ずっと夢中になれて大好きでい続けられてるのがドラム。‬

‪ドラムに出逢えて本当に良かった！‬
‪私の人生を変えてくれて心から感謝。‬

‪いつもありがとう、エミリー💓‬

‪#10月10日‬ ‪#ドラムの日‬ #drumday #drums ‪#zildjian‬ #bandmaid
en:
No matter what I did, I could never stick with anything for long, but the one thing I've always been passionate about and love is the drums. 

I'm so glad I found the drums! It truly changed my life, and I'm sincerely grateful for that.

Thank you always, Emily 💓

#October10 #DrumDay #drumday #drums #zildjian #bandmaid

jp:
Repost from @uzmkduttch @TopRankRepost #TopRankRepost 祝！『ドラムの日』
本日10月10日は、『ドラムの日』として
日本記念日協会に正式登録されました。
それを記念して、総勢159人のドラマーの
『ドラム最高』の叫び動画をアップします。
No.1〜No.20まであり少し長いですが（笑）
是非最後まで観て、
ドラムの日を盛り上げて行きましょう！

感謝。
en:
Repost from @uzmkduttch @TopRankRepost #TopRankRepost Celebrating! "Drum Day"  
Today, October 10th, has been officially registered as "Drum Day" by the Japan Anniversary Association.  
To commemorate this, we’re uploading a video of 159 drummers shouting "Drums are the best!"  
There are No. 1 to No. 20, so it’s a bit long (lol), but please watch until the end,  
and let’s get everyone excited for Drum Day!  

Thank you!

jp:
UZMK DUTTCHさんにお誘いいただき、私も「ドラム最高〜！」と叫ばせていただいております♪

こんな素敵な企画に参加させていただけて光栄です！DUTTCHさんありがとうございます😊✨
.
ドラム最高ーーー！！！！ #10月10日 #ドラムの日
en:
I was invited by UZMK DUTTCH, and I'm also shouting "Drums are the best~!" ♪

I'm honored to be part of such a wonderful project! Thank you, DUTTCH! 😊✨
.
Drums are the bestーーー!!!! #October10 #DrumDay

なんと茜とさいちゃんからは肩凝りな小鳩の為に枕をプレゼントしてもらったっぽ！🕊

2017.10.21  
It's my happy birthday! 🕊❤️  
The image is from when I was celebrated by the members and staff in Nagoya last time.  
Akane and Sai-chan even gifted Kobato a pillow for her shoulder pain! 🕊  
I was really happy!

#KikukaPrize #KobatoHorseRacing

先日のZepp DiverCityでの会場リハーサル後に、メンバー＆BAND-MAIDチームの皆様がサプライズでお祝いしてくれました🎉

とっても幸せ！！！！愛しかない！！！

最高にハッピーな気持ちのまま本場を迎える事が出来て幸せな1日でした💓
en:
After the venue rehearsal at Zepp DiverCity the other day, the members and the BAND-MAID team surprised me with a celebration 🎉

I’m so happy!!!! There’s nothing but love!!!

It was a wonderful day, and I was able to welcome the main event with the happiest feelings 💓

jp:
本日、誕生日を迎えました🎂

Zepp DiverCityの会場リハ後のサプライズバースデー動画📽

ケーキ、スクリーン映像、レーザーメッセージ、なんて豪華で贅沢なサプライズなんだ…！！

ビックリしすぎて「え〜！」「もぉ〜！」「やば〜い！」連発。笑

メンバー、BAND-MAIDチームの皆様、スタッフの皆様がこっそり準備して色々考えてくれてたんだなって思ったら感謝の気持ちが溢れて止まらない！私は本当に周りに恵まれすぎています。とんでもなく幸せ者です。

BAND-MAIDのドラム
en:
Today, I celebrated my birthday! 🎂

Here’s a surprise birthday video after the rehearsal at Zepp DiverCity 📽

The cake, the screen visuals, the laser messages—what an extravagant and luxurious surprise…!!

I was so shocked that I kept saying, “No way!” “Oh my gosh!” “This is insane!” Haha.

When I think about how the members, the BAND-MAID team, and the staff secretly prepared all of this and put so much thought into it, I can’t help but feel overwhelmed with gratitude! I’m truly blessed to be surrounded by such amazing people. I’m incredibly lucky. 

From the drummer of BAND-MAID.

あけましておめでとうございます🎍

2017年は、1stフルアルバム「Just Bring It」と3rdシングル「Daydreaming/Choose me」をリリース、全国ツアー&ワールドツアーを周り、ツアーと並行して2/14リリースの2ndフルアルバム「WORLD DOMINATION」の制作＋レコーディング、念願だったフェスに沢山出演できた事、ワンマンお給仕で赤坂BLITZ、恵比寿LIQUIDROOM、新木場STUDIO COAST、Zepp DiverCity TOKYOと大きなステージに
en:
Happy New Year! 🎍

In 2017, we released our 1st full album "Just Bring It" and our 3rd single "Daydreaming/Choose me." We toured across the country and around the world, and alongside that, we worked on the production and recording of our 2nd full album "WORLD DOMINATION," which is set to be released on February 14th. We were able to perform at many festivals, which was a long-held dream of ours, and we took the stage for our solo okyuji at big venues like Akasaka BLITZ, Ebisu LIQUIDROOM, Shin-Kiba STUDIO COAST, and Zepp DiverCity TOKYO.

一音一音大切にもっと大切に弾こうって思いながらリハーサルしてました。
ギターが弾けるのは当たり前の事じゃないし、BAND-MAIDが出来るのは奇跡みたいなことだから！
まだまだ未熟な私ですが、頑張りますー！！ #bandmaid

en: Today was filled with interviews and long rehearsals!! I felt a change in my feelings towards the guitar, and during rehearsal, I was thinking about how important it is to play each note with even more care. Being able to play the guitar isn't something to take for granted, and being part of BAND-MAID feels like a miracle! I'm still inexperienced, but I'll do my best!! #bandmaid #PRS #mesaboogie #orangecabinet

燃えました。
溜まってたもん放出されまくり！

改めて音出すの気持ちええがな思いました。

では遅くなりましたが、
今年2018年の、抱負は
さらにお酒が強くなりますように。
もっとカッコいいベーシストになります。
BAND-MAIDを
よろしくお願いしますねー。
en:
The first live show of 2018 was a two-man with vivid undress.

It was intense.
All the pent-up energy was released like crazy!

I realized once again how great it feels to make music.

Now, a bit late, but my resolutions for 2018 are:
To become even better at handling alcohol.
To become a cooler bassist.
Please continue to support BAND-MAID!

中途半端に焼肉店へ踏み込んだからか、

Maybe because we stepped into the yakiniku place halfway, I’m now suddenly craving yakiniku (but I’m still hesitant about going for solo yakiniku).

Such deep love!

山梨にいちご狩りしに行きまして、母を誘いました。一瞬うつってる女性。しゃがんで食べてるのが母だよ。この日はとても暖かくて日差しが眩しかったんだ。30〜40は食べたよ。気持ち悪くなったもんね。いちごで胸やけですよ。

#bandmaid #saiki #iphonex のポートレートで撮影
en:
I went strawberry picking in Yamanashi and invited my mom along. The woman in the picture for a moment is my mom, crouching down to eat. It was a really warm day and the sunlight was dazzling. I ate about 30 to 40 strawberries! I ended up feeling a bit sick from it. Strawberry heartburn, can you believe it? 

#bandmaid #saiki #ShotOnIPhoneX

jp:
超絶料理苦手な私ですが、さいき先生に教えてもらいながら一緒に作りました。(9割さいちゃん)

「とろける愛情ホワイトシチュー」「3種のキノコのバター醤油炒め」「スタミナ満点、味満点☆砂肝ニンニクの芽炒め」

砂肝の切り方、包丁の正しい持ち方と切り方を学んだ。

さいちゃんからシチュー、MISAからオムライスとパスタ、かなみから炒飯、ミクからは豆腐ハンバーグを教えてもらいました。料理上手で素晴らしすぎる。

みんなが私の為に一緒に作りながら教えてくれたので、今年こそは料理も頑張ります。(言い
en:
I'm really terrible at cooking, but I made some dishes together with Sai-chan while she taught me! (90% Sai-chan)

We made "Melt-in-your-mouth Love White Stew," "Butter Soy Sauce Stir-fried Three Kinds of Mushrooms," and "Stamina-packed, Flavor-packed☆ Garlic Sprout Stir-fried Chicken Gizzards."

I learned how to cut the chicken gizzards, as well as the correct way to hold and use a knife.

Sai-chan taught me the stew, MISA taught me omelet rice and pasta, Kanami taught me fried rice, and Miku taught me tofu hamburgers. They're all such amazing cooks!

Everyone helped me out while we cooked together, so this year, I’m really going to work hard on my cooking! (I promise)

jp:
【⭐︎ご報告⭐️】 この度、TAMA Drumsとエンドース契約を結ばせていただきました！！
.
私の新しいパートナーは、STAR Bubingaです🥁★
.
初めて叩いた時に、今のBAND-MAIDサウンドを支えてくれるのはこの子だ！と一発でビビっときました。
.
家に帰ってからもずっとSTAR Bubingaの音が忘れられず、何度も何度も叩かせてもらいに行きました。そこからもうSTAR Bubingaの虜です。
.
セットのカラーは、大好きな赤色にゴールドのラメを入れていただき、上品
en:
【⭐︎Announcement⭐️】 I’m excited to share that I’ve signed an endorsement deal with TAMA Drums!!  
.  
My new partner is the STAR Bubinga! 🥁★  
.  
The moment I first played it, I knew this was the one that would support the current BAND-MAID sound! It just clicked instantly.  
.  
Even after I got home, I couldn’t forget the sound of the STAR Bubinga, so I kept going back to play it over and over again. Since then, I’ve been completely captivated by it.  
.  
The color of the set is a beautiful red with gold glitter, and it’s so elegant!

jp:
‪東名阪ツアー…名古屋、大阪と来て、最後は4/13東京でお給仕します✨‬
‪有り難い事にもうすぐソールドアウトしそうです！‬
‪皆様のお声を反映したあんなことや、このお給仕のためだけに作った曲やSEをご用意しております。‬
‪ラストに向けてまた色々加えて行きたいと思ってます💓お見逃しなく！

写真はステージに置いてある、母がこのツアーをイメージして作ってくれたプリザーブドフラワー🌹とお気に入りのティーカップ☕️
‬
‪#bandmaid ‬#worlddomination
en:
The Tōmei-Han tour... After Nagoya and Osaka, we'll be serving you in Tokyo on 4/13✨  
Thanks to everyone, it looks like we're about to sell out soon!  
We've prepared some special things that reflect your voices, including songs and SE created just for this performance.  
As we approach the finale, we want to add even more surprises💓 Don't miss out!  

The photo features a preserved flower 🌹 made by my mother, inspired by this tour, and my favorite teacup ☕️  

#bandmaid #worlddomination

jp:
本日は中野サンプラザへ「バンドじゃないもん！」のライブに遊びに行きました！

歌って踊って演奏して…本当に最高でした。楽しすぎたー！！騒ぎすぎたー！

そして中野に来たら絶対に行くと決めていた牛こくラーメン「マルカツ」へ行く事が出来ました。

毎日食べたいぐらい好き。

#マルカツ #牛こくラーメン #エンドレスラーメン #無限食欲
en:
Today, I went to Nakano Sunplaza to enjoy a live performance by "BAND ja Nai Mon!" 

Singing, dancing, and playing… it was truly amazing! I had so much fun—maybe a little too much! 

And of course, I had to go to Marukatsu, the beef broth ramen place I promised myself I would visit whenever I came to Nakano. 

I love it so much, I could eat it every day! 

#Marukatsu #BeefBrothRamen #EndlessRamen #InfiniteAppetite

jp:
ラーメン女子博2018へ遊びに行きました🍜🍥🎀
.
ラーメン女子博プロデューサーの森本聡子さんにもお会いできてとても嬉しかったです💞
年間600杯以上のラーメンを食べるにも関わらずこの美貌…！！ラーメン女子として、尊敬してやまないラーメンプリンセス👸🍥
.
.
今回私が食べたラーメンは、
一杯目は、「KaneKitchen Noodles」の"潮の煮干しらぁめん〜ミニローストトマトを添えて〜"
これぞ女子が大好きなラーメン！笑 スープがキラッキラで美しい。磯の風味が口の中いっぱ
en:
I went to the Ramen Girls Festival 2018! 🍜🍥🎀  
I was so happy to meet Satoko Morimoto, the producer of the Ramen Girls Festival! 💞 Despite eating over 600 bowls of ramen a year, she still looks this gorgeous…!! As a ramen girl, I have the utmost respect for this ramen princess! 👸🍥  
.  
The ramen I had this time was,  
First bowl: "KaneKitchen Noodles" - "Shio Niboshi Ramen with Mini Roasted Tomatoes"  
This is the kind of ramen that girls absolutely love! 😂 The broth is sparkling and beautiful. The flavor of the sea fills my mouth...

先日渋谷にいた時に行ってみたかった道玄坂の珈琲屋さん行ってみました(*´꒳`*) スペシャルティコーヒーが楽しめるお店です✨
好みの味に合わせて産地や焙煎方法の豆を提案してくれる親切で綺麗な店員さん💓がいらっしゃいました(*´꒳`*)
ドリップも丁寧で美味しくて満足でした(｀･ω･´)ﾉ✨

写真載せて良いとのことだったので、ドリップ中を撮らせていただきました☆

#aboutlifecoffeebrewers 
#coffee
en:
The other day when I was in Shibuya, I finally got to visit that coffee shop on Dogenzaka that I've always wanted to try (*´꒳`*). It's a place where you can enjoy specialty coffee✨. 

There was a kind and beautiful staff member💓 who suggested beans based on my taste preferences, including the origin and roasting method (*´꒳`*). The drip coffee was made with such care, and it was delicious—I was really satisfied (｀･ω･´)ﾉ✨.

They said I could take photos, so I snapped one while they were brewing☆ 

#aboutlifecoffeebrewers 
#coffee

jp:
先週に引き続き今週もTS ONE「EXILE THE SECOND THE ON～音～」に彩ちゃんと出演させて頂きましたっぽ。
地元熊本にいた頃からお世話になっている私にとって東京のお兄ちゃんみたいな存在のNESMITHさん🕊ようやく一緒にお仕事ができて本当に嬉しかったし楽しかったっぽ〜。
視聴出来なかった方も再放送があるのでぜひ聞けなかった方はチェックしてみてくださいっぽ〜🕊
2枚目はこないだの大阪お給仕にご帰宅して下さった時の。
#ザオン #TSONE #EXILETHESECOND
en:
Continuing from last week, I appeared on TS ONE's "EXILE THE SECOND THE ON～音～" with Sai-chan again this week! 🕊 NESMITH-san, who has been like an older brother to me since my days in Kumamoto, finally got to work together, and I was really happy and had so much fun! 🕊 For those who couldn't watch, there will be a rebroadcast, so please check it out if you missed it! 🕊 The second photo is from when you came home during our recent okyuji in Osaka.  
#ザオン #TSONE #EXILETHESECOND

毛の生え変わり時期で大変だっぽ〜
#cat #mypet
en:
Our tiger boy.  
(I only called him "Tiger," but it seems his official name was Torao. However, just the other day, he got renamed to Torao [Tiger Boy].)  
Whenever I take a bath, he always comes to check on me.  
It's a tough time for him with his fur shedding.  
#cat #mypet 🐾

jp:
先日、LOVEBITESのはるぴーさんとドラム会してきたよ🥁💓
.
ずっと使ってみたかったkitanoのチタンビーターを借りて今使ってるペダルにつけて試させてもらったり、お互いのペダルを踏み比べてみたり、とても楽しくて濃い時間でした🌟
.
たくさん勉強させてもらったー！！
もっともっともーっと知識増やしていきたい！！！！
.
お互いの機材を持ち込んで、叩き比べしてひたすら音を研究する会を定期的にやりたい…！！
.
ドラムって本当に楽しいなぁ☺️♪
en:
The other day, I had a drumming session with Harupii from LOVEBITES! 🥁💓  
I borrowed the kitano titanium beater that I've always wanted to try and attached it to my current pedal to give it a go. We also compared each other's pedals, and it was such a fun and enriching time! 🌟  
I learned so much!! I want to keep expanding my knowledge even more!!!  
I really want to have regular sessions where we bring our gear and just compare sounds and study them together...!!  
Drumming is just so much fun! ☺️♪

jp:
前にコジコジカフェに行った時、似顔絵を描いたと投稿したら、ご主人様お嬢様から似顔絵が見たいとお声いただいたので載せますね(*´꒳`*)えへへ
絵はね！下手ですよ！(*´꒳`*)えっへん

さてさて。2018年7月25日にBAND-MAID 3rd Single「start over」をリリースしますが…なんと6/25(月)25:00～FM802「REDNIQS」にて音源世界最速OAします！！
ツイッターやインスタでもたくさんの感想お待ちしております(｀･ω･´)
ドキドキ〜〜💕 #bandma
en:
When I went to Kojikoji Cafe before, I posted about drawing a portrait, and since I received requests from our Masters and Princesses to see it, I'm sharing it now (*´꒳`*) Hehe.  
The drawing! It's not very good, you know! (*´꒳`*) Ehehe.  

Now then! On July 25, 2018, we will release BAND-MAID's 3rd single "start over," but... guess what? On June 25 (Monday) at 25:00, it will have the world’s fastest airplay on FM802 "REDNIQS"!  
We’re looking forward to seeing lots of your thoughts on Twitter and Instagram (｀･ω･´)  
So excited~~💕 #bandma

jp:
先日、メンバーとお世話になっている神田商会の松木さん&go!go!vanillasのドラムのジェットセイヤさんと一緒に、スピッツのドラムの崎山さんのお宅にお邪魔させていただきました！

すき焼きをご馳走になり、スタジオでセッションしたり、とてつもなく楽しかった…！！

なんと崎山さん、BAND-MAIDの曲を何曲もコピーしてくださっていて、aloneを叩いてくれました！しかも完コピ！

私もスピッツの曲は何曲もコピーしてきました。
憧れの崎山さんが私のドラムをコピーしてくれている。ドラマーと
en:
The other day, I had the pleasure of visiting Mr. Matsuki from Kanda Shokai and Jet Seiya, the drummer from go!go!vanillas, along with the members of BAND-MAID at Mr. Sakiyama's home, the drummer from Spitz!

We were treated to sukiyaki and had an incredibly fun session in the studio…!!

To my surprise, Mr. Sakiyama had actually covered several BAND-MAID songs and played "alone" for us! And he nailed it perfectly!

I've also covered several Spitz songs myself. The fact that the drummer I admire, Mr. Sakiyama, is covering my drumming is just amazing. Drummers and... 🎶

jp:
2018.06.22「Natsu Rock2018」Zepp@BIGBOX Singapore🇸🇬

Selamat Pagi💓

初のシンガポール、とても楽しかったです！！シンガポールのZeppのステージに立つ事が出来て嬉しかったです！

共演したDo As Infinityさんと📸

Do As Infinityさんの「本日ハ晴天ナリ」は学生時代にコピーして学園祭で披露した思い出の曲なので、生で聴けて嬉しすぎました！最高でした🥹

シンガポールもワンマンで戻ってこれるよう
en:
2018.06.22 "Natsu Rock 2018" Zepp @ BIGBOX Singapore 🇸🇬

Good morning 💓

It was my first time in Singapore, and I had so much fun!! I was really happy to be able to stand on the stage at Zepp Singapore!

Here’s a photo with Do As Infinity 📸

Their song "Honjitsu wa Seiten Nari" is a memorable track for me because I covered it during my school days and performed it at a culture festival, so hearing it live was just too amazing! It was the best 🥹

I hope to come back to Singapore for a one-man show!

Not knowing the sizing for overseas, we all decided to get size S, but it turned out to be way too small and almost burst! But it was still a lot of fun!!

2018.06.29 WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018【宣告】〜senkoku〜🌍✈️@MEXICO FORO INDIE ROCKS🇲🇽
.
ついに始まりました！senkokuツアー✈︎！
.
2年ぶりのメキシコからスタート！会場の熱気と歓声に大興奮のワンマンお給仕でした！！
.
日本語の歌詞なのにほとんどの曲を一緒に歌ってくれて嬉しかったなぁ💓Daydreamingの大合唱は感動😭✨
.
今回のツアーをメキシコからスタート出来て良かった！！また絶対に帰って
en:
2018.06.29 WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018【Senkoku】〜senkoku〜🌍✈️@MEXICO FORO INDIE ROCKS🇲🇽  
.  
It has finally begun! The senkoku tour✈︎!  
.  
We kicked off in Mexico after two years! The energy and cheers from the venue were absolutely thrilling during our solo okyuji!!  
.  
I was so happy that most of you sang along with us, even though the lyrics are in Japanese💓 The chorus of Daydreaming was so moving😭✨  
.  
I'm really glad we could start this tour in Mexico!! We will definitely come back again!

jp:
本日からeggman 3daysお給仕が始まります！

eggmanにはお世話になりすぎていて思い出がいーっぱいあるのですが、スタッフさん方の愛に溢れるエピソードをひとつ。

一番くじ〈物語〉シリーズの忍ちゃんフィギュアがどうしても欲しくて、頑張ってもなかなか手に入れる事が出来ず。

そしたらなんと。eggmanスタッフさん総出でフィギュアをGETしてくれ、私の誕生日にサプライズでプレゼントしてくれたのです🎁✨

これが当たるまで何回くじ引いてくれたんだろう…😭

本当に感謝でいっ
en:
Starting today, we have a 3-day okyuji at eggman!

I've received so much love from eggman, and I have tons of memories there, but let me share one heartwarming episode with the amazing staff.

I desperately wanted the Shinobu-chan figure from the "Monogatari" series, but no matter how hard I tried, I just couldn't get my hands on it.

Then, out of nowhere, the entire eggman staff came together to get the figure for me and surprised me with it on my birthday! 🎁✨

I wonder how many times they entered the lottery for me... 😭

I'm truly grateful!

jp:
2018.7.19
BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary お給仕 day1 「アルカラ先輩とのライブ、あるから。」
.
eggman 3days初日！アルカラ先輩との2マンは最高の一言！！！熱さが半端なかったね🔥
.
憧れのアルカラ先輩と一緒に2マンだなんて感激だ😭✨とっても嬉しかったです！！
.
リスペクトを込めて、アルカラ先輩の「半径30cmの中を知らない」をBAND-MAIDなりにカバーさせていただきました。
大好きな曲なので嬉し
en:
2018.7.19  
BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary Okyuji Day 1 "There's a live with Arukara-senpai."  
.  
The first day of eggman's 3-day event! The two-man show with Arukara-senpai was simply the best!!! The energy was off the charts🔥  
.  
I was so moved to share the stage with the admired Arukara-senpai for a two-man show😭✨ I was really happy!!  
.  
With deep respect, we covered Arukara-senpai's "I Don't Know What's Within 30cm Radius" in our own BAND-MAID style. It's one of my favorite songs, so I'm thrilled!

jp: アルカラとのeggman ２マンめちゃめちゃ楽しかった
en: The two-man show with Arukara at eggman was so much fun! 🎶

jp:
手が男らしい…

2018/07/18

BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary お給仕 day1 「アルカラ先輩とのライブ、あるから。」 ありがとうございました！！
en:
My hands are so manly... 

2018/07/18

Thank you for the 5th Anniversary okyuji day 1 presented by BAND-MAID × eggman! "We have a live show with Arukara-senpai, you know."

jp:
アルカラのドラムの武史さん！
終演後にドラムを叩いて遊びました！

武史さん、BAND-MAIDのTシャツを着てライブしてくれたんです！プライベートでも着るって言ってくれて嬉しすぎ🥹

武史さんのドラムは手が3本あるんじゃないかって思うぐらい動きがスムーズで細かくて見ていて楽しすぎる。
そして気持ちの良いフレーズと音がダイレクトに伝わる。

アルカラ先輩はメンバー全員最高すぎて。

本番当日も私達のリハーサルからずっと観てくれていて、半径30cmの中を知らないを演奏した時は、ボーカル
en:
Takeshi from Arukara on drums!  
After the show, we had some fun playing the drums together!  

Takeshi wore a BAND-MAID T-shirt during the live performance! He even said he’d wear it in private, which makes me so happy 🥹  

His drumming is so smooth and intricate that it feels like he has three hands! It’s such a joy to watch. Plus, the phrases and sounds come through so clearly.  

All the members of Arukara are just amazing!  

On the day of the performance, he watched us from our rehearsal right up until the end, and when we played "Shiranai" within a 30cm radius, the vocals...

jp:
昨日のお写真(*´꒳`*) BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary お給仕 day1 「アルカラ先輩とのライブ、あるから。」 でした！
.
アルカラ先輩かっこよすぎて！本当好きです。
「半径30cmの中を知らない」をBAND-MAID風にカバーさせていただきましたが、本当に神曲です！！！！！ .

#アルカラ #bandmaid 
#worlddomination #eggman
en:
Here’s a photo from yesterday (*´꒳`*) It was DAY 1 of the BAND-MAID × eggman 5th Anniversary okyuji, "There’s a live with Arukara-senpai!" 

Arukara-senpai was just too cool! I really love them. We had the honor of covering "I Don’t Know What's Within a 30cm Radius" in a BAND-MAID style, and it’s truly a divine song!!!!!!!

#Arukara #bandmaid 
#worlddomination #eggman

そして、3日間でウイスキーあける予定だったのが2日間で終わってもうた。

It was a ladies-only live show!

You were adorable. I feel like I was grinning quite a bit.  

Also, I had planned to finish the whiskey over three days, but I ended up finishing it in just two days.

jp:
2018.7.19
BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary お給仕 day2 「eggwoman　～フローラルな夜～」

お嬢様限定お給仕🎀

フローラルな夜という事で、この日だけ特別に会場をフローラルな香りにしました！香りの演出は初めての試み！

良い香りのライブハウスって素敵だね！

この日の会場BGMは、かなみのシンガーソングライター時代の曲、小鳩の伝説の曲w、私とMISAは前のバンドの曲などなど、メンバー達の過去に活動していた曲を
en:
2018.7.19  
BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary Okyuji Day 2 "eggwoman ~Floral Night~"

Exclusive Okyuji for the Princesses 🎀

Since it's a Floral Night, we specially filled the venue with floral scents just for this day! This is our first attempt at scenting the atmosphere!

A live house with a lovely fragrance is just wonderful!

For the BGM of the day, we played songs from Kanami's singer-songwriter days, Kobato's legendary tracks, and songs from my and MISA's previous bands, among others—music from the members' past activities!

jp:
2018.7.20
BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary お給仕 day3 「お盟主様の会」

BAND-MAID初のファンクラブお給仕✨お盟主様ありがとうございました！

懐かしい曲もたくさんセトリに入れてみたよ！
この日の為に「FORWARD」を今の私達らしくリアレンジしてお届けしました！どうだった？ビックリした？

この3日間、その日だけにしかない特別な空間をみんなと一緒に共有する事が出来て本当に楽しかったです！！

そして、大切
en:
2018.7.20  
BAND-MAID × eggman presents 5th Anniversary Okyuji Day 3 "OMEISYUSAMA-NO-KAI"

Thank you to all the Masters for our first-ever fan club okyuji! ✨

We included a lot of nostalgic songs in the setlist!  
For this day, we rearranged "FORWARD" to match who we are now! What did you think? Were you surprised?

Over these three days, it was truly fun to share a special space that only existed on those days with everyone!!

And, most importantly...

jp:
#ジャイガ でした！！！
.
非常に暑くて熱かった…暑い夏こそフェスですね！！✨
.
めっちゃ楽しかったです！(*´꒳`*)
.
暑い中、ご主人様お嬢様楽しんでいただきありがとうございました💕

ジャイガは今年で2年目ということですが、"みんなで音楽を楽しもう！盛り上げよう！"という気持ちが溢れてて、大好きになりました！
.
ジャイガのスタッフさんたちも暑い中たくさん動いてくれてて、ありがとうございました😭
みんなで作り上げる夏フェス！最高でした！！
.
みなさんっ水分補給し
en:
#JAI-GA was amazing!!!

It was extremely hot and steamy... Summer festivals are the best in this heat!! ✨

I had so much fun! (*´꒳`*)

Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses for enjoying it despite the heat! 💕

This year marks the second year of JAI-GA, and I fell in love with the overflowing spirit of "Let's all enjoy music together! Let's get hyped!" 

A big thank you to the staff who worked hard in the heat as well! 😭 A summer festival created together by everyone was the best!!

Everyone, make sure to stay hydrated!

jp:
2018.8.4
ジャイガ-OSAKA MAISHIMA ROCK FES 2018- ありがとうございました！！ 

炎天下の中、沢山集まってくれて本当に嬉しかったです！ありがとうございました😊

手を挙げてくれたり歌ってくれたり踊ってくれたり、それぞれが自由に音楽を楽しんでいる姿を観る事が出来て本当に楽しい時間でした。

音楽って良いなぁー！ライブって良いなぁー！

そして明日はロッキン！
2日連続思いっきり楽しもう！
en:
2018.8.4  
Thank you for the JYGA - OSAKA MAISHIMA ROCK FES 2018! 

I was really happy to see so many of you gathered under the blazing sun! Thank you 😊 

It was such a fun time watching everyone raise their hands, sing, and dance, each enjoying the music in their own way. 

Music is just so wonderful! Live shows are amazing! 

And tomorrow is Rockin'!  
Let's have a blast for two days in a row!

jp:
ORANGE RANGEのサポートドラムとして本日ジャイガご一緒だった、ドラマーのテツさん🥁！！
.
去年のサマソニ以来の夏フェスでの再会✌️♪嬉しかったなー！！！！
.
UNISON SQUARE GARDEN、androp、KEYTALKの仲良くしていただいてる先輩方々にも久しぶりに会う事が出来て本当に楽しかった🌟
.
そしてケータリングのお寿司のつぶ貝(寿司ネタの中で一番の好物)が美味しすぎた...😭♥️
en:
Today, I got to play as a support drummer for ORANGE RANGE alongside Tetsu-san 🥁!!  
It was our reunion at a summer festival since last year's Summer Sonic ✌️♪ I was so happy!!!!  
I also got to see my senior friends from UNISON SQUARE GARDEN, androp, and KEYTALK after a long time, and it was really fun 🌟  
And the sushi from the catering, especially the surf clam (my favorite sushi topping), was just too delicious...😭♥️

jp:
2018.8.5
ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL 2018
.
長年追い続けてきた夢のロッキンのステージに立つ事が出来ました。
.
与えてもらった30分という時間の中で、後悔を残さないよう私の全ての想いを乗せて演奏しました。
.
心の底から楽しかったです。
ステージから見た景色は一生忘れません。
.
BAND-MAIDのステージを選んでくれて、出逢ってくれた皆様、本当にありがとうございました！！！！
.
📷1枚目〜3枚目
photo by(@masafuji93
en:
2018.8.5  
ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL 2018  
.  
I was able to stand on the stage of my long-time dream, ROCK IN JAPAN.  
.  
During the 30 minutes I was given, I poured all my feelings into the performance so that I wouldn't have any regrets.  
.  
I had so much fun from the bottom of my heart.  
The view from the stage is something I will never forget for the rest of my life.  
.  
Thank you so much to everyone who chose to be at the BAND-MAID stage and for meeting us!!!!  
.  
📷 Photos 1-3  
Photo by (@masafuji93)

jp:
高校生2年生の頃、友人の影響でバンドに目覚めてライブの楽しさを知り、一番通ったフェスがロッキンでした。

ロッキン出演が決まった時や当日も、いつも一緒にフェスに行っていた友人達から嬉しい連絡が届いたりして、なんかすごく感動しちゃった。

欲深いもので、今度はもっと大きなステージに出たいって夢と目標が増えてしまいました！

レベルアップしてまた絶対戻ってくるよ🔥

#RIJF2018 #ロッキン
en:
Back in my second year of high school, I discovered my love for bands thanks to my friends, and I learned just how fun live shows can be. The festival I attended the most was Rock in Japan!

When we got the news that we’d be performing at Rock in Japan, I received so many happy messages from the friends I always went to festivals with, and it really moved me.

I’m a bit greedy now, as I’ve developed dreams and goals of performing on even bigger stages!

I’ll level up and definitely come back again! 🔥

#RIJF2018 #ロッキン

.
I went to YUZU's live with Kobato.
.
"YUZU" is Japanese famous  musician.
.
They gave me energi
en:
Today, I went to YUZU's live with Kobato (@kobatomiku) (*´꒳`*).  
It's amazing how they can create songs that are bright yet can make you feel like crying... 😭😭  
From start to finish, it was so much fun and I received so much energy from the bottom of my heart! 💕💕  
It was my first time waving a towel, and it was so much fun~~ (*´꒳`)

私はまだ辛さにビビって味噌タンメンから抜け出せない。次こそは蒙古タンメンに挑戦する…！

I'm still too scared of the spiciness to move on from the Miso Tantanmen. Next time, I’ll challenge myself to the Mongolian Tantanmen...!

#Nakamoto #NoodleLife #NoodleStagram

朝から個人練習して昼にラーメンを食べるのが1日の充実感を感じられる瞬間。夜もラーメン食べれたら完璧。

煮干し中華そば鈴蘭の海老つけ麺。

クドさと臭みがなく、サラッと食べれてとても美味しかったです🦐チャーシューが薄切りレアチャーシューなのも最高！

 #鈴蘭 #ラーメン #つけ麺 #麺活 #麺スタグラム
en:
Starting the day with personal practice and enjoying ramen for lunch is the moment I feel the most fulfilled. If I could have ramen for dinner too, it would be perfect! 

I had the shrimp dipping noodles from Niboshi Chuka Soba Suiran. 

It was delicious—no overpowering flavors or unpleasant smells, just a light and tasty meal 🦐 Plus, the thinly sliced rare chashu was the best! 

#Suiran #Ramen #DippingNoodles #NoodleLife #NoodleGram

2018.8.19
SUMMER SONIC 2018

2年連続サマソニのステージに立つ事が出来て本当に嬉しかったです！

去年よりもBAND-MAIDを観に来てくれた人が多くて感謝感激です。

サウンドチェックが終わって一曲目が始まると同時に走ってきてくれる人達がいっぱいいて、嬉しくてテンション上がりまくりました。

大きな会場だからこそ、ステージからみんなの姿が良く見えるんだよ！

最高の夏の思い出をありがとう！！

#bandmaid #summersonic #サマソニ
en:
2018.8.19  
SUMMER SONIC 2018  

I was really happy to be able to stand on the Summer Sonic stage for the second year in a row!  

I’m so grateful that more people came to see BAND-MAID this year compared to last year.  

As soon as the sound check was over and the first song started, so many people ran over to us, and I was just over the moon with excitement!  

Because it was such a big venue, I could see everyone from the stage really well!  

Thank you for the best summer memories!!  

#bandmaid #summersonic #サマソニ

jp:
鹿児島に住んでる親友のお母さまのお店(@koubouyuu )から餃子が届いた💕✨めっちゃ美味しいから毎年頼んでるのです( ´∀｀)もちもちなの。
.
九州にお給仕で行くときは鹿児島から駆けつけてくれる優しい友達なのです😭💕
.
今年もBAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】で九州に行きます(*´꒳`*)
.
九州のご主人様、お嬢様っ！
待ってて下さいね〜！！！ #bandmaid #worlddomination #みんちょは #餃子
en:
I received gyoza from my best friend's mom's shop in Kagoshima (@koubouyuu) 💕✨ It's so delicious that I order it every year (´∀｀) It's super chewy!  
When we go to Kyushu for okyuji, my kind friend rushes over from Kagoshima to see us 😭💕  
This year, we'll be going to Kyushu for the BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】 (*´꒳`*)  
Kyushu Masters and Princesses!  
Please wait for us~!!! #bandmaid #worlddomination #MinchoLoves #gyoza

jp:
2018.9.1
C3AFA Jakarta 2018「I LOVE ANISONG」🇮🇩

初のインドネシアでのお給仕！楽しかったー！！

アニソン大好きなので、最高に熱いイベントに出演出来て嬉しかったです！

ニコニコ生放送で観てくれた人もありがとうございました！盛り上がってるお給仕の様子伝わったかな？

インドネシアのみんなありがとーう！
次はワンマンで行けるように頑張ります！

Terima Kasih✨
en:
2018.9.1  
C3AFA Jakarta 2018 "I LOVE ANISONG" 🇮🇩  

Our first okyuji in Indonesia! It was so much fun!!  

I love anisong, so I was really happy to perform at such an amazing and energetic event!  

Thank you to everyone who watched us on Nico Nico Live! I hope you could feel the excitement of our okyuji!  

Thank you so much, Indonesia! We'll work hard to come back for a one-man show next time!  

Terima Kasih✨

jp:
C3AFA Jakarta 2018🇮🇩
お給仕の前に会場へ遊びに行きました！

沢山のアニメブースがあったり、BANDAIブースではガンプラが展示してあったり、アニメやゲームのグッズやフィギュアが販売していたり、楽しすぎて会場を何周もしてしまいました！1日中いても飽きない！

会場にはアニメのコスプレをしている人がいっぱいいて、「はたらく細胞」の血小板ちゃんのコスをした人が男女共に多かった事にビックリ！日本で流行っているアニメがタイムリーでインドネシアでも流行っていて嬉しいな！

その
en:
C3AFA Jakarta 2018 🇮🇩  
Before our okyuji, we went to check out the venue!  

There were so many anime booths, and at the BANDAI booth, they had Gunpla on display. There were also tons of anime and game merchandise and figures for sale. It was so much fun that we ended up going around the venue multiple times! You could spend the whole day there and never get bored!  

There were lots of people in anime cosplay at the venue, and I was surprised to see so many people dressed as the platelets from "Cells at Work," both guys and girls! It's great to see that the anime that's popular in Japan is also trending in Indonesia!  

That...

jp:
もうすぐツアーが始まるのでパワーを注入するために✨先日、元気がもらえるレストランに行ってきました💕
ひまわりをイメージしたデザートがとても綺麗だったのです(*´꒳`*)
本物のひまわりの花びらを砂糖漬けにしてるそうです💕可愛すぎ💕💕
.
お肉が、"鳩"と"牛"が選べたんですけど、小鳩さんに申し訳なくて牛にしました(　ﾟωﾟ)
en:
With the tour starting soon, I went to recharge my energy at a restaurant that lifts your spirits! ✨💕 The dessert inspired by sunflowers was absolutely beautiful (*´꒳`*). They say the real sunflower petals are candied! So cute! 💕💕 

As for the meat, I had the choice between "pigeon" and "beef," but I felt bad for Kobato-san, so I went with beef instead (　ﾟωﾟ).

jp:
帰国後一発目のラーメンは、香湯ラーメン「ちょろり」の五目ラーメン🍜

シンプルでやさしい味わいのスープ。揚げ葱がとても良いアクセント。

そして、ちょろりで欠かせないのが炒飯！
コショウが効いた味付け、少しかためのご飯、パラパラ具合、バランスが最高。絶品です。

#恵比寿 #香湯ラーメン #ちょろり #ラーメン #麺スタグラム #麺活
en:
The first ramen I had after returning to Japan was the Gomoku Ramen from Kōtō Ramen "Chorori" 🍜

The broth has a simple and gentle flavor. The fried green onions are a fantastic accent.

And you can't miss the fried rice at Chorori! The seasoning with pepper, the slightly firm rice, and the perfect fluffiness all come together beautifully. It's absolutely exquisite.

#Ebisu #KōtōRamen #Chorori #Ramen #NoodleStagram #NoodleLife

jp:
侵略ツアーのグッズからサコッシュを紹介。サコッシュは！ポシェットとかショルダーバッグみたいな物！(俺が持ってもいいの？なんて思っちゃってるおじ様安心して下さい！いいのです！かまわんよ)
動画はこのくらい物入るよ動画だよ。サイフ・除菌ペーパー・ケイタイ・カギ(ドクターイエローのカラビナのやつ)・目薬(セーラームーンのやつ)・リップが余裕で入るよー。
若者もおじ様もゲットしてねー。

#bandmaid #saiki
en:
Introducing the sacoche from our invasion tour merchandise! A sacoche is like a pouch or a shoulder bag! (For those of you older gentlemen wondering if it's okay for you to carry one, don’t worry! It’s totally fine! No problem at all!) 

Here's a video showing how much you can fit inside. You can easily fit your wallet, disinfecting wipes, phone, keys (the Doctor Yellow carabiner one), eye drops (the Sailor Moon ones), and lip balm! 

Young folks and older gentlemen, make sure to grab one! 

#bandmaid #saiki

jp:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】
9/12 CLUB CITTA'
ツアー初日でした！！！
ご帰宅いただきありがとうございました💕
いいスタートが切れました✨
宣告ツアーの時にはやっていないこと…侵略ツアーのために新しい事色々やってみました( ´∀｀)如何でしたか？？ このツアーでは、どんどん進化して行きたいと思っているので、是非色んな所へ観にきていただきたいと思っています(*´꒳`*) 2枚目の写真…さいちゃんが目の前でギターソロ見て
en:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】  
9/12 CLUB CITTA'  
It was the first day of the tour!!!  
Thank you for coming home💕  
We had a great start✨  
There were things we didn’t do during the "Declaration" tour... so we tried a lot of new things for the Invasion tour ( ´∀｀) How did you like it?? We want to keep evolving throughout this tour, so we hope you’ll come see us in various places (*´꒳`*) In the second photo... Sai-chan was right in front of me watching the guitar solo!

jp:
侵略ツアーが始まる前に#aulii でマツエクをキレイキレイして貰って来ました(*´꒳`*)💕
綺麗になってよかったああ！！！✨
ちえさん(@chie_n0508 )いつもありがとうございます💕💕✨ちえさん沖縄行ってたから日焼けしてた！沖縄羨ましい…(*´꒳`*)✨ さてさて、BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】本日は金沢EIGHT HALL！明後日17日は新潟NEXS！
ご帰宅お待ちしております(*´꒳`*)💕 #恵比寿西口 #マツエク
en: Before the invasion tour starts, I got my eyelash extensions done beautifully at #aulii (*´꒳`*)💕 I'm so glad to be looking pretty!!! ✨ Thank you as always, Chie-san (@chie_n0508)💕💕✨ I saw that Chie-san was in Okinawa, so she got a nice tan! I'm so jealous of Okinawa… (*´꒳`*)✨ Anyway, today is the BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】at Kanazawa EIGHT HALL! The day after tomorrow, on the 17th, we'll be at Niigata NEXS! Can't wait to welcome you all back home (*´꒳`*)💕 #EbisuWestExit #EyelashExtensions

WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Kanazawa EIGHT HALL  

It's the second day of the tour in Kanazawa!!  

The first photo is a mysterious sight that doesn't look like the stage of a band’s one-man live. LOL  

I got a piggyback ride for the first time since kindergarten. Thanks, MISA! You were incredibly stable.  

The second photo is #WhereIsKobato.

jp:
2018.9.15@金沢EIGHT HALL
.

2018.9.15 @ Kanazawa EIGHT HALL  
.  
I thought it was an amazing photo with a wonderful smile, but it turned out to be just a funny face at the moment my eyes rolled back! 😆

jp:
2018.9.17
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@新潟NEXS

ツアー3日目の新潟！

最初から最後まで一緒に声出してくれてありがとう！！会場の一体感が凄かった〜！

楽屋には、メンバーの好きなキャラクターやハマっているもの達がチラホラ！！そして安定のゴミ箱！笑

毎回イベンターの笹崎さんの心遣いにメンバー一同感動しております✨ありがとうございます！

お次のツアーは9/22広島！
en:
2018.9.17  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Niigata NEXS  

It's the 3rd day of the tour in Niigata!  

Thank you for singing along with us from start to finish!! The sense of unity in the venue was incredible~!  

In the dressing room, we spotted some of the members' favorite characters and things they’re into! And of course, the reliable trash can! LOL  

We’re all moved by the thoughtfulness of the event organizer, Sasazaki-san, every time✨ Thank you so much!  

Next up is the tour in Hiroshima on 9/22!

jp:

「新潟のご主人様、お嬢様♡温かく迎えてくれて本当にありがとうございましたっぽ〜♡ふぇぇ〜♡」by鳩みんちょ

小鳩さん＆みんちょさんにリスペクトの気持ちを込めて。萌え♡萌え♡キューーーーーーーーーン(爆)
en:
At Niigata NEXS, we had a special guest today, "Kobato Mincho"! 

"To all the Masters and Princesses in Niigata ♡ Thank you so much for the warm welcome! Phew~ ♡ Fehe~ ♡" by Kobato Mincho

Sending our respect to Kobato and Mincho. Moe♡ Moe♡ Kyuーーーーーーーーーーn (LOL)

jp:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】

2日目金沢Eight Hall
3日目新潟NEXS

二日間大変楽しくお給仕させていただきました！✨
金沢では、MC中ミサがあーちゃんに肩車を…
新潟では、あーちゃんが私の衣装と小鳩のカチューシャを付けて"鳩みんちょ"と言って、変なことしてましたよ〜(笑)
.
大変自由に色んな事やらせて頂いてます( ´∀｀)✨
始まったばかりですが！もう既にツアーめっちゃ楽しい！！！！！！💕💕💕
.
en:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】

Day 2 at Kanazawa Eight Hall  
Day 3 at Niigata NEXS  

We had an incredibly fun time serving you over these two days! ✨  
In Kanazawa, during the MC, Misa gave A-chan a piggyback ride...  
And in Niigata, A-chan wore my outfit and Kobato's headband, calling herself "Pigeon Mincho" and doing some silly things~ (laughs)  
.  
We're having a lot of freedom to do all sorts of things ( ´∀｀)✨  
It’s just the beginning, but this tour is already so much fun!!!!!!!!💕💕💕  
.

jp:
SHINRYAKU
#bandmaid

2018.9.22
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@広島CLUB QUATTRO

ツアー4日目の広島！

MISAがずっと笑わせてくるから我慢してたけど無理だったー私の負けー。

本当に楽しかったー！広島のみんな、いつも暖かく迎えてくれてありがとう！演奏中に目が合ったら合図してくれたり手振ってくれたり嬉しかった🫶

みんなが私達の事を見てくれてるのと同じぐらい、みんなの事いつも見てるからね〜！

お次はMISAの故郷の岡山！
en:
2018.9.22  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】 @ Hiroshima CLUB QUATTRO  

It’s the 4th day of the tour in Hiroshima!  

I was trying to hold back because MISA kept making me laugh, but I just couldn’t do it— I lost!  

It was so much fun! Thank you to everyone in Hiroshima for always welcoming us so warmly! It made me so happy when you waved at me or signaled when our eyes met during the performance 🫶  

Just like you’re watching us, we’re always watching you too~!  

Next up is MISA's hometown, Okayama!

jp:
るいさんの(@ruihashimoto )
STINGRAY期間限定ショップに
遊びに行ってきたっぽ！！
素敵なグッズも
ゲットしたっぽー！！
ありがとうございましたっぽ🕊
次は東京で10月30日かららしいっぽ！ぜひ皆様も行くといいっぽ！
 #STINGRAY #広島
en: I think I just visited the STINGRAY limited-time shop with Rui-san (@ruihashimoto)!! I got some amazing goods too!! Thank you so much!! 🕊 It seems like the next one will be in Tokyo starting October 30th, so everyone should definitely check it out!! #STINGRAY #Hiroshima

jp:
2018.9.22@広島CLUB QUATTRO

MC中にカープ野球少年が乱入してきました⚾️

ステージにボール転がってっちゃったんだってさ！会場のみんなとハイタッチ出来て嬉しそうだったね！

今回はBAND-MAIDのNEWグッズのガチャベルトがとても大活躍していました！黒・白・赤・黄の4色だよ〜！使いやすくてオススメ✌️

そして愛の込もった手作りユニフォーム。笑

衣装の上から更にTシャツを2枚着て合計3枚着込んでいるので、動くのが苦しくて大変でした。
en:
On September 22, 2018, at Hiroshima CLUB QUATTRO

During the MC, a young Carp baseball fan barged in ⚾️

I heard a ball rolled onto the stage! He looked so happy getting high-fives from everyone in the venue!

This time, BAND-MAID's new gacha belt was a huge hit! It comes in four colors: black, white, red, and yellow! It's super easy to use and I highly recommend it ✌️

And check out the lovingly handmade uniforms. 😂

I was wearing three layers in total, with two T-shirts over my outfit, so it was tough to move around!
On the way back from Okayama, I'm feeling that #STINGRAY style! With my bag and long T-shirt 🕊 @ruihashimoto

jp:
2018.9.24
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@岡山CRAZYMAMA KINGDOM

MISAの産まれ育った岡山は本当に素敵な場所♪とてもアットホームな空間でした！！ありがとうございました！！

岡山はみんなで桃太郎🍑🐶🐵🕊

彩姫a.k.a彩鬼さんには誰も敵いませんでした👹
青鬼はさいちゃん、赤鬼はギターテックのだいちゃん。鬼達強すぎる。

桃太郎の仕込みは、前日ホテルでさいちゃんがお手伝いしてくれました。かなみは手伝いに来て
en:
2018.9.24  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Okayama CRAZYMAMA KINGDOM  

Okayama, where MISA was born and raised, is truly a wonderful place♪ It was such a cozy atmosphere!! Thank you so much!!  

In Okayama, we all became Momotaro 🍑🐶🐵🕊  

No one could compete with Saiki a.k.a. Sai-chan 👹  
The blue demon was Sai-chan, and the red demon was our guitar tech, Dai-chan. The demons are too strong!  

For the Momotaro preparations, Sai-chan helped out the day before at the hotel. Kanami came to help too!

jp:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】

岡山で桃太郎のお遊戯会(笑)をやりました( ´∀｀)笑笑
.
赤鬼 ギターテックの大ちゃん
.
青鬼 さいちゃん(ラスボス)
.
私はさいちゃんチームに入ることにしました( ´∀｀)ごめんね、ミサ桃太郎
.
好き勝手やらせていただいてすみません(笑)メンバーはとっても楽しかったです💕笑
.

Do you know "MOMOTARO"?
.
"MOMOTARO(The Peach
en:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】

We had a little play about Momotaro in Okayama (laughs) (´∀｀) haha
.
Red Demon: Daisuke, the guitar tech
.
Blue Demon: Sai-chan (the final boss)
.
I decided to join Sai-chan's team (´∀｀) Sorry, Misa Momotaro!
.
I apologize for doing whatever I wanted (laughs), but the members had a blast💕 haha

Do you know "MOMOTARO"?
.
"MOMOTARO (The Peach...

jp:
明日は9/28 ZEPP 名古屋です！
みんちょの誕生日〜！！！！！！ BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】

長めのMCをやってる会場多いですが、そんなお給仕は"侵略ツアー"の今回だけだと思います。(全ては彩姫先生が最終決定する。) 今のうちにレアなお給仕を堪能しにご帰宅くださいね(*´꒳`*)💕 #bandmaid #侵略ツアー #worlddomination #japaneserock
en:
Tomorrow, 9/28, we'll be at ZEPP Nagoya!  
It's Mincho's birthday—！！！！！！ BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】  

Many venues have longer MCs, but I think this kind of okyuji is only for the "Invasion Tour." (Everything is ultimately decided by Sai-chan.) Make sure to come home and enjoy this rare okyuji while you can (*´꒳`*)💕 #bandmaid #InvasionTour #worlddomination #japaneserock

Memories from the 4th day of the tour at Hiroshima Club Quattro.  
Akane from the Carp Girls was high-fiving everyone in the audience during the MC!  

And of course, check out our usual funny faces! 😆 #BANDMAID #Hiroshima #Tour2023

jp:
‪BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】‬
‪2018.9.28 ZEPP NAGOYA‬

昨日はご帰宅いただきありがとうございました！
誕生日の当日だったということで、たくさんのご主人様、お嬢様にお祝いしていただきとても嬉しかったです😭💕✨✨
.
来れなかった方も、たくさんのメッセージありがとうございました！！😊💕💕
.
昨日のお給仕のおはなしをさせてください♫
.
‪先日、あーちゃんとさいちゃんが別々に「何かアーティス
en:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】  
2018.9.28 ZEPP NAGOYA  

Thank you to everyone who came home yesterday! I was so happy to celebrate my birthday with so many Masters and Princesses! 😭💕✨✨  
.  
For those who couldn’t make it, thank you for all the lovely messages!! 😊💕💕  
.  
Let me share a bit about yesterday’s okyuji♫  
.  
The other day, A-chan and Sai-chan were separately talking about "What kind of artist..."

jp:
岡山で食した者達の一部

うどんとパイケーキは昔から食べてるもの
岡山に帰るといつも食べに行く

そして白い串刺しになってるもの、これは、鳥の金玉です
高級な豆腐の様な味でした
プリンプリン
あと、イカの卵巣「イカチチ」もたべました
これは居酒屋の「極楽とんぼ」にございます。ごちそうさまです。肝刺しも最高でした。
en:
Some of the things we ate in Okayama

I've been eating udon and pie cake since forever. I always go to eat them when I return to Okayama.

And then there's the white skewered item—this is chicken testicles. It had a taste similar to high-quality tofu. So bouncy! 
I also had squid roe, "ika chichi." You can find this at the izakaya "Gokuraku Tonbo." Thank you for the meal! The liver sashimi was also amazing.

jp:
ツアー5日目岡山CRAZYMAMA KINGDOMの思い出

桃太郎の国なので
桃太郎とその仲間達と鬼をやることになり私は桃太郎でした
100円で買った剣で鬼に挑んだところ
あちらはゴルフクラブと鉄の棒で挑んで来たので負けました

頭のハチマキとか動物達の口元とか諸々を、茜とさいちゃんが頑張って仕込んでくれてた。愛を感じました

たぶん、最初で最後のミサ太郎です。笑
さらにキャラ崩壊したわ笑

またライブで岡山帰ってこれてよかったよ！来年も行きたい
en:
Memories from Day 5 of the tour at Okayama CRAZYMAMA KINGDOM

Since it's the land of Momotaro, I ended up playing Momotaro along with his friends and the demons. I challenged the demon with a sword I bought for 100 yen, but they came at me with a golf club and an iron rod, so I lost. 

Akane and Sai-chan worked hard on my headband and the animal features, among other things. I really felt the love!

This is probably my first and last time as Misa-Taro. LOL I totally broke character, too! 

I’m so glad I could come back to Okayama for another live show! I want to go again next year!

jp:
2018.9.28
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@Zepp Nagoya

Zepp Nagoyaは、高校生の時にライブを観に友達と2人で初めて遠征した思い出の会場。

会場リハの時に、フロアで当時自分が立っていた上手側の最前列に立ってステージを見上げて、今日は自分がステージでドラムを叩くんだって考えたら感慨深過ぎた…。

自分が遊びに行ってたライブハウスやフェスなどの憧れのステージに立てる事がとても嬉しいです！

次はSOLD OUTでZepp
en:
2018.9.28  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@Zepp Nagoya  

Zepp Nagoya is a venue filled with memories for me; it was the first place I ever traveled to for a live show with a friend back in high school.  

During the venue rehearsal, I stood at the front row on the right side of the floor, where I used to stand back then, looking up at the stage. It hit me hard to think that today I would be up there playing the drums!  

I'm so happy to be able to stand on the stages of the live houses and festivals I used to admire!  

Next up, SOLD OUT at Zepp!

jp:
2018.9.28@Zepp Nagoya

この日はギターKANAMIのお誕生日🎸🎉

テックさん含めステージにいる人は強制的に"みんちょお面"を付けてもらい、PAさん＆照明さん方にはお面だと大変なので、Tシャツにかなみの顔を貼り付けてもらうというチーム一同を巻き込んだサプライズを実行しました！

全員ノリノリで快く協力してくれたメンバーとBAND-MAIDチームが本当に大好きだ！

遊びに来てくれたみんなと一緒にかなみをお祝いする事が出来て嬉しかったです😊

かなみから「今ま
en:
2018.9.28 @Zepp Nagoya

This day was guitar KANAMI's birthday 🎸🎉

Everyone on stage, including the tech crew, was forced to wear "Mincho masks," while the PA and lighting staff had it a bit tougher, so we had them stick Kanami's face on their T-shirts as part of a surprise that involved the whole team!

I really love all the members and the BAND-MAID team who happily cooperated and got into the spirit!

I was so happy to celebrate Kanami with everyone who came to hang out 😊

Kanami said, "Until now...

jp:
2018.9.30
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@仙台Rensa

台風予報にも関わらず遊びに来てくれた皆様、本当にありがとうございました！無事にお給仕出来て良かった！

みんなの顔がキラッキラしてたなぁー！エネルギッシュなフロアにこちらも燃えました🔥

4枚目の写真は、3枚目の写真の正面verであろう。
横からも正面からもマネージャーさん2人が同じタイミングで狙って撮ってくれていたのですね。これぞグルーヴ！！
いつもナイスな瞬間を激写してくれ
en:
2018.9.30  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@Sendai Rensa  

Thank you so much to everyone who came out to see us despite the typhoon forecast! I'm really glad we were able to perform safely!  

Everyone's faces were shining so brightly! The energetic crowd fired us up too! 🔥  

The fourth photo is probably the front view of the third one. Both of our managers were capturing the moment from the side and the front at the same time. This is what groove is all about!! Always capturing those awesome moments!

jp:
2018.9.30@仙台Rensa

スペシャルゲストとして、仙台を代表する伊達政宗&馬のお二人(?)にお越しいただきました🏯🐴

お馬さんは息切れしながら頑張ってくれました、ありがとう。シュールの極み。

ずんだと牛タンが大好物なので、今回もいっぱい食べれて嬉しかった！！ケータリングで用意してもらった芋煮が忘れられない美味しさ…💗

仙台最高だ〜〜〜！
en:
2018.9.30 @Sendai Rensa

As special guests, we had the honor of welcoming the representatives of Sendai, Date Masamune & the horse duo (?) 🏯🐴

The horse did its best while panting, thank you! It was the epitome of surreal.

I’m so happy I got to eat a lot of my favorite foods, zunda and gyutan! The imo-ni prepared by catering was unforgettable...💗

Sendai is the best~~!

小さい頃から常にアニメが私の中心にあり、色々なアニメのOPもEDも数え切れないぐらい観てきたので、EDに私達BAND-MAIDの名前がある事が本当に嬉しいです。

遊☆戯☆王VRAINSを盛り上げれるよう頑張ります！

BAND-MAIDとgloryをどうぞよろしくお願いします！！！

en:
The ending song "glory" for the TV anime "Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS" is now on air! ✨

Anime has always been at the center of my life since I was little, and I've watched countless OPs and EDs from various anime, so I’m truly happy to see our name, BAND-MAID, in the ending credits.

We'll do our best to hype up Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS!

Please support BAND-MAID and "glory"! 

#遊戯王 #yugioh #VRAINS #アニメ #anime #bandmaid #glory

jp:
2018.9.28 ZEPP NAGOYAにてお祝いして貰った時の写真です( ´∀｀)💕
.
リハーサル終わりにサプライズでケーキが出てきた✨嬉しかったなぁ！💕
.
しかも、ケーキに私のPRS custum24と同じチョコレートが乗ってたの！
すごーーい！！！
そっくり！！
.
次回のお給仕は7日香川で8日大阪です！！
ご帰宅お待ちしております！！
個人的に見逃せないお給仕になると思っているので、チケットまだの方は是非！！(｀･ω･´)ﾉ
.

#bandmaid #worl
en:
Here’s a photo from when we celebrated at ZEPP NAGOYA on September 28, 2018! ( ´∀｀)💕  
After rehearsals, a surprise cake appeared✨ I was so happy! 💕  
And guess what? The cake had chocolate that looked just like my PRS Custom 24!  
Amazing!!! It’s a perfect match!!  
Our next okyuji will be in Kagawa on the 7th and Osaka on the 8th!!  
We can’t wait to welcome you back home!! Personally, I think this will be an unmissable okyuji, so if you haven’t gotten your tickets yet, please do!! (｀･ω･´)ﾉ  

#bandmaid #worlddomination

.
初！香川でのワンマンお給仕が出来てとーーっても嬉しかったです♫💕
もっともっと成長してまた帰って来たいと思っています！！
.

en:
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】  
2018.10.07 Takamatsu MONSTER  

Thank you for coming home! ( ´∀｀)✨  
.  
I was sooooo happy to have our first one-man okyuji in Kagawa! ♫💕  
I want to grow even more and come back again!!  
.  
We’re looking forward to welcoming our Masters and Princesses back home! ✨  
.  
And tomorrow is the 9th day of the invasion tour, where we’ll be serving in Osaka!!! #bandmaid #worlddomination #

jp:
2018.10.7
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@高松MONSTER

初の香川でのワンマンお給仕でした！

香川にはサヌキロックや丸亀お城まつりで何度か来させていただきましたが、ようやくワンマンで来れたよ！やったー！楽しかったー！

MCではさいちゃんと物販紹介をさせていただきました。

メンバーイチオシのサコッシュはなんと！うどん玉がジャストフィット！
前のメッシュポケット部分にもうどん玉が入るので、湯切りも出来ちゃう(?)優れものでござい
en:
2018.10.7  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Takamatsu MONSTER  

It was our first solo okyuji in Kagawa!  

I've been to Kagawa a few times for Sanuki Rock and Marugame Castle Festival, but finally made it for a solo show! Yay! It was so much fun!  

During the MC, Sai-chan and I introduced our merchandise.  

The members' favorite sacoche is actually perfect for holding udon noodles! You can even fit udon noodles in the front mesh pocket, so you can drain them too (?) It's a fantastic item!

jp:
2018.10.8
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@大阪なんばHatch

侵略ツアーあっという間に半分きました！早い！早すぎるっっっ！！

Screaming初披露、新曲glory、新インスト曲と内容盛り沢山で詰め込みまくりのセトリとなりましたが、みんなついてきてくれたかな？

今日披露した新インスト曲は、ROCK KIDS802でオチケンさんの為にかなみが作った曲なのです♫
ラジオを聴いてくれてた人は気付いたのでは💡？

ドラムソロはベース
en:
2018.10.8  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Osaka Namba Hatch  

We've already reached the halfway point of the Invasion Tour! Time flies! It's going by way too fast!!!  

We packed a ton into the setlist, including the debut of "Screaming," the new song "glory," and a new instrumental track. I hope everyone was able to keep up!  

The new instrumental track we showcased today was created by Kanami for Ochi Ken-san at ROCK KIDS802♫  
Did those of you listening to the radio catch that? 💡  

The drum solo is on bass!

2018.10.8@大阪なんばHatch

大阪スペシャルゲストは「みさいちゃん」にお越しいただきました💙

誰やねん。

MISAの衣装はウエストが細くて、夕ご飯食べたばかりの胃下垂の私には地獄でした。

2018.10.8 @ Osaka Namba Hatch

Our special guest in Osaka was "Misai-chan"! 💙

Who is that? 

Sai-chan was really troubled, but everyone loved her MISA impersonation, so it was a success! 

MISA's outfit had such a slim waist, and for me, with my stomach hanging low after just having dinner, it was pure torture.

‪10月10日はドラムの日🥁

BAND-MAIDに出逢ってから、私のドラムに対する愛が年々増しています。

私のドラムを聴いてくれる人、お給仕に来てくれるみんなを笑顔にしてカッコ良いと思ってもらえるドラマーになりたい！

これからもよろしくお願いします！！

#ドラムの日 #10月10日

October 10th is Drum Day! 🥁

Since I met BAND-MAID, my love for the drums has been growing year by year.

I want to be a drummer who brings smiles to everyone who listens to my drumming and comes to our okyuji, making them think I'm cool!

Thank you for your continued support!! 

#DrumDay #October10th

jp: オクトーバーフェスト行ってきた
en: I went to Oktoberfest! 🍻

jp:
また一つ歳を重ねました。
みんな、ありがとう。
en:
I’ve added another year to my age.  
Thank you, everyone! 😊

jp:
MISA Happy Birthday🎉
3日連続お祝いday！！

誕生日前日はオクトーバーフェストへ。

誕生日当日は、メンバーみんなでリハ後にサプライズお誕生日会🎂✨
BAND-MAID曲縛りカラオケ楽しすぎた〜

誕生日後は、みさと大先輩方のライブを観にF.A.Dへ。

毎日のように会ってるメンバーだけど、お給仕や仕事の日以外にゆっくりメンバーみんなと一緒に過ごせてめちゃくちゃ楽しかった！！

MISA本当におめでとう💜
en:
MISA Happy Birthday🎉  
Three days of celebration!!

The day before her birthday, we went to Oktoberfest.

On her birthday, after rehearsals, we threw a surprise birthday party with all the members 🎂✨  
The BAND-MAID song-themed karaoke was so much fun!

After the birthday celebration, we went to F.A.D to watch Misa and the seniors' live performance.

Even though we see each other almost every day, it was so much fun to spend some quality time together outside of okyuji and work days!!

Happy birthday, MISA! 💜

jp:
近場でお仕事するときに行く珈琲屋さん( ´∀｀)
.
爽やかであっさりしてて飲み易い珈琲が多い印象です！💕
.
いつも爽やか系なお兄さんが珈琲淹れてくれるのですが、珈琲淹れてる音が心地よいのです( ´∀｀)
.
ご主人様、お嬢様💕今日も一日頑張りましょう♫

#lightupcoffee #珈琲屋 #coffe
en:
When I work nearby, I go to this coffee shop ( ´∀｀)  
It gives off a refreshing and light vibe, and I feel like they have a lot of easy-to-drink coffee! 💕  
There's always a refreshing guy who brews the coffee, and the sound of him making it is so soothing ( ´∀｀)  
Masters and Princesses, let's do our best today too! ♫  

#lightupcoffee #coffeehouse #coffee

jp:
Thank you for 
many birthday messages po🕊

誕生日は大好きな #京都 へ
1人で楽しんできたっぽ。
#嵐山 にある 
#みっふぃー桜きっちん に
大好きな鮎の丸焼きちゃんを
食べ歩きしながら行ったり
毎年必ず行ってる 
#六角堂頂法寺や
世界1大好きな
お抹茶屋さんに行ってきたっぽ！！
もちろん #菊花賞 をみに
#京都競馬場 にも！！
(負けちゃったけど、楽しかったっぽ。)
嵐山で出会ったしゃかしゃかみっふぃークッションを連れて
en:
Thank you for all the birthday messages po🕊

For my birthday, I went to my favorite #Kyoto and enjoyed it all by myself. I walked around #Arashiyama and visited #MiffySakuraKitchen to eat my beloved grilled sweetfish. I also went to #RokkakudoChohji, which I visit every year, and to my absolute favorite matcha shop in the world!! Of course, I also went to #KyotoRacecourse to see the #Kikukasho!! (I lost, but it was still fun.) I brought along the shaka shaka Miffy cushion I met in Arashiyama!

jp:
先日、MISAと「2018楽器フェア」へ遊びに行ってきました！

お世話になっているドラムメーカーのTAMAと、シンバルメーカーのZildjian。
そしてリットーミュージック、ZOOM、フックアップ、担当してくださっている方々にお会い出来てとっても嬉しかったです！

試奏したいものがありすぎて1日じゃ全然足りなかった！
本当に楽しすぎて、会場着いた瞬間からテンションMAXでした！

そしてなにより楽器に対する愛が深まりました。

毎日楽しくドラムを叩けているのは、こうして支えてくださ
en:
The other day, MISA and I went to the "2018 Musical Instrument Fair"! 

I was so happy to meet the wonderful people from the drum manufacturer TAMA and the cymbal maker Zildjian. I also got to see folks from Rittor Music, ZOOM, and Hook Up!

There were so many things I wanted to try out that one day just wasn't enough! It was so much fun, and my excitement was at MAX the moment we arrived at the venue!

Above all, my love for instruments has deepened.

Being able to enjoy playing the drums every day is thanks to all the support I receive! 🎶

jp:
「2018楽器フェア」にて、BAND-MAIDがお世話になっているキョーリツコーポレーションのブースのEVANGELIONコーナーに大大大興奮！！(一瞬ここが楽器フェアだという事を忘れた)

初号機ーーー！！

キョーリツコーポレーション様、素晴らしすぎるエヴァコラボを本当に本当にありがとうございますっ…！！

アスカのクロスは既に購入済み！

ドラマーだけど、アスカのキャビネットは部屋に飾って眺めていたい。

ドラマーだけど、ピックとストラップとケースも部屋に飾って眺めていたい。
en:
At the "2018 Musical Instrument Fair," we were beyond excited to visit the EVANGELION corner at the booth of Kyoritsu Corporation, who has been so supportive of BAND-MAID!! (For a moment, I forgot I was at a musical instrument fair.)

Unit 01—!!!

Thank you so, so much, Kyoritsu Corporation, for the absolutely amazing EVA collaboration…!!

I've already purchased Asuka's cross!

Even though I'm a drummer, I want to display Asuka's cabinet in my room and admire it.

And even though I'm a drummer, I also want to display the pick, strap, and case in my room and admire them.

jp:
オリジナルAKANEスティックが完成しました🥁

私の"好き"がたくさん詰まったオリジナルスティック！

デザインは、セプテンバーミーのドラムの岸波 藍ちゃんにお願いしました！

以前インスタで、「藍ちゃんととってもわくわくする打ち合わせをしてきたよ」という投稿をしたのですが、このスティックデザインの打ち合わせの事でした✨

BAND-MAIDのロゴ＆シンボルマークと、私が大好きな猫と星を絶対に入れたかったので要望を全て伝え、その場でパパッとラフを出してくれたんだけど、私が思っていた通り
en:
The original AKANE sticks are complete! 🥁

These original sticks are packed with my "likes"!

I asked Ai-chan from September Me to design them!

I previously posted on Instagram about having a super exciting meeting with Ai-chan, and that was about the stick design! ✨

I definitely wanted to include the BAND-MAID logo & symbol mark, as well as my favorite things: cats and stars. I conveyed all my requests, and she quickly sketched a rough draft on the spot, just as I had imagined!

jp:
かなみが綾波レイのフィギュアをプレゼントしてくれたので、零号機(改)の隣に並べてみた！完璧！

零号機(改)は、私が初めてプラモデル作りに挑戦して完成させた記念すべき第一号✨(詳しくは激ロックのコラム「BAND-MAIDの萌えキュン♡メイドの休日 第9回」を読んでね。笑)

去年の誕生日にみんなから弐号機のプラモデルをいただいたので、弐号機も完成させて早く仲間に入れなければ！

プラモデル作りは時間もかかるし大変な作業だけど、完成した時の達成感は半端ない。

初心者だけど次は塗装にも挑戦し
en:
Kanami gifted me a figure of Rei Ayanami, so I decided to display it next to my Unit-00 (Revised)! Perfect! ✨

Unit-00 (Revised) is the very first model kit I ever attempted to build, and I completed it as a memorable milestone! (For more details, check out the "BAND-MAID's Moe Kyun ♡ Maid's Day Off Episode 9" column on GekiRock. LOL)

Last year on my birthday, everyone gifted me a model kit of Unit-02, so I need to finish that one up and get it in the lineup soon!

Building model kits takes a lot of time and can be quite challenging, but the sense of accomplishment when you finish is incredible.

I'm a beginner, but next, I want to challenge myself with painting too! 🎨

ハロウィンっぽいことは
特に何もしてないんですが、
先日「第94期 神威♂楽園 de オタチナ祭」にお邪魔してきましたっぽ。
普段メイド服でお給仕してるけど、
セーラー服は810歳の小鳩にとって
すごく恥ずかしかったっぽ。笑
楽し〜いライブでしたっぽ🕊
#GACKT 様ではなく #性徒会長 様？
#セーラー服 #楽園祭

小鳩は落ち着くメイド服に戻るっぽ。
#WORLDDOMINATION TOUR 
#侵略 中！！
ご帰宅宜しく
en:
HAPPY HALLOWEEN PO🕊🎃  
I haven't really done anything Halloween-ish, but I recently dropped by the "94th Term Kamui♂ Paradise Otachina Festival."  
I usually serve in a maid outfit, but wearing a sailor uniform was super embarrassing for 810-year-old Kobato. LOL  
It was such a fun live show! 🕊  
Was it #GACKT or #StudentCouncilPresident?  
#SailorUniform #ParadiseFestival  

Kobato is heading back to the comforting maid outfit.  
#WORLDDOMINATION TOUR  
#Invasion in progress!!  
Welcome home!

en:
I always get my photos taken, but just saying "take it" takes so much energy that when I'm being photographed, I feel so embarrassed that I think, "Please stop!" 😂 I'm really grateful, though, and it's like, "Thank you, but I'm embarrassed, thank you, thank you, but I can't take it anymore!" 😂 I really want to get used to being photographed already. 

How do you all like this outfit? Is it good?

2018.10.4
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@札幌PENNY LANE24
.
SOLD OUT嬉しかった！！ありがとう！！
.
札幌は懐かしの曲達が入った新鮮なセトリで攻めてみたっ👍
Beauty and the Beast久しぶりに叩いたけど、本当に忙しい曲だなぁ〜笑
楽しいんだけどねっ！！！！
.
北海道お給仕でいつも写真を撮ってもらってるひとみさんにバッチリ白目写真も撮っていただいた。笑
いつもありがとうございます＆すみません！笑
en:
2018.10.4  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Sapporo PENNY LANE24  
.  
I was so happy it SOLD OUT!! Thank you!!  
.  
For Sapporo, we went for a fresh setlist that included some nostalgic songs! 👍  
I played "Beauty and the Beast" after a long time, and wow, what a busy song it is~ lol  
But it's so much fun!!!!  
.  
I got a perfect white-eye photo taken by Hitomi-san, who always takes pictures during our okyuji in Hokkaido. lol  
Thank you as always & sorry! lol

jp:
2018.10.4@札幌PENNY LANE24
.
ラーメン愛が深過ぎて、ドラマーの自分を見失い完全にラーメン屋。湯切りは自前です。
.
BAND-MAIDのバンダナと、湯切りの中に缶バッチと黄色のラバーバンドを麺に見立てて物販紹介させていただきました！ガチすぎて会場のみんなをポカーンとさせてやったぜ！(ドヤ顔)
.
そして今回の札幌でのラーメンは空へ行きました🍜
えびそば一幻 総本店と信玄に行きたかったのですが、時間的に間に合わず…。。。次回必ずリベンジしに行く！！
.
PENNY
en:
2018.10.4 @ Sapporo PENNY LANE24  
.  
My love for ramen runs so deep that I completely lost sight of myself as a drummer and turned into a ramen shop instead. I even did the draining myself!  
.  
I introduced our merchandise with a BAND-MAID bandana, and inside the draining bowl, I used a can badge and a yellow rubber band to represent noodles! It was so intense that everyone in the venue was left speechless! (Proud face)  
.  
And this time in Sapporo, I went to Sora for ramen 🍜. I wanted to check out Ebi Soba Ichigen and Shingen, but I ran out of time... I'll definitely make a comeback next time for revenge!!  
.  
PENNY

#Memories from Helsinki.

We went to #kannistonleipomo and enjoyed some delicious #cinnamonrolls while hanging out with the members.  
We also visited #Temppeliaukionkirkko (Rock Church) 🕊  
It was such a mystical space!  
We checked out the Moomin shop and even tried some reindeer and Ezo deer soup.  
It was quite a rare experience 🕊  

#worlddominationtour #Announcement

去年はベルリンの壁の端っこしか行けず、「独裁者のキス」と呼ばれる壁まではたどり着く事が出来なかったのですが、今年は端からズラーッと眺める事が出来ました。

#berlinermauer
#berlinwall
#eastsidegallery 
#berlin
en:
East Side Gallery of the Berlin Wall 🇩🇪

Last year, I could only make it to the edge of the Berlin Wall and couldn't reach the wall known as "The Kiss of the Dictator," but this year I was able to admire it all the way from one end to the other.

It was truly breathtaking.

#berlinermauer

誕生日を迎えレベルアップしました🎂✨

今年の誕生日はご主人様・お嬢様、メンバー、チームの皆様と一緒に、最高の1日にしたいと思います！！
誕生日当日にドラムが思いっきり叩けるなんて幸せだなぁ〜🥁

今年も1年、自分らしくバンドと共に成長して、明るく楽しく過ごしたいです！

どうぞよろしくお願いします！！

くるるもお誕生日おめでとう💗毎年一緒にお祝い出来て嬉しいよ！いつまでも元気でいてね！
en:
I leveled up as I celebrated my birthday! 🎂✨

This year, I want to make it the best day ever with our Masters, Princesses, the members, and everyone on the team!! I'm so happy to be able to play the drums to my heart's content on my birthday! 🥁

For this year, I want to grow alongside the band while being true to myself, and spend my days bright and full of fun!

Thank you for your support!!

Happy birthday to Kururu too! 💗 I'm so glad we can celebrate together every year! Stay healthy forever!

#bandmaid #newmerch #2019
#worlddomination #wdbm #comingsoon

2018.12.14

会場リハが終わった後、メンバーとBAND-MAIDチームの皆様にお祝いしていただきました🥳

今年もとっても可愛いケーキ嬉しいなぁ❣️

そして本番直前なのに容赦なく私の顔を生クリームまみれにしてくるメンバー達。まったくもう！最高だな！愛してるよ！

とってもとってもありがとう！！！！！！
en:
After the venue rehearsal was over, the members and everyone from the BAND-MAID team celebrated with me! 🥳

I'm so happy to see such a cute cake again this year! ❣️

And even right before the performance, the members mercilessly covered my face in whipped cream. Seriously, you guys! You're the best! I love you all!

Thank you so, so much!!!!!!!!!!

jp:
2018.12.16
山梨ライブ終了後の打ち上げ＆忘年会でまさかのサプライズが…！！

メンバーとさいちゃんの家族とBAND-MAIDチームの皆様から、またしてもお誕生日を祝っていただきました…！

いきなり店内の電気が消えて、さいちゃんとさいちゃんのお母さんがケーキを持って登場した時は本当にビックリした。

みんなから暖かくて優しくて嬉しい言葉をたくさんかけてもらい、大号泣。笑
私につられて貰い泣きしちゃう可愛いメンバー達。

楽しいときには一緒に笑ってくれて、悲しいときには一緒に泣
en:
2018.12.16  
After the Yamanashi live, we had a surprise at the after-party & year-end party...!!

Once again, I was celebrated for my birthday by the members, Sai-chan's family, and everyone from the BAND-MAID team...!

I was truly shocked when the lights suddenly went out in the venue, and Sai-chan and her mom came in with a cake.

I received so many warm, kind, and happy words from everyone that I ended up crying a lot. 😂  
The cute members couldn’t help but tear up along with me.

They laugh with me during the fun times and cry with me during the sad times.

After the Yamanashi performance, the five of us went to a hot spring ( ´∀｀)✨  
It felt so good soaking in the hot spring!!  
Four of the members stayed overnight and went home afterward ( ´∀｀)  
I won’t be able to see the members for a while, so I’m feeling lonely (´；ω；｀) waah  

#WhereIsKobato #KobatoWentHomeEarlyForWork (crying)  
(Next time, I want to stay overnight with all five of us!!)  

Hot spring after YAMANASHI serving.  

We are wearing "YUKATA," which is very traditional.

jp:
2018.11.30
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@福岡DRUM LOGOS

ワールドツアーを完走し、帰国後一発目のお給仕でした！！ただいま日本！侵略ツアー再開🇯🇵

私の見た目が完全に変わってしまっていたようです。
テーマは「ハイスクール・ミュージカル」への憧れが強過ぎるgirl👭🏫

綺麗なブロンズヘアー、スラッとした高いお鼻は美しくて女性の憧れですが、私にはレベルが高過ぎたようだ。

ボーカル2人を爆笑させる事が出来て、清々しい
en:
2018.11.30  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Fukuoka DRUM LOGOS  

We completed our world tour, and this was our first okyuji after returning to Japan!! I’m back, Japan! The invasion tour resumes 🇯🇵  

It seems like my appearance has completely changed.  
The theme was "High School Musical," and I was feeling it way too much, girl👭🏫  

With beautiful bronze hair and a tall, elegant nose, it’s a look that many women aspire to, but it seems like it was a bit too high-level for me.  

I managed to make the two vocalists burst into laughter, and it felt refreshing!

jp:
2018.12.01
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@熊本B.9

ミクが生まれ育った熊本🕊

いつ来てもフロアが灼熱すぎて酸欠状態になります…！大量の汗かいて動いてるから、熊本に来る度に痩せると思う。最高なダイエット方法！

ミク嬉しそうだったなー！嬉しすぎて身体が半端ない角度で曲がってるもんね！(写真4枚目)

そして！ミクと熊本のご主人様・お嬢様にどうしてもサプライズがしたかったので、さいちゃんと「くまもとサプライズ！」のダンスをサプライズ
en:
2018.12.01  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Kumamoto B.9  

Kumamoto, where Miku was born and raised 🕊  

No matter when I come, the floor is always so scorching hot that I feel like I'm suffocating…! I sweat so much while moving around that I think I lose weight every time I come to Kumamoto. It's the best diet method!  

Miku looked so happy! She was bending at such an incredible angle from being too excited! (Check out the 4th photo)  

And! I really wanted to surprise Miku and the Masters and Princesses of Kumamoto, so Sai-chan and I surprised everyone with the "Kumamoto Surprise!" dance!

jp:
2018.12.08
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@京都FANJ

京都といえば！伝説のあのバンドの曲が似合う！そう！今年のエイプリルフールに突如結成された「BAND-MAIKO」！

BAND-MAIKOのsecret MAIKO lipsを初披露したよ！
あー！楽しかった！楽しすぎた！

最初の太鼓の音はフロアタムで再現したんだけど、みんなの「え！？もしかして！？」「おぉ〜！？」という驚きと期待の声が飛び交っていたので、終始ニヤニヤが止まりませ
en:
2018.12.08  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@Kyoto FANJ  

When you think of Kyoto, you can't help but think of that legendary band's music! That's right! The sudden formation of "BAND-MAIKO" on this year's April Fool's Day!  

We had our first reveal of BAND-MAIKO's secret MAIKO lips!  
Ah! It was so much fun! Too much fun!  

We recreated the initial drum sound using a floor tom, and the crowd was filled with gasps of "Wait!? Could it be!?" and "Ohhh!?" So I couldn't stop grinning the whole time! 😊

jp:
2018.12.09
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@神戸HarborStudio

私の愛する地元！神戸！！やっとワンマンお給仕しに来る事が出来て本当に嬉しかった〜💓

幼少期の私(多分2歳ぐらい)をMISAママがおんぶしてくれました。

すくすく成長し、大食いドラマーになりました。そして最高の人生を送ってます！

また絶対お給仕しに帰ってくる！！
街も人も暖かい神戸が大好き！！
en:
2018.12.09  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Kobe Harbor Studio  

My beloved hometown! Kobe!! I was so happy to finally be able to perform a one-man okyuji here~ 💓  

When I was a child (probably around 2 years old), MISA Mama carried me on her back.  

I grew up strong and became a big-eating drummer. And now I'm living my best life!  

I will definitely come back to perform again!! I love Kobe, with its warm streets and people!!

jp:
本年も大変お世話になりました﻿
ご主人様お嬢様お盟主様とたくさんの時間を共有出来てサイコーな景色を見せてもらって幸せでした🥰﻿
来年もメイドのでっかい目標である「世界征服」に向けて一歩一歩進んでいくのでよろしくお願いします﻿
皆様よいお年を﻿
﻿
写真は母が送ってくれた富士山💕💕💕﻿
﻿
#bandmaid﻿
#saiki
en:
Thank you so much for all your support this year! 🥰 I was so happy to share so many moments with our Masters, Princesses, and OMEISYUSAMA, and to see such amazing sights together. 

Next year, we’ll continue to take steps toward our big goal as maids: "World Domination," so please look forward to it! Wishing everyone a wonderful New Year! 

The photo is of Mount Fuji that my mom sent me. 💕💕💕 

#bandmaid  
#saiki

jp:
#shinkiba #semifinal
#bandmaid #worlddomination

2018.12.14
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【侵略】@長野JUNKBOX

私の誕生日という事で！
いつもMCでは私が色々好き放題していたのですが、この日はメンバーに全てお任せしました。

「この場をお借りして、日頃の感謝の気持ちを伝えたいと思います。」と手紙を読んでくれたメンバー達。感動しちゃってウルウルな私。

読んでいくにつれ文章に異変が。

「ここであーちゃんの変顔BEST3を発表します！」とパネルを掲げ笑顔のメンバー。状況が把握出来ず戸
en:
2018.12.14  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Nagano JUNKBOX  

Since it was my birthday!  
During the MCs, I usually do whatever I want, but on this day, I left everything up to the members.  

The members read a letter saying, "I’d like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude for your daily support." I was so moved that I was almost in tears.  

As they continued reading, I noticed something strange in the text.  

They held up a panel and said, "Now, we will announce A-chan's Best 3 funny faces!" with smiles on their faces. I couldn't grasp the situation at all!

en:
It's been a while since I wore casual clothes. My makeup is light too. 

I'm wearing a shirt made of pile fabric from NineMicrophones? 👔👌🏻💕 It's super cute! On that day, I wore it buttoned over a tight black turtleneck knit dress. It looked nice! 

Since it's made of pile fabric, it feels really good on the skin, so I hope it warms up soon. I want to wear it over a sleeveless top, or over a tight T-shirt, or even over a swimsuit when going to the beach or pool. 

I highly recommend it! 

#ninemicrophones

彩ちゃんの地元、山梨！

年内最後の侵略ツアーでした！山梨めっちゃ勢いあったなー！

MCでは彩ちゃんの幼少期のお面をつけて登場したのですが、残念ながら写真を撮り損ねてしまった。
なので、彩ちゃんのお母さんから送っていただいた写真をちょっとだけお見せしよう(本人許可済)

小さい彩ちゃん可愛すぎ…♡

en:
2018.12.16  
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2018-2019【Invasion】@ Kofu CONVICTION  

Yamanashi, Sai-chan's hometown!  

It was the last invasion tour of the year! Yamanashi had such amazing energy!  

During the MC, I showed up wearing a mask from Sai-chan's childhood, but unfortunately, I missed the chance to take a photo.  
So, I’ll share just a little photo that Sai-chan's mom sent me (with her permission).  

Little Sai-chan is just too cute...♡  

Thank you to Sai-chan's mom for helping with the photo!

.

.  
Recently, I bought the #shiseido Professional shampoo and conditioner that Sai-chan recommended! I want my hair to be shiny just like hers💕  
.  
I also stopped by #BiyaCoffee during a break from work ( ´∀｀). The deep-roasted coffee has such a rich and mellow flavor!

jp:
お台場にある#teamLabBorderless に
お邪魔してきたっぽー。
まるで体ごと異空間に飛び込んだような
不思議な空間でとっても感動したっぽ。
ただ綺麗とかそんなんじゃない
体感出来る美しさがあったっぽ。
自分の体に反応して
華が咲いたり散ったり、
蝶が生まれたり、消えてしまったり、
水が自分を避けて流れていったり、
波の中にまるで身体ごと
入っているような感じや
お茶にお花が咲いたり、、、
言葉じゃ説明できない感動だったっぽ。
色んな空間が沢山あって
時間によって
en: I just visited #teamLabBorderless in Odaiba! It felt like I jumped into another dimension; it was such a mysterious space that left me truly moved. It wasn't just beautiful; it had a beauty you could feel with your body. Flowers bloomed and scattered in response to my movements, butterflies were born and disappeared, water flowed around me as if avoiding me, and it felt like I was completely immersed in waves. There were even flowers blooming in my tea... It's a feeling that words can't really capture. There were so many different spaces, and depending on the time...

#nikeairmax95

#bandmaid ﻿
#saiki

家族でいちご狩り行ってきた🍓💕﻿
﻿
去年はお母さんとだったけど。今年は兄ちゃんも。いつも優しくしてくれる兄ちゃん。﻿
顔とか似てるのに見た目も雰囲気も全然違うから兄妹と信じてもらえないことが多いのよね。﻿
仲良し家族だなぁ。と思う日々だね。﻿
﻿
楽しくリフレッシュ出来たよ。﻿
﻿
いちご狩りではいっぱい食べて食べて食べまくって充実感に満ちたいの。﻿
さいちゃんは例年通り40個食べて。お腹痛くなったよ。﻿
兄ちゃんは18個しか食べなかったの。﻿
しかしなんとお母さんは90個も食
en:
I went strawberry picking with my family 🍓💕 

Last year it was just with my mom, but this year my big brother joined us too. He’s always so kind to me. Even though we look alike, our vibes are totally different, so a lot of people don’t believe we’re siblings. 

I really feel like we’re a close-knit family. 

It was a fun and refreshing day! 

When I go strawberry picking, I want to eat and eat and eat until I’m completely satisfied. This year, Sai-chan ate 40 strawberries like usual and ended up with a stomachache. My brother only managed to eat 18. But can you believe it? Mom ate 90 strawberries! 🍓✨

2019.3.9 お盟主様の会【Acoustic & Talk】@ヒューリックホール東京

お盟主様ありがとうございました！！

アコースティックお給仕では初めて小口径のドラムセットを使いました🥁
小口径セットに合わせてライド以外のシンバルはいつもよりひと回り小さいサイズに替えて、スプラッシュシンバルやウィンドチャイムも追加したよ！

全体の音量とバランスを考えて、スティックはWincentの5AのMapleとロッドを使いました。

1タム&シングルペダルのシンプルなセッティングも久し
en:
2019.3.9 OMEISYUSAMA-NO-KAI 【Acoustic & Talk】 @ Hulic Hall Tokyo

Thank you so much, OMEISYUSAMA!!

For the acoustic okyuji, I used a small-diameter drum set for the first time 🥁. I swapped out the cymbals for smaller sizes, except for the ride, and added splash cymbals and wind chimes!

Considering the overall volume and balance, I used Wincent's 5A Maple sticks and rods.

It’s been a while since I set up a simple configuration with 1 tom and a single pedal!

本日！2019年4月3日！

ミニアルバム「BAND-MAIKO」リリース日どすえ💿㊗️
ほんま嬉しおすなぁ！

(📷2枚目)
右➡︎通常盤(CD)
左➡︎完全生産限定版(CD＋DVD＋GOODS)

完全生産限定版の中身はこないな感じどすえ〜(📷3枚目)

CDは巾着の中に入れてはり、日本の魅力溢れるジャケット🇯🇵ブックレットの紙にもこだわりがあるんどす。

DVDには「祇園町」のMV＆メイキング映像収録🎥

GOODSの巾着と千社札ステッカーほんま素敵なんどす
en:
Today! April 3, 2019!

It's the release day of our mini-album "BAND-MAIKO"! 💿🎉
I’m really so happy!

(📷2nd photo)
Right ➡︎ Regular Edition (CD)
Left ➡︎ Limited Edition (CD + DVD + GOODS)

Here’s what’s inside the Limited Edition! (📷3rd photo)

The CD is tucked inside a drawstring bag, and the jacket is filled with the charm of Japan 🇯🇵. We’ve put a lot of thought into the paper for the booklet too.

The DVD includes the MV for "Gionmachi" and behind-the-scenes footage 🎥.

The drawstring bag and the "sencha" sticker from the GOODS are really wonderful!

jp:
あんさん、ご機嫌いかがどすぽ？
今日もたんとBAND-MAIKO
聴いてくれはりましたか、ぽぉ？
舞妓はんの言葉は
関西弁とはちゃいますのえ。ぽ？🕊
京言葉なんどすけど、
更に舞妓はんが使うのは
花街言葉いうんどすえ。
ぽー。
一日お疲れさんどしたぽー。🕊
おやすみぽー🕊
en:
Hey there, how are you doing?  
Did you listen to a lot of BAND-MAIKO today?  
The words of a Maiko are not quite the same as Kansai dialect, you know? 🕊  
It's Kyoto dialect, but what Maikos use is called Hanamachi language.  
Poo.  
Thanks for your hard work today! 🕊  
Good night! 🕊

今年もBAND-MAIKOが戻って来れて、新曲も発表して、京都でMV撮影する事が出来て、ミニアルバムまでリリース出来て、さらにはDAM CHANNELに出演させてもらえるなんて…！！

嬉しい事ばかりでした。最高に楽しかったです！

こんなにエイプリルフールを全力で楽しんでるバンド、なかなか居ないんじゃないでしょうか。笑

今年もみんなにビックリ&楽しんでもらえてたら嬉しいです！

また必ず会いましょう！ありがとうございました！

と、紅月が言っていました♡

#bandmaiko
en:
This year, BAND-MAIKO was able to return, announce new songs, shoot an MV in Kyoto, release a mini-album, and even appear on DAM CHANNEL...!!

I was filled with joy at all these wonderful experiences. It was an absolute blast!

I don't think there are many bands that enjoy April Fool's Day as wholeheartedly as we do. Haha!

I hope everyone was surprised and had fun this year too!

Let's definitely meet again! Thank you so much!

That's what Akatsuki said ♡

#bandmaiko

jp:
舞妓さんの聖地である京都で2日間かけて撮影した「祇園町」のMV。

監督、撮影スタッフさん方、着付け師さん方、ヘアメイクさん方、機材セッティングやサポートをしてくれたスタッフさん方。寒空の下、朝から晩までものすごく長丁場で大変な撮影にも関わらず笑顔を絶やさず接してくださった皆様のおかげで、今年も疲れが吹き飛ぶ程に明るく楽しく撮影する事が出来ました。

撮影初日にはサプライズで富士姫のお誕生日をお祝いする事も出来て、特別な思い出になりました。富士姫に喜んでもらえてサプライズ大成功🎂✨

そして
en:
we were able to shoot the "Gion Town" MV over two days in Kyoto, the sacred place of maiko! 

Thanks to the director, the filming crew, the kimono dressers, the hair and makeup artists, and all the staff who set up the equipment and provided support. Despite the long and challenging shoot in the cold from morning till night, everyone kept smiling and made it a bright and fun experience that blew away our fatigue this year.

On the first day of filming, we also had a surprise celebration for Fujihime's birthday, which became a special memory. We were so happy to see Fujihime delighted, and the surprise was a huge success! 🎂✨

And...

jp:
ただいまっぽ。
小鳩帰ってきたっぽ。
髪の色もまた更なる赤に
グレードアップしてきたっぽ。
まっかっかすぎて
美容師さん(@icemankoori )の手が
染まっちゃったっぽ。笑 
ちなみに前回は4枚目。
1枚目と比べると全然違うっぽねぇ。
#小鳩ミク #haircolor
en:
I'm back!  
Kobato has returned!  
My hair color has leveled up to an even deeper red!  
It's so bright that the stylist (@icemankoori) ended up with red-stained hands. 😂  
By the way, the last one was the fourth photo.  
It's totally different compared to the first one!  
#KobatoMiku #haircolor
