GiGS 6月号「へい！ドラム一丁！」最終回読んでくれましたかー🥁？

1年間ひたすら楽しくドラム講師を務めさせていただきました！全てが初めて尽くしで緊張でしたが、皆様の暖かいサポートのおかげで無事最終回を迎える事が出来ました！

平成最後にふさわしい最高の締めくくり！

写真は、1年間お世話になったGiGS編集部の皆様と。

語彙力ゼロな私の言葉をいつも分かりやすく丁寧にまとめてくれてありがとうございました。
いつも明るく楽しい現場で、毎回GiGSの皆さんに会うのが楽しみでした！
en:
Did you read the final installment of GiGS June issue, "Hey! One Drum Please!"? 🥁

I had the pleasure of being a drum instructor for a whole year, and it was an absolute blast! Everything was a first for me, and I was quite nervous, but thanks to everyone's warm support, I was able to reach the final episode safely!

What a perfect way to wrap things up as we close the Heisei era!

In the photo, I'm with the wonderful GiGS editorial team who supported me throughout the year.

Thank you for always summarizing my words, which lack vocabulary, in such a clear and thoughtful way. I looked forward to seeing everyone at GiGS every time, as the atmosphere was always bright and fun!

jp:

en:
Yesterday, I had the pleasure of attending the additional performance of #3131-san's tour with SILENT SIREN ☺︎♪ 

We danced to "Koi no Esper," which the members are currently obsessed with, and when MISA sent a video to Ainyan-san... guess what...! It was actually used in the live footage! 😂✨

It was such a fun time! I'll work hard so we can perform together someday! 

#bandmaid

いつも可愛いフラッグをありがとう🥰
とっても嬉しい！！谢谢💞
.
最高のお給仕をした後は、美味しい台湾料理を食べに行って(#小鳩どこ) マッサージを受けて、なんとも贅沢な台湾お給仕でした！！！
.
なんとマッサージ店の店長はめちゃくちゃ可愛いわんちゃん🐶❤️
.
癒されまくりました！！！
.
#bandmaid #worldtour #gekidou #taipei
en:
Thank you for the always adorable flags! 🥰 I'm so happy!! 谢谢💞  
After providing the best okyuji, we went to enjoy some delicious Taiwanese cuisine (#KobatoWhere) and got massages—what a luxurious Taiwanese okyuji!!!  
And guess what? The manager at the massage place had the cutest dog ever! 🐶❤️  
I was totally healed!!!  
#bandmaid #worldtour #gekidou #taipei

jp:
かなみと会場近くをお散歩。

本場の珍煮丹(ジェンジュダン)の黒糖タピオカ美味しかったー！　
台湾で一番人気のタピオカなんだって！

#珍煮丹 #jenjudan #taipei
en:
I went for a walk near the venue with Kanami. 

The brown sugar tapioca from the real deal, Jenjudan, was so delicious! I heard it's the most popular tapioca in Taiwan! 

#珍煮丹 #jenjudan #taipei

jp:
台湾のお給仕最高でした！✨
皆さん日本語が上手すぎでした♫

タピオカも美味しかったし、小籠包も美味しかった！！✨ .
お給仕のあとマッサージに連れて行っていただきまして…店長のワンちゃんがそれはもう素晴らしい接客で感動しました！素晴らしく可愛いかったのです、、🐶 .

犬好きに堪らんでした…… マッサージも凄かった(　ﾟωﾟ)
みんなでゴキゴキしてもらった(　ﾟωﾟ)怖かったけど色々治りました！！！✨
サインして帰りましたよ♪
.
.
台湾の人はみんな優しくて温かくて！
台湾が
en:
The okyuji in Taiwan was amazing! ✨  
Everyone's Japanese was so good! ♫  

The tapioca was delicious, and the xiaolongbao was also fantastic!! ✨  
After the okyuji, I was taken for a massage... and the store manager's dog provided such wonderful service that I was truly moved! It was incredibly cute... 🐶  

For a dog lover, it was just perfect... The massage was incredible (　ﾟωﾟ)  
We all got our backs cracked (　ﾟωﾟ) It was scary, but it fixed a lot of things!!! ✨  
I signed and went home with a smile♪  

Everyone in Taiwan is so kind and warm!  
Taiwan is...

jp:
台湾楽しかった
みんなありがとう
en: Taiwan was so much fun! Thank you, everyone! 😊

https://bandmaid.tokyo/contents/252229
#gekidou #bandmaid #wdbm #worlddomination

こないだ浅草に行った時の小鳩。
久々にパンダさんにのったり、
浅草寺ではちょうど
#ほうずき市 の日で
屋台が沢山出てて
大好きな鮎の塩焼きたべたり、
射的したりしたっぽ！
歩いてたら見つけた着物屋さんで
かわいい羽織物がなんと500円！！かんざしも買って、
るんるんしたっぽ！
本来の目的はずっと行きたかった
#天国 っていうカフェ！！
昔ながらな ホットケーキとホットドッグたべたっぽ。
おいしかったっぽー✨
#浅草 いいとこっぽ！！
en:
Kobato here from my recent trip to Asakusa!  
I got to ride on a panda for the first time in a while, and it just so happened to be the day of the #Hōzuki Market at Senso-ji Temple, so there were tons of food stalls! I enjoyed my favorite grilled sweetfish and even tried my hand at shooting games!  
I stumbled upon a kimono shop while walking around, and I found an adorable haori for just 500 yen! I also bought a kanzashi, and it made me so happy!  
The main reason for my visit was to finally go to the café called #Tengoku that I've been wanting to check out! I had some old-fashioned pancakes and a hot dog, and they were delicious! ✨  
#Asakusa is such a wonderful place!

jp: 卵を中手骨の頭で割る
en: Crack an egg with the head of your metacarpal bone.

jp:
卵を顎で割る

やはりここの骨の方が、卵が割れやすい。
私の顎は鋭利なのか、中身まで割れてました。
最初鎖骨で割ろうとしたけど「ごっ！！！」って鳴り響いて割れずにおわった。
（何してんねん）
en:
Cracking an egg with my jaw

As expected, the bones here are better for cracking eggs. 
My jaw must be sharp because it ended up breaking all the way through! 
At first, I tried to crack it with my collarbone, but it made a loud "thud!!!" and didn’t break at all. 
(What am I even doing?)

jp:
ヨーロッパへツアー行ってからあっという間に時が過ぎ…﻿
﻿
﻿
#激動第一章 の #激動ツアー ファイナルがいよいよ明日です﻿
(追加公演もあるけどね)﻿
昭和女子大学人見記念講堂にてお給仕﻿
初めてのホールでのワンマンお給仕﻿
楽しみです﻿
またメイドさん達の新たな一面を観せて…魅せられたらいいな…と思います﻿
﻿
﻿
写真はヨーロッパから帰る時に撮った写真﻿
﻿
スニーカーは #nikeairforce1﻿
﻿
スーツケースには #ninemicrophones のス
en:
Time has flown by since our tour in Europe... 

The final of the #DynamicChapter's #DynamicTour is finally tomorrow! 
(There will be additional performances too, though) 
We’ll be serving at Showa Women's University Hitomi Memorial Hall. 
It's our first solo performance in a hall, and I'm really looking forward to it! 
I hope we can show a new side of the maids... and enchant everyone! 

The photo was taken when we were returning from Europe. 

Sneakers: #nikeairforce1 

On the suitcase, there's #ninemicrophones.

jp:
【JAPAN TOUR】BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019【激動】 人見記念講堂
.
.
初のホールワンマンお給仕は凄いあっという間に終わってしまいました( ´∀｀)
.
最後の写真はMISAに「MR.BIGみたいにタッピング一緒にしない？」と言ってやり始めた写真です(*´꒳`*)
.
.
とっても楽かったです！！
ご主人様お嬢様は如何でしたか？
.
.
お給仕にご帰宅される事がご主人様、お嬢様の楽しみや、毎日の活力になれば嬉しいです！！
.
en:
【JAPAN TOUR】BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019【Intense】 Hitomi Memorial Hall  
.  
Our first hall one-man okyuji ended in the blink of an eye (´∀｀)  
.  
The last photo is of me asking MISA, "How about we tap together like MR.BIG?" and then we started doing it (*´꒳`*)  
.  
It was so much fun!!  
Masters and Princesses, how was it for you?  
.  
I hope returning home for okyuji brings joy and energy to our Masters and Princesses every day!!  
.

jp:
【JAPAN TOUR】BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019【激動】 人見記念講堂 .
昨日は楽しくてアドレナリン出すぎた為か…ギターを好きに弾いていいセクションでトランス状態になり、自分でも良く分からない事してたみたいです(　ﾟωﾟ)はわわ。
アドレナリンって怖い。。
.
.
バスドラの上に乗ってたけど、MISAがさりげなく後ろで支えてくれてたのね！！
.
この写真見て気付きました(　ﾟωﾟ)
MISA優し……ありがとうなの！！
.
.

#b
en:
【JAPAN TOUR】BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019【Intense】 Hitomi Memorial Auditorium.  
Yesterday was so much fun that I think I got a bit too much adrenaline... During the section where I could freely play guitar, I ended up in a trance state and was doing things I didn't even understand myself (　ﾟωﾟ) whoa.  
Adrenaline can be scary...  
.  
I was sitting on top of the bass drum, but MISA was quietly supporting me from behind!!  
.  
I realized this when I saw the photo (　ﾟωﾟ)  
MISA is so kind... Thank you so much!!  
.  
.  
#b

jp:
ツアーファイナルのステージ上にかなみが飾っていたお花は、かなみのお母さん手作りのプリザーブドフラワー。

今回のお花のテーマは、私をイメージして作ってくれた"元気が出るビタミンカラー"🌼

自分をイメージして作ってもらったお花って初めてなので、とっても嬉しい！！

ツアーファイナルが終わった後かなみから貰って、お部屋に飾りました♡
en:
The flowers that Kanami decorated the stage with at the tour final were handmade preserved flowers from her mom. 

The theme for this bouquet was "cheerful vitamin colors" inspired by me! 🌼 

It's the first time I've ever received flowers made with me in mind, so I'm really happy!! 

After the tour final, Kanami gave them to me, and I displayed them in my room! ♡

jp:
今日はとある収録の帰りにあーちゃんとさいちゃんが欲しかったコジコジのマスコットを取りにゲームセンターへ行ってくれました！✨
.
なんと本当に全種類コンプリートしてくれました！！(　ﾟωﾟ)すごーーい！！！！！
.
しかもヤカン君は2つ取れた( ´∀｀)笑
.
このサイズのコジコジが可愛すぎて可愛いすぎて…本当に欲しかったの！！✨
.
二人とも優しい！！！ありがとうございます！！！！！！！大好き！
.
クレーンゲームってやるのも見るのも楽しいんですね！
.
満足満足！！もうお腹いっぱ
en:
Today, after a certain recording, A-chan and Sai-chan went to the game center to get the Coji-Coji mascots they wanted! ✨  
.  
And they actually completed the entire collection!! (　ﾟωﾟ) Amazing!!!!!!!  
.  
Plus, they managed to get two Yakan-kun figures ( ´∀｀) lol  
.  
These Coji-Coji figures are just too cute, I really wanted them!! ✨  
.  
Both of you are so kind!!! Thank you!!!!!!! I love you!  
.  
Playing crane games is so much fun, whether you’re doing it or just watching!  
.  
Feeling satisfied! I’m already full!

jp:
2019.8.2
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019 【激動】 EXTRAお給仕@マイナビBLITZ赤坂
.
激動ツアー第一章、完走！！！
全公演SOLD OUT＆追加公演までする事が出来て、さらには急遽発表したにも関わらず追加公演もSOLDと、本当に嬉しい事のオンパレードでした！！ありがとうございました！！！
.
10月から始まる【激動】ツアー第ニ章、そしてラストの【進化】まで、まだまだよろしくお願いします✨
.

photo by MASANOR
en:
2019.8.2  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019 【激動】 EXTRA okyuji @ Mynavi BLITZ Akasaka  
.  
The first chapter of the 激動 tour is complete!!!  
All shows were SOLD OUT, and we even managed to add an extra performance, which also sold out despite the sudden announcement! It was truly a parade of happiness!! Thank you so much!!!  
.  
We look forward to your continued support for the second chapter of the 【激動】 tour starting in October, and all the way to the final 【進化】! ✨  
.  
photo by MASANOR

jp:
2019.8.10
ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL 2019

WING TENTに集まってくれたみんな！ありがとうございました！

最高に楽しい夏がスタート🌞

20周年という記念すべき年に出演する事が出来てとっても嬉しかったです！ロッキン20周年おめでとうございます！

学生時代から通っていたフェスが20年続いてる事が本当に嬉しいし、これから先もずっとずーっと夏を盛り上げ続けてください！！

#bandmaid #RIJF2019 #ロッキン
en:
2019.8.10  
ROCK IN JAPAN FESTIVAL 2019  

Thank you to everyone who gathered at the WING TENT!  

The most fun summer has just begun 🌞  

I’m so happy to have been able to perform in this memorable year of our 20th anniversary! Congratulations on 20 years of Rockin'!  

It truly makes me happy that the festival I used to attend during my student days has continued for 20 years, and I hope it keeps bringing summer excitement for many more years to come!!  

#bandmaid #RIJF2019 #ロッキン

jp:
ロッキン2019の思い出🌞
.
📷1〜4
LONGMANと夏を大満喫！
会場着いてわずか5分後の様子。さわちゃんプールが似合いすぎるのよ。LONGMANに会うと元気もらえる！
.
📷5
Gacharic Spinの皆さん！
目立ちすぎて何処にいても一瞬で見つけられる！笑
話したい事いっぱいありすぎて全然時間足りなかった！明るくて優しくて最高の先輩！
.
📷6
MUCCのミヤさん！
私達のワンマンにいつも素敵なお花を送ってくださるMUCCさん、感謝です！いつも本当にありがと
en:
Memories from Rockin' 2019 🌞  
.  
📷1-4  
Fully enjoying summer with LONGMAN!  
This was just 5 minutes after arriving at the venue. Sawachan looks way too good by the pool! Meeting LONGMAN always gives me energy!  
.  
📷5  
Everyone from Gacharic Spin!  
They stand out so much that you can spot them instantly, no matter where they are! 😂  
There were so many things I wanted to talk about, we totally ran out of time! They're such bright and kind seniors, the best!  
.  
📷6  
Miya from MUCC!  
Thank you so much to MUCC for always sending us beautiful flowers for our one-man shows! I really appreciate it!

jp:
ロッキン当日がお誕生日だった、SCANDALのHARUNAちゃん❤️
.
直接おめでとうって言えて嬉しかったし、SCANDALと出演日同じで会えたのも嬉しかった🥰
.
タピオカで乾杯🥂笑
.
改めてHARUNAちゃん、お誕生日おめでとうございます🎂🎉🌈
.
素敵な1年になりますように☺︎♪
.
もっといっぱい遊びたいし、絶対に対バンしたい！！！！！！！！！！！！
.
#RIJF2019 #ロッキン #scandal #bandmaid
en:
It was HARUNA-chan from SCANDAL's birthday on the day of Rockin' ❤️  
I was so happy to be able to say congratulations to her in person, and I was also thrilled that we got to meet since we performed on the same day as SCANDAL 🥰  
Cheers with tapioca 🥂 lol  
Once again, happy birthday HARUNA-chan! 🎂🎉🌈  
I hope this year is wonderful for you ☺︎♪  
I want to hang out more and I definitely want to do a joint performance!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  
#RIJF2019 #Rockin #scandal #bandmaid

2019.8.17
SUMMER SONIC 2019

RAINBOW STAGEに遊びに来てくれたみんなありがとうございました🌈

Youtube Livestreamingで観てくれていたみんなもありがとうございました！会場の熱気伝わったかな？

今年もサマソニに出演させてもらえて、大切な20周年をみんなと一緒にお祝いする事が出来て、本当に嬉しかったです！

最後はレッチリのライブをメンバー皆で堪能して、今日1日の余韻に浸りまくりながら帰宅しました。

はぁ…最高に楽しかった
en:
2019.8.17  
SUMMER SONIC 2019  

Thank you to everyone who came to hang out at the RAINBOW STAGE 🌈  

And a big thank you to everyone who watched the livestream on YouTube! I hope you could feel the energy from the venue!  

I’m so happy that we got to perform at Summer Sonic again this year and celebrate our important 20th anniversary together with all of you!  

We wrapped up the day by enjoying the Red Hot Chili Peppers' live performance together as a band, soaking in the afterglow of the day on our way home.  

Ahh... it was so much fun!

2019.8.25
MONSTER baSH 2019

MONSTERcircusのトップバッターを務めさせていただきました🎪✨

初出演のモンバス！最高に最高に最高に楽しかったーーー！！

朝早くから集まってくれたみんな、本当にありがとうございました！

改めてモンバス20周年おめでとうございます！

#モンバス #bandmaid
en:
2019.8.25  
MONSTER baSH 2019  

We had the honor of being the opening act for MONSTERcircus 🎪✨  

It was our first time performing at Monbus, and it was incredibly, incredibly, incredibly funーーー!!  

Thank you so much to everyone who gathered early in the morning!  

Once again, congratulations on the 20th anniversary of Monbus!  

#Monbus #bandmaid

jp:
モンバスの思い出🤩
.
BiSHチッチ、Dizzy Sunfistあやぺた&もあい、カメラマンやまだ
.
大好きなみんなに会えてとっても嬉しかった&楽しかったー💞
.
前乗りでディジーと同じホテルだったからあやぺたの部屋に居座って。笑
夜はチッチとご飯食べに行って。
モンバス前日からがっつり楽しみました☺︎
.
ディジーとは明日の大ナナイトでも一緒！！
.
バックドロップシンデレラとDizzy SunfistとBAND-MAIDの3マン！わくわく✌️✨
.
#モンバス #b
en:
Memories from Monbus 🤩  
I was so happy and had so much fun meeting everyone I love, like BiSH's Chitti, Dizzy Sunfist's Ayapeta & Moai, and photographer Yamada 💞  
Since we were staying at the same hotel as Dizzy, I crashed Ayapeta's room. LOL  
We went out for dinner with Chitti at night. I had a blast from the day before Monbus! ☺︎  
We'll be together with Dizzy again at the big Nanaito tomorrow!!  
A three-way collaboration with Backdrop Cinderella, Dizzy Sunfist, and BAND-MAID! So excited ✌️✨  
#Monbus #b

jp: #bandmaid #wdbm #worlddomination #大ナナイト

2019.8.27
「大ナナイトvol.125」@TSUTAYA O-EAST

ずっと出演したかった大ナナイト！
ずっと対バンしたかったDizzy Sunfist&バックドロップシンデレラ！

心の底から楽しかった…！！
盛り上がりすぎて記憶飛んだ。笑

バクシンとディジーのライブを2階席から観てたのですが、気付いたらステージの袖にいて、ディジーの「Someday」では気付いたらフロアで人の上にいました。笑

ディジーファンのみんな、フロアのみんな、安全に受け止めてくれて仲間に入れ
en:
2019.8.27  
"Da Nana Night vol.125" @ TSUTAYA O-EAST  

I've always wanted to perform at Da Nana Night!  
And I've always wanted to share the stage with Dizzy Sunfist & Backdrop Cinderella!  

I had so much fun from the bottom of my heart...!!  
I got so caught up in the excitement that I lost track of my memories. LOL  

I was watching Bakushin and Dizzy's live performance from the second floor, but before I knew it, I was at the side of the stage, and during Dizzy's "Someday," I found myself on the floor, on top of people. LOL  

To all the Dizzy fans and everyone on the floor, thank you for safely catching me and welcoming me into the group! 💖

jp:
昨日の朝、くるるがお空に旅立ちました。

ありがとうがいっぱいです。

19年間ずっと支えてくれて、笑わせてくれて、癒してくれて、幸せを与えてくれてありがとう。

私の誕生日に産まれてきてくれて、家族になってくれてありがとう。

くるるの事を可愛がってくれたみんな、本当にありがとうございました！とっても嬉しかったです！

いつまでも大好きで大切な家族！

生まれ変わったらまた会おうね♡
en:
Yesterday morning, Kururu embarked on a journey to the sky. 

Thank you for everything. 

For 19 years, you supported me, made me laugh, healed me, and brought me happiness. Thank you for being born on my birthday and becoming part of my family. 

To everyone who loved Kururu, thank you so much! I was truly happy! 

You will always be my beloved and precious family! 

Let’s meet again when we’re reborn ♡

en:
I was able to go out for a meal with Su-chan 🥺 I’m so happy 🥺🥺🥺

en:
The US tour and the back-to-back shows in Satsumanian Hess have come to an end today! Here’s a shot from the end of the tour.  
Next up, let’s meet again on the #DynamicTour and #Evolution.  
#bandmaid #wdbm #worlddomination #satsumanian #サツマニアンヘス

jp:
サツマニアンヘスにて
ベーシストの大先輩
根岸考旨さんとのショット
久々の再会で、とても嬉しかった！！ 実は出逢ってもう10年近く経つのでは？

ベーシストとしてではなく、母繋がりで最初は会ってた。笑

今こうして同じフェスに出られて、感動…
これからもよろしくお願いします。
en:
At Satsuma Nianhes, I had a shot with my senior bassist, Takashi Negishi! It was so nice to reunite after a long time!! Can you believe it’s been almost 10 years since we first met?

We actually met through our mothers, not as bassists. 😂

It’s so moving to be able to perform at the same festival like this… Looking forward to more in the future!

WUCA TOKYOオープン&くぼちゃんバースデーのWパーティー！

当時eggmanで毎月のペースで対バンしていた仲間達が久しぶりに集結して、同窓会みたいで楽しかった💞

en:
Congratulations on the opening of WUCA TOKYO! 🎉✨ 

And our beloved Kubo-chan!! Happy Birthday! 🎂 

It's a double celebration with the opening of WUCA TOKYO and Kubo-chan's birthday party! 

It was so much fun to reunite with friends we used to battle with every month at eggman; it felt like a school reunion! 💞 

We'll be counting on eggman and WUCA TOKYO for a lot more in the future, so thank you in advance! ☺︎ 

#wucatokyo #ウカトーキョー #渋谷売店 #eggm

jp:
﻿
YELLO FITTING SALON に行ってきました🥺とても癒される空間で素敵でした🥺🥺🥺﻿
﻿
﻿
普段からハイヒールは @yelloshoes_official のをガシガシ愛用してるので気分高まり🥺この日をワクワク待ってた💕💕💕💕💕﻿
﻿
﻿
衣装で履いているピンヒールの子は @yelloshoes_official の子です﻿
いつもの2時間のお給仕でも脚が疲れないし痛くならないんだよ﻿
ピンヒールなのにだよ﻿
ジャンプ出来るし走れるし﻿
とて
en:
I went to YELLO FITTING SALON 🥺 It was such a soothing space and absolutely lovely 🥺🥺🥺

I usually wear high heels from @yelloshoes_official, so I was super excited 🥺 I’ve been looking forward to this day 💕💕💕💕💕

The pin heels I wear for our outfits are from @yelloshoes_official too! Even during our usual 2-hour okyuji, my legs don’t get tired or hurt. Can you believe it, even though they’re pin heels? I can jump and run in them! So amazing!

jp:
ツアー初日の横浜では、次の日がMISAの誕生日という事もありアルコール祭りが開催されました🍶🍺🍷🍾笑
.
今年も美味しいお酒たくさん飲んで、気持ち良いベースを弾きまくっておくれ！！！！！
.
私も少しはお酒が飲めるようになりたいです。グラス1杯で爆睡かまします。
.
ノンアルコールなのに、毎回どこへ行っても「酔っ払ってるの？」と心配される事にはもう慣れました。常にハイテンションなだけなので、ご心配なく。
.
photo by MASANORI FUJIKAWA(@masafuji9
en:
On the first day of the tour in Yokohama, we held an alcohol festival since the next day is MISA's birthday! 🍶🍺🍷🍾 LOL  
This year, let's drink lots of delicious drinks and play some amazing bass!  
I want to be able to drink a little too. I end up crashing after just one glass.  
I'm already used to people worrying and asking, "Are you drunk?" every time we go somewhere, even though I'm sober. I'm just always in high spirits, so no need to worry!  
Photo by MASANORI FUJIKAWA (@masafuji9)

jp:
今日は6回目の810歳の誕生日。
昨日のお給仕前にメンバー、スタッフさん達に誕生日祝ってもらったっぽー！！
凄すぎるケーキが出て来て
びっくりしたっぽ✨
最高の日になったっぽ。
ありがとうっぽ。
沢山のご主人様お嬢様にも
おめでとうと祝ってもらい
小鳩、本当に嬉しいっぽ！！
これからもBAND-MAIDの鳩として頑張りますっぽー！！！
en:
Today is my 810th birthday, the 6th time celebrating it!  
It seems like the members and staff surprised me with a birthday celebration before yesterday's okyuji!!  
A super amazing cake came out, and I was totally shocked✨  
It turned out to be the best day ever. Thank you so much!  
I also received congratulations from many Masters and Princesses, and I'm really happy, Kobato!!  
I'll keep doing my best as BAND-MAID's pigeon from now on!!!

jp:
Happy Birthday MIKU🎂🎉

永遠の810歳(6回目)のお誕生日おめでとう〜！！

らぶっぽー🕊💕

#bandmaid #miku #くるっぽー #鳩 #pigeon #smallpigeon

jp:
大好きなゆりちゃん(@qyurip )のプライベートサロンへやっと遊びに行けました💕
.
いただいたお休みを利用してビューンと静岡まで🚗✨
.
お手手のお爪に人生初のジェルネイルをやってもらいました(｀･ω･´)✨
.
綺麗で丁寧で可愛くて感動しました🥺💕
.
ネイルオイルは匂い選ばせて貰えてたので、ジャスミンにしました❣️めっちゃいい❣️
.
今日は　#スカルマニア にてお給仕です！✨みんちょの可愛いお爪みんなに見えるかな〜？💕
.
楽しみましょうね〜💕
.
en:
I finally got to visit my beloved Yuri-chan's (@qyurip) private salon! 💕  
I took advantage of my day off and zoomed over to Shizuoka! 🚗✨  
I got my very first gel nails done on my little hands (｀･ω･´)✨  
I was so moved by how beautiful, meticulous, and cute they turned out! 🥺💕  
I got to choose the scent for the nail oil, and I went with jasmine! ❣️ It smells amazing! ❣️  
Today, I'm serving at #SkullMania! ✨ I wonder if everyone will get to see Mincho's cute nails~? 💕  
Let's have fun together! 💕

en:
The other day, I went to the Shonan Beauty Clinic (@sbcshimbashiginzaskin) with my good friend Tsugumi (@__315run) 💕 #ShonanBeautyClinicShimbashiGinzaBranch! (*´꒳`*)

I got the #UltraLiftDouble and #IonInfusion done (｡´•ㅅ•｡).

Recently, I've been doing various interviews and comment shoots for #CONQUEROR, so I'm really glad I could take care of my skin maintenance (｀･ω･´)キリ✨

I already feel like my face is looking sharper…!! I've heard it’s going to look even sharper soon!

jp:
前に、Silent Sirenのあいなさんと桜木町野毛でせんべろ飲みした時のムービーの一部分。
6軒目にいく手前の様子ですね！
ご機嫌のあいなさん

この日は7軒行ったね！
こんなのはじめて笑！

楽しかった思い出…
途中でゲーセンにUFOキャッチャーしに行きたいってお願いされた（可愛すぎます）ので行って、そしたらリアル焼き鳥レバーのキーホルダーを取ってくれた。
私はリアルウニのキーホルダーを取ってあげました。

また、お願いします笑
対バンしたい。

#silentsiren
en:
Here's a part of the video from when I had a "senbero" drink with Aina from Silent Siren in Sakuragicho Noge. This was just before we headed to our sixth place! Aina was in such a good mood. 

That day, we went to seven places! It was my first time doing something like this, haha!

Such fun memories... At one point, she asked if we could go to a game center to play UFO catchers (so cute!), so we went, and she managed to grab a keychain of a real yakitori liver. I got her a keychain of real uni.

Let's do it again, haha! I want to do a joint performance.

#silentsiren

It was January 15, 2015. There was even a time when we wore checkered outfits!

@ Kanazawa EIGHT HALL  
.

.

jp:
2019.11.17
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】
@新潟NEXS
.
新潟ありがとうございました！！
寒さを吹き飛ばす、熱〜いお給仕でしたっ！！！！
.
NEXSはステージからみんなの顔が見やすいので、変顔した瞬間にお嬢様達と目が合ってしまったよ。笑
.
みんなの楽しそうな顔がいっぱい見れて最高だったなぁ〜ありがとう✌️
.
そして17日は、現場マネージャー堀内くんのお誕生日🎂おめでとう🎉
いつもありがとう〜！！！
en:
2019.11.17  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】  
@Niigata NEXS  
.  
Thank you, Niigata!!  
It was a hot okyuji that blew away the cold!!  
.  
At NEXS, it’s easy to see everyone’s faces from the stage, so I ended up making a funny face and locking eyes with the Princesses. Haha!  
.  
It was amazing to see so many happy faces! Thank you✌️  
.  
And on the 17th, it’s our stage manager Horiuchi-kun’s birthday 🎂 Happy Birthday 🎉  
Thanks for everything!!!

.

ほんとにほんとにほんとにありがとう(´；ω；｀)💕
.
.
今日は取材や収録を1日していた日で、帰る前に記念にみんなで写真撮ってもらいました(｀･ω･´)ﾉ
.

Today was a day filled with interviews and recordings, and before heading home, we took a commemorative photo together (｀･ω･´)ﾉ  
.  
#KobatoIsMissing right now, but at this time, Kobato was still working, so I managed to sneak a shot of her (｀･ω･´)✌️  
Kobato, you're late!

2019.11.23
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】
@旭川CASINO DRIVE
.
初めましての旭川！！みんな暖かく迎え入れてくれて、本当に嬉しかったです！！ありがとうございました！！！！
.
お昼は「すがわら」の梅塩ラーメンを食べ、ライブ後は札幌に移動して「赤れんが」の味噌バターコーンラーメンを食べ、ばっちりラーメンも堪能しました🍜
.
旭川来たら絶対に行くと決めていたジンギスカンバル「マルマサ」は残念ながら行けなかった
en:
2019.11.23  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】  
@Asahikawa CASINO DRIVE  
.  
Nice to meet you, Asahikawa!! I was really happy that everyone welcomed us so warmly!! Thank you so much!!!!  
.  
For lunch, I had the ume-shio ramen from "Sugawara," and after the live show, we moved to Sapporo to enjoy the miso butter corn ramen from "Aka Renga." I definitely indulged in some delicious ramen 🍜  
.  
Unfortunately, I couldn't make it to the Genghis Khan bar "Marumasa," which I had decided I would definitely go to if I came to Asahikawa.

jp:
2019.11.24
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】
@サッポロファクトリーホール
.
北海道2days、旭川も札幌も最高に熱くて濃厚な2日間でした！！ありがとうございました！！！！
.
おまじないタイムでは、かなみがいつもチョコを食べさせてくれます。札幌では紗々をくれました🍫口に入れた瞬間、ひとみさんに激写されました📸
.
.
激動ツアー第二章、あっという間にもう半分まできてしまいました！ツアー後半戦もまだまだ勢いは止まり
en:
2019.11.24  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】  
@ Sapporo Factory Hall  
.  
The two days in Hokkaido, both Asahikawa and Sapporo, were incredibly intense and amazing!! Thank you so much!!!!  
.  
During our magic time, Kanami always feeds me chocolate. In Sapporo, she gave me a Sasa 🍫 The moment it went into my mouth, Hitomi-san captured the moment 📸  
.  
.  
We've already reached the halfway point of the second chapter of the 激動 tour in no time! The momentum for the second half of the tour is still going strong!

jp:
北海道の思い出っぽ。
蟹を食べに食べたCP
旭川はすがわらのラーメンをたべてお給仕したっぽ。
札幌は第二章激動の折り返しお給仕。
最高だったっぽー！！！
2019.11.22-24
en:
It feels like a memory from Hokkaido.  
We ate a ton of crab at CP.  
We had ramen at Sugawara in Asahikawa and did some okyuji.  
Sapporo was the turning point of the intense second chapter of our okyuji.  
It was absolutely amazing!!!  
2019.11.22-24

jp:
シブヤノオト観てくれたみなさま！ありがとうございました📺♪
.
「輪廻」演奏しました。
出演出来て嬉しかった！トークも楽しすぎました！
.
BAND-MAIDは現在ツアー真っ最中です。気になってくれた方は是非お給仕へ！一緒に遊びましょう！
.
たくさんのご主人様,お嬢様と会えるのを楽しみに待ってます！
.
そして！12/11発売の3rd ALBUM「CONQUEROR」もよろしくお願いします💿✨
.
#bandmaid #シブヤノオト #激動 #conqueror
en:
Thank you to everyone who watched Shibuya no Oto! 📺♪  
We performed "Rinne." I was so happy to be a part of it! The talk segment was so much fun!  
BAND-MAID is currently in the middle of our tour. If you're interested, please come to our okyuji! Let's have some fun together!  
I’m looking forward to meeting lots of Masters and Princesses!  
And! Please look forward to our 3rd ALBUM "CONQUEROR," releasing on 12/11! 💿✨  
#bandmaid #シブヤノオト #激動 #conqueror

jp:
BAND-MAID's 3rd album "CONQUEROR", the music video for "Blooming" goes live!

BAND-MAID / Blooming
https://youtu.be/uUt_JBMocKM "CONQUEROR"Digital release
https://maid.lnk.to/conqueror

今日はおはようございますの時間に💕
.
NHK Eテレ「シャキーン！サウンドファイターズ」に登場させていただきました✨✨
.
人間椅子の和嶋さんと対戦させていただきました(*´꒳`*)
.
和嶋さんは、ギタープレイが最高で憧れでカッコよくて…そしてとてもお優しい方で…大好きです……(｀･ω･´)ﾉ💕
.
二回戦もお楽しみに…！！！✨
.
そして、アルバム　CONQUERORから、BloomingのMVが公開されました✨✨
.
お給仕でも既に盛り上がる曲となっています✨
.
en:
Good morning, everyone! 💕  
Today, we appeared on NHK E-Tele's "Shakiin! Sound Fighters"! ✨✨  
I had a match against Kazushima from the band Ningen Isu (*´꒳`*)  
Kazushima's guitar playing is amazing, and he's so cool and kind... I really admire him... (｀･ω･´)ﾉ💕  
Look forward to the second round...!!! ✨  
Also, the music video for "Blooming" from our album CONQUEROR has been released! ✨✨  
It's already a hit during our okyuji! ✨

.
驚き&久しぶりに会えた嬉しさ&感動で感情が大爆発！！！らぶ✌️💞
.
LiSAちゃん、16th SiNGLE「unlasting」発売おめでとうございます㊗️🎉私もさっそく聴きまくってます！！！最高！！！
.
タワーレコード渋谷店様の1F&3Fでの大展開、入り口の看板、入り口の大画面
、BAND-MAIDだらけでとっても嬉しいで
en:
At Tower Records Shibuya, guess what...!!!! 

I happened to run into LiSA-chan while she was on her #unlasting footprint tour👣!!! I’m so happy and surprised to see her again after such a long time, my emotions are exploding!!! Love✌️💞 

Congratulations on the release of your 16th single "unlasting," LiSA-chan! 🎉 I’ve already been listening to it non-stop!!! It’s amazing!!! 

The huge displays on the 1st and 3rd floors of Tower Records Shibuya, the entrance sign, and the big screen at the entrance are all filled with BAND-MAID, and it makes me so happy!

BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@長野CLUB JUNKBOX

12月14日に誕生日を迎え、レベルアップした一発目のお給仕！！

去年の誕生日も長野でお祝いしてもらったね！
今年もみんなにお祝いしてもらえて嬉しかったよ✨

今年も会場リハの後、メンバーとBAND-MAIDチームの皆様からのサプライズ🎂

BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@ Nagano CLUB JUNKBOX

I can't even count how many times I said "amazing." Probably around 20 times in a row. LOL

2019.12.22
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@京都KBSホール

年内ラストお給仕の京都！ありがとうございましたー！

京都お給仕という事で。BAND-MAID公式ライバルである、BAND-MAIKOさんの曲をコピーさせてもらいました！

すっっっごい楽しかった！笑
紅月さんのようにドラム叩けてたかな…？

2019年"激動"の年の締めくくりにふさわしい最高のお給仕だったなぁ！お給仕って本当に本当に楽しい！！

来
en:
2019.12.22  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@ Kyoto KBS Hall  

Thank you for an amazing last okyuji of the year in Kyoto!  

Since it was an okyuji in Kyoto, we got to cover a song by our official rivals, BAND-MAIKO!  

It was soooo much fun! 😂  
I wonder if I was able to play the drums like Akatsuki-san...?!  

It was the perfect way to wrap up the "激動" year of 2019! Okyuji is truly, truly fun!!  

See you!

en:
Ah-chan @akane_bandmaid Thank you for taking such cute photos of Sai-chan's outfits again this year (and I'm grateful that you even suggest poses)! 

I've even had Masters and Princesses tell me, "You have beautiful legs," and that's all thanks to Ah-chan 🤤💕 

By the way, both our managers are also really good at taking photos! They have a great eye for angles and they praise me while shooting (maybe that's why I thrive on compliments)! 

Looking forward to next year too!

jp:
先日京都お給仕の次の日
小鳩は残って
大好きなお茶屋さん
皐盧庵茶舗へ行って来たっぽ。
いつも優しく温かい雰囲気で
心がホッとする場所。
美味しい時間を
ありがとうございましたっぽ。
お抹茶好きには堪らない濃茶も薄茶も飲めて、玉露や、焙じ茶も絶品っぽ。

This is my favorite spots po.
There are many kinds of tea in this spot po.
Try going there when you come to Japan p
en:
The day after our okyuji in Kyoto, Kobato stayed behind and went to my favorite tea shop, Sōroan. It's always such a warm and welcoming place that makes my heart feel at ease. Thank you for the delicious time! For matcha lovers, they have both thick and thin matcha that are to die for, and their gyokuro and hojicha are absolutely exquisite too!

This is my favorite spot! There are many kinds of tea here. Make sure to check it out when you come to Japan! 😊 #お給仕 #京都 #お茶 #Kobato

jp:
昨日SILENT SIRENのゆかちゃんと遊んだ〜🎹💖
.
アニメ好き同士、盛り上がり過ぎて気付いたら7時間経ってました。笑
.
本当に本当に楽しかったー！！！ゆかちゃんも相当なオタクで最高😂❤️✨
.
お洒落なお土産も貰った🎁
蝶々がついてる紅茶！嬉しい🥺ありがとう🥺💘
.
今度2人で、ずっと行きたかった富士急ハイランドのEVANGELION: WORLD行くんだ✌️
en:
I hung out with Yuka-chan from SILENT SIREN yesterday〜🎹💖  
We both love anime, and we got so carried away that before we knew it, 7 hours had passed. LOL  
It was really, really fun!!! Yuka-chan is quite the otaku too, she's the best😂❤️✨  
I also got a stylish souvenir🎁  
Tea with a butterfly attached! So happy🥺 Thank you🥺💘  
Next time, just the two of us, we're going to EVANGELION: WORLD at Fuji-Q Highland, which I've always wanted to visit✌️

#bandmaid #worlddomination #wdbm #激動 #進化 #CONQUEROR

TOUR MUFFLER TOWEL
#bandmaid #worlddomination #wdbm #激動 #進化 #CONQUEROR

ご主人様、お嬢様明けましておめでとうございます✨✨
久しぶりの投稿になってしまいました🥺
.
年末年始みなさん如何お過ごしでしたか？💕
.
私は年末年始は実家に帰り、休日返上して今後の活動に向けて色々しておりました(｀･ω･´)✨
.
でも、久しぶりに毎日母の手料理を食べる事が出来て幸せな日々でした🥺💕(実家サイコー💕)
.
そんな今日はですね。白楽という場所で用事があったので、「#珈琲文明 」でちょっと一息ついてきちゃいました(*´꒳`*)ふふふ
.
静かで落ち着いた雰囲
en:
Happy New Year, Masters and Princesses! ✨✨  
It's been a while since my last post. 🥺  
.  
How did everyone spend the New Year holidays? 💕  
.  
I went back to my family home for the holidays and spent my time preparing for future activities, even giving up some days off! (｀･ω･´)✨  
.  
But I was so happy to enjoy my mom's home-cooked meals every day after such a long time. 🥺💕 (Home is the best! 💕)  
.  
Today, I had some errands to run in Hakuraku, so I took a little break at "#CoffeeBunmei." (*´꒳`*) Hehe.  
.  
It was a quiet and relaxing atmosphere...

2020.1.11
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@神戸Harbor Studio

私の地元、神戸でのお給仕！
今年も来れて本当に嬉しかった♡

「おかえり」って暖かく迎えてくれるみんなが大好きだーーーー！！！！

また絶対に帰ってくるからね！！

小鳩のアンプの上に飾ってるサメ達をひっくり返してる決定的瞬間を撮られていました。

テックのもっちゃん、ガン見しとるやん。

en:
2020.1.11  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@ Kobe Harbor Studio  

I had an okyuji in my hometown, Kobe!  
I was really happy to be back this year ♡  

I love everyone who warmly welcomes me back with a "Welcome home!"ーーーー！！！！  

I’ll definitely come back again!!  

I got caught in the act of flipping over the sharks that are displayed on Kobato's amp.  

Mocchan from the tech team is totally staring at me.  

Since Mocchan is also from Kobe, we got to come back together!

jp:
眼鏡の度数をそろそろ調整しないとだし。脳の片隅では新しいのも欲しくなってる。﻿
眼鏡の予備が無いのが心配になってきてるのもある。﻿
﻿
﻿
ここは気合いでクロムハーツにしようか…でもでも気になってるヴィンテージのものにするのか…悩みどころ…﻿
﻿
こうやって好きなものにわくわくしながら悩んでるのって楽しい…幸せな事だ…﻿
﻿
﻿
﻿
あ！そだ﻿
ツアーファイナルのミーティングをしたのよ。あのね。すんごいよ。すんごい﻿
セットリストのミーティングもしたけど。﻿
楽しみで楽しみで
en:
I really need to adjust my glasses prescription soon. In the back of my mind, I'm also wanting a new pair. I'm starting to worry that I don't have a backup pair. 

Should I go all out and get Chrome Hearts... or should I go for that vintage pair I've been eyeing... It's a tough decision...

It's so much fun to be excited and think about things I love like this... it's such a happy thing...

Oh! By the way, we had a meeting for the tour finale. And let me tell you, it’s going to be amazing. We also discussed the setlist. I can’t wait!

EMBROIDERED MA-1
#bandmaid #newmerch #wdbm #worlddomination #進化 #CONQUEROR #embroidery #embroidered #ma1

先日、激動ラストの地元
熊本お給仕を終えましたっぽ。
長く濃くて早いお給仕でしたっぽ。
激動ツアーは毎回いままでにないくらい
セットリストを変えたり
いろいろ挑戦的なお給仕でしたっぽ。
いやー、熊本お給仕は、、びっくりしたっぽ。
小鳩、本当に知らなくて、
本当にくだけたっぽ。笑
水浴びしたのかと思うくらい
終わった後、汗だくで笑ったっぽー。
最高の熊本お給仕だったっぽ。
そして、熊本のご主人様お嬢様の
優しさが伝わってきて感動したっぽ。
こんなに激しい熊本お給仕は初めてだったっ
en: The other day, we wrapped up our intense local okyuji in Kumamoto. It was a long, deep, and fast-paced okyuji. The World Domination tour has been a real challenge, with us changing the setlist more than ever before and trying out all sorts of new things. Wow, Kumamoto's okyuji really surprised me! Kobato had no idea and was totally relaxed. 😂 I was sweating so much after the show, I felt like I had just taken a bath! It was the best Kumamoto okyuji ever. And I was really touched by the kindness of the Masters and Princesses in Kumamoto. This was my first time experiencing such an intense okyuji there!

jp:
EMBROIDERED MA-1
#bandmaid #newmerch #wdbm #worlddomination #進化 #CONQUEROR #embroidery #embroidered #ma1

﻿
#ootd﻿
#bandmaid﻿
#saiki﻿
﻿

こんばんは！
.
最近、ピックアップをPRSの59/09のカバーが付いてるものに交換しましたよ💕(鹿児島のお給仕から使っています！)
.
テックの大ちゃん(@daisuke_kondo )に交換してもらいました！いつもありがとうございます(*´꒳`*)💕
.
.
.
替えてみた感想はですね…
.
今まではアンサンブルの中で少し抜け辛いところがあり、他に使っているギターとの差が結構気になっていたんです🤔
.
替えてみたところ、ロー感は保ちつつミッドハイがジャキっとして、アンサン
en:
Good evening!  
.  
Recently, I swapped out my pickups for ones with PRS's 59/09 covers 💕 (I've been using them since my okyuji in Kagoshima!)  
.  
Dai-chan from tech (@daisuke_kondo) helped me with the swap! Thank you as always (*´꒳`*)💕  
.  
.  
.  
As for my impressions after the change...  
.  
Before, there were some parts in the ensemble that felt a bit lacking, and I was quite concerned about the differences compared to my other guitars 🤔  
.  
After the swap, while maintaining the low-end, the mid-highs have a nice sharpness, and the ensemble...

2020.1.18
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@鹿児島CAPARVO HALL

サツマニアンヘス以来の鹿児島！ありがとうございました！

やっと鹿児島でワンマンお給仕する事が出来たよー✨嬉しかった！！

またお給仕しに行くからねー！！

お給仕が楽し過ぎて興奮冷めやらず、終演後の楽屋ではナンジャモンジャゲームで大盛り上がり！
ホテル戻ってからはUNOやった。笑

カードゲームとボードゲームが最近のマイブームなので、ナ
en:
2020.1.18  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@ Kagoshima CAPARVO HALL  

Thank you, Kagoshima! It’s been a while since we were here for Satsumanian Hess!  

I’m so happy we finally got to do a one-man okyuji in Kagoshima! ✨  

I’ll definitely come back to serve you again!!  

I was so excited from the okyuji that I couldn’t calm down, and after the show, we had a blast playing Nanjamonja in the dressing room!  
When we got back to the hotel, we played UNO. LOL  

Card games and board games have been my recent obsession, so...

2020.1.19
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@熊本B.9 V1

激動ツアー第二章、ラストは小鳩の地元熊本🕊

ラストにふさわしい灼熱のお給仕で、無事に【激動】ツアー完走しましたぁあぁあぁあ！！

小鳩の熊本愛が強いサプライズ嵐でしたね！私達もびっくりよ！

自由に楽しくみんなと遊べてとっても楽しかったです☺︎

【激動】ツアー、本当にありがとうございました！

激動ツアーでは、技術面も精神面も体力面もかなり鍛え
en:
2020.1.19  
BAND-MAID WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 2019-2020【激動】@ Kumamoto B.9 V1  

The second chapter of the 激動 tour ends in Kobato's hometown, Kumamoto 🕊  

With a scorching okyuji fitting for the finale, we successfully completed the 【激動】 tour!!  

It was a surprise storm fueled by Kobato's strong love for Kumamoto! We were all taken aback!  

It was so much fun to freely and joyfully play with everyone ☺︎  

Thank you so much for the 【激動】 tour!  

During the 激動 tour, we really trained hard in terms of technique, mental strength, and physical endurance...

見てくださったご主人様お嬢様
ありがとうございましたっぽ。
たのしすぎておいしすぎる
熊本ロケでしたっぽ。
ふわっふわとろけるパンケーキに始まり、素敵なお二人とキラキラなお写真をとっていただき、最高のお肉を喰らい、もちもちふわふわ感動する食パンでしめたっぽ。。
たまらんっぽ。の顔
しっかりカメラに
とられてましたっぽ。笑
やっぱり地元大好きっぽ。🕊
食パン、メンバーにお土産で
買って帰ったっぽ。
#熊本　#KKT
#Brunch&CafeMILK
#ブランチカ
en:
#SaturdayCoco  
Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses who watched!  
It was such a fun and delicious shoot in Kumamoto!  
We started with fluffy, melt-in-your-mouth pancakes, took some sparkling photos with the wonderful duo, devoured the best meat, and wrapped it all up with some incredibly chewy and fluffy bread... I just can't get enough! 😍  
I was definitely caught on camera! 😂  
I really do love my hometown! 🕊  
I brought back some bread as souvenirs for the members.  
#Kumamoto #KKT  
#Brunch&CafeMILK  
#Brunch

jp:
少し前になりますが、小鳩とお仕事の合間にカフェランチしてきました💕
.
この日は渋谷にある
「DOUBLE TALL CAFE 」へ✨
.
渋谷の明治通り沿いから路地を入ったところにある隠れ家っぽいカフェでした♫
.
二階の席で食事をしたんですが、席が広々としていてミーティングにも良さそうな雰囲気〜✨
.
珈琲はバンドドリップで入れて貰えて、ブレンドだけでなくシングルオリジンもありました♫(私はだいたいどこでもシングルオリジナルを注文します！)
.
この日ランチのメニューは5種類く
en:
A little while ago, Kobato and I had a café lunch in between work💕  
.  
We went to "DOUBLE TALL CAFE" in Shibuya✨  
.  
It was a hidden gem tucked away in an alley off Meiji Street in Shibuya♫  
.  
We had our meal on the second floor, and the spacious seating had a nice vibe that seemed perfect for meetings~✨  
.  
They brewed coffee using a band drip method, and they had not only blends but also single origins available♫ (I usually order single origin wherever I go!)  
.  
That day's lunch menu had 5 different options!

jp:
×OLDX LS-T
#bandmaid #newmerch #wdbm #worlddomination #進化 #CONQUEROR #oldx #SAIKI

ゲネプロ3日目無事終了！
濃厚な3日間だったなー🔥

何度もセトリ変更を繰り返し、ようやく全員が納得する最強のセトリが仕上がったぞー！！

【進化】2days、期待しててね！

そして日付け変わって本日！
我等のボーカルSAIKIの誕生日🎂

ゲネの休憩時間に1日早めのサプライズ！
ケーキと巨大クラッカーを用意して、BAND-MAIDチームみんなでお祝いしました🎉

さいちゃんおめでとう！！

「新しい言葉覚えた！」と、誕生日直前のさいちゃんからLINEで送られてきた言
en:
The third day of the dress rehearsal has successfully concluded! It was an intense three days! 🔥

We went through multiple setlist changes, and finally, we've crafted the ultimate setlist that everyone is satisfied with!!

Get ready for 【Evolution】 2 days!

And now that the date has changed, today is our vocalist SAIKI's birthday! 🎂

During a break in the rehearsal, we pulled off an early surprise! We prepared a cake and a giant cracker, and the whole BAND-MAID team celebrated together! 🎉

Happy birthday, Sai-chan!!

Just before her birthday, I received a LINE message from Sai-chan saying, "I learned a new word!"

jp:
MVを公開してから、Bloomingのギターソロをコピーしたいと言ってくれる方が多くて大変嬉しいです！！(*´꒳`*)💕
.
タッピングソロをゆっくり弾いたので是非ご参考に〜♪
.
私はピックを持ってタッピングすることが多いので中指で叩いてます〜❣️
.
.
あと今日は彩姫Tシャツ着てました💕さいちゃんかっこいい💕
.
そして今！2/8になりました✨✨
.
今日は〜✨さいちゃんの誕生日です！パチパチパチパチ〜💕
.
さいちゃんお誕生日おめでとう🎉🎂
.
.
I
en:
Since we released the MV, I've been so happy to hear that many of you want to copy the guitar solo from "Blooming"! (*´꒳`*)💕  
I played the tapping solo slowly, so please use it as a reference~♪  
I usually tap with my middle finger while holding the pick~❣️  
Also, today I was wearing my Sai-chan T-shirt💕 Sai-chan looks so cool💕  
And now! It's officially February 8th✨✨  
Today is~✨ Sai-chan's birthday! Clap clap clap clap~💕  
Happy birthday, Sai-chan! 🎉🎂

WORLD DOMINATION TOUR
【宣告】【侵略】【激動】【進化】

2年という長い期間の濃すぎたWDツアー、無事全閉幕！！本当にありがとうございました！

WDツアーでは、心身ともに鍛えられて成長させてもらえました。

夏からはZepp tourが始まり、
ついに日本武道館のステージへ。

夢と目標に向かって、一歩一歩着実に進んでいます。有言実行！

BAND-MAIDの進化は止まりません。
世界征服！！！！！

#bandmaid #zepptour #武道館
en:
WORLD DOMINATION TOUR  
【Announcement】【Invasion】【Turmoil】【Evolution】  

The intense and long 2-year WD tour has successfully come to a close!! Thank you so much!  

During the WD tour, I was able to grow and strengthen both mentally and physically.  

Starting this summer, the Zepp tour will kick off, and we’ll finally take the stage at Nippon Budokan.  

Step by step, we’re steadily moving toward our dreams and goals. Actions speak louder than words!  

BAND-MAID’s evolution won’t stop.  
World Domination!!!!!!!  

#bandmaid #zepptour #武道館

jp:
STOF/STORAMA×SUZUKI TAKAO(UNISON SQUARE GARDEN)コラボ服展示会にお邪魔しました♪
.
貴雄さんの遊び心とこだわりが詰まったお洋服達。一つ一つに物語があり、とっっっても素敵でした！！
.
写真で着させてもらったフーディーと、ケーブルセーターをオーダーしました！早く着たいなぁ〜楽しみ！
.
.
YouTubeにもアップされている、ミシンの音とドラムのセッションも素晴らしすぎて何度もPV観て感動している…！！！
.
貴雄さんの発想は本当に凄い。音楽
en:
I had the pleasure of visiting the STOF/STORAMA x SUZUKI TAKAO (UNISON SQUARE GARDEN) collaboration clothing exhibition! ♪  
The clothes are filled with Takao's playful spirit and attention to detail. Each piece has its own story, and they were all absolutely wonderful!!  
I ordered the hoodie and cable-knit sweater that I got to try on in the photos! I can't wait to wear them—so excited!  
Also, the sound of the sewing machine and the drum session that’s been uploaded on YouTube is just amazing. I've watched the PV multiple times and I'm so moved...!!!  
Takao's creativity is truly incredible. Music 🎶

jp:
【BAND-MAIDのAIR KNOT FEST】
KNOT FEST延期に伴い、
3/20(金)19時～都内某所からBAND-MAID緊急生配信決定⚡️
緊急配信につきスマートフォンでの撮影配信となりますが、当日演奏予定だった楽曲を披露予定！
世界中の方々に楽しんで頂けるよう全力でPLAYさせていただきます🔥

Since KNOT FEST got postponed, BAND-MAID will be holding a live broadcast from 7 pm on Fri
en:
【BAND-MAID's AIR KNOT FEST】  
Due to the postponement of KNOT FEST, we have decided to hold an emergency live broadcast from a certain location in Tokyo on March 20th (Friday) at 7 PM ⚡️  
Since this is an emergency broadcast, we will be filming with a smartphone, but we plan to perform the songs that were scheduled for that day!  
We will give it our all to ensure everyone around the world can enjoy it 🔥

jp:
「眼鏡どこのですか？」って聞いてもらったんで、答えてあげます。﻿
ええ。そうなんです。優しいです﻿
﻿
﻿
眼鏡は @chromeheartsofficial の BLUEBERRY MUFFIN っていう可愛いお名前が付いているやつです﻿
﻿
﻿
この眼鏡はかれこれ3〜4年使っていたらしいです。この前、レンズを新しくする時にお店に持っていったら知って、ビックリしたね。﻿
﻿
時が経つのは早いね！﻿
﻿
﻿
そして新しく手に入れた眼鏡もあるので﻿
また載せる﻿
﻿
﻿
en:
Someone asked me, "Where are your glasses from?" so I’ll answer!  
Yes, that’s right. How kind of you! 😊  

The glasses are from @chromeheartsofficial and they have the cute name BLUEBERRY MUFFIN.  

It seems I've been using these glasses for about 3 to 4 years now. The other day, when I took them to the shop to get new lenses, they were surprised to see how long I’ve had them!  

Time really flies, doesn’t it?  

And I also got a new pair of glasses, so I’ll share that soon too! 👓✨

jp:
小鳩がよく作るお気に入り🕊
・ホットミルク＋ティー＋
マヌカハニーor蜂蜜っぽ。
まろやかな甘さ控えめロイヤルミルクティーっぽ。
ティーのお気に入りは #harneyandsons か　#TWG
・定期的に作るデトックススープ
人参大根玉ねぎセロリキャベツ鶏肉トマト缶コンソメパセリ少々をお鍋にどーん！煮込んで卵も最後にグツグツして完成っぽ。野菜いっぱいで食物繊維もしっかり取れて、ぽかぽかするし、おいしくてこれだけでお腹もいっぱいになるから定期的に作ってるんだっぽ。
en:
Kobato's favorite things to make 🕊  
- Hot milk + tea + Manuka honey or honey-like sweetness. It’s like a mellow, lightly sweet royal milk tea. My favorite teas are #harneyandsons or #TWG.  
- I regularly make detox soup! Just throw in carrots, daikon, onions, celery, cabbage, chicken, canned tomatoes, a bit of consomme, and parsley into a pot! Simmer it all together, and at the end, let it bubble with some eggs for the finishing touch. It’s packed with veggies, rich in fiber, warms you up, tastes great, and fills you up, so I make it regularly!

jp:
この度、EVANSドラムヘッドファミリーの仲間入りさせていただきました！

EVANSは長年愛用していたドラムヘッドなので本当に嬉しいです。光栄です。

キョーリツコーポレーションさんにお邪魔して、試したいヘッドなど色々と相談させていただきました。

EVANSマスコットキャラクターのバーニービーツ、メタルバーニービーツ、EVANSどくろちゃん、みんなとっても可愛いね〜♡

気になっていた「UV2」をさっそくスネアに張ってみようと思います。音作りが楽しみ！

カッコ良いサウンドを届けら
en:
I'm excited to announce that I've joined the EVANS drumhead family! 

I've been using EVANS drumheads for many years, so this truly makes me happy. It's an honor. 

I visited Kyoritsu Corporation and discussed various heads I wanted to try out. 

The EVANS mascot characters, Burnie Beats, Metal Burnie Beats, and Skull-chan, are all so cute! ♡ 

I'm thinking of trying out the "UV2" on my snare right away. I can't wait to create some amazing sounds! 

I'll deliver some cool sounds!

.
.
軽くて小さいのですが、フルスケールなのでツアー先のホテルとかでも練習できるな〜と思っているのです✨
.
.
うう〜。早く一緒にお出掛けしたいよう…(*´꒳`*)
.
.
ちなみに、ボディーはアルダー🎸ネックとフィンガーボードはメイプル🎸
.
.
Kobato was carrying #travelerguitar during the p
en:
Kobato was carrying a #travelerguitar during the intense tour, and I wanted one too, so I got it! (｀･ω･´)ﾉ  
.  
It's lightweight and small, but since it's full scale, I think I can practice at hotels during tours✨  
.  
Ugh~ I can't wait to go out with it... (*´꒳`*)  
.  
By the way, the body is made of alder 🎸, and the neck and fingerboard are maple 🎸.

“WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 【Evolution】 at LINE CUBE SHIBUYA (Shibuya Public Hall)”

Enjoy your okyuji at home! ☺︎

.
.
豚味噌をご飯にかけて食べたり…お豆腐に乗っけたり、おうどんにのっけたり……ふおお( ´∀｀)💕
.
.

.

en:
I received the jam and pork miso I ordered from my best friend's mom's shop, 工房ゆう (@koubouyuu) in Kagoshima! (*´꒳`*) I've been waiting for this~~ 💕  
.  
I can eat the pork miso over rice... or put it on tofu, or even on udon... whoa ( ´∀｀)💕  
.  
You can really taste the deliciousness of the carefully selected ingredients, so I highly recommend it! (｀･ω･´)ﾉ✨✨  
.  
(I ordered some for MISA too, but it seems like it’ll be a while before we can meet, so... I might just eat it all myself! (

#wdbm #worlddomination #conqueror #newmerch

２月に行われたWORLD DOMINATION TOUR 【進化】で演奏した、Play前のセッションを解説します。

まず、最初は五弦の４フレットから始まりまーす。

このソロは、フレット移動はあんまり激しくないよ！

右手が肝となります。

リズムが遅れないように親指で叩くサムピングと引っ張るプルを繰り返してください。

最後が少し難しいので、左手と右手の動きをしっかりリンクさせるように、
是非、みんなもがんばってコピーしてみてね。

#bandmaid #worlddomin
en:
Here's an explanation of the pre-session for the song we performed during the WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 【Evolution】 in February.

First, we start from the 4th fret of the 5th string.

This solo doesn't involve too much movement between frets!

The right hand is key here.

Make sure to keep the rhythm steady by alternating between thumb slapping and pulling with your fingers.

The ending is a bit tricky, so be sure to link the movements of your left and right hands well. 
I hope everyone gives it a try and copies it!

#bandmaid #worlddomin

jp:
お次はDOMINATION途中のソロ回しの解説。

最初のこのフレーズは、少し跳ね気味でスラップします。

一発目の５弦の４フレットを親指で叩く高速サムピング。ここが結構速いので力を抜いて、弾いてね。

スラップの後はすぐにピックに持ち変えて！（持ち変えるの頑張って練習してください。笑）

持ち変えたら、ハイフレット２弦の11フレット13フレットへ行きます。

ここから最後まで所々弦飛びもあるので、結構難しいの…ココが頑張りどころです。

そして
en:
Next up is an explanation of the solo section in DOMINATION.

The initial phrase has a bit of a bouncy feel, so slap it out! 

For the first note, use your thumb to hit the 4th fret on the 5th string with some fast thumb picking. This part is quite quick, so relax your hand and play it smoothly.

Right after the slap, switch to using a pick! (Make sure to practice that switch, okay? Haha!)

Once you've switched, move to the 11th and 13th frets on the 2nd string in the higher frets.

From here to the end, there will be some string skips, making it pretty challenging... This is where you really need to put in the effort! 

And...

en:
May 10th #MaidDay  
During the #OnlineMeidoNoHi, we did a video explanation of BAND-MAID MUSIC GUIDANCE 🕊🕊  
♪  
First up, a simple explanation of the "play" connection for the WORLD DOMINATION TOUR 【Evolution】 version 🕊  
♪  
Tune it down a half step 🕊  
♪  
Slide from the 5th fret on the 5th string to the 7th fret.  
For the second time, slide to the 10th fret.  
↓  
Then, slide down from the 12th fret to the 10th fret for a nice glissando.

May 10th #Maid Day  
During the #OnlineMeidoNoHi, we held  
BAND-MAID MUSIC GUIDANCE  
Here's a video explanation 🕊  

This is an explanation of the solo section in the song "DOMINATION" 🕊  

There's not much to explain, but...  
Anyway, your right arm will feel like it's going to fly away 🕊 because it's quite tough, and you'll end up with some serious muscles, Kobato-style!  
♪  
Since it's fast, make sure to synchronize the timing of your right and left hands!  
Once you nail this, you'll feel a sense of accomplishment!

.
音はLINEに繋いで#amplitube で歪ませております！
.
いつも使っているPRSに比べてスケールは長く、ネックは太い印象です！弾き心地は、とても弾きやすいです〜(｀･ω･´)ﾉ
今は10-46の弦を張っていますが、これより太めに変えようと思っています！
.
サウンドは小さいボディからは想像出来ないパワフルさがありますよ〜♪
.
なにより一番は、
en:
Since I received a lot of questions about the Traveler guitar I posted before, I decided to give it a try! (*´꒳`*)

I'm connecting the sound to LINE and distorting it with #amplitube!

Compared to my usual PRS, the scale is longer and the neck feels thicker! It's really easy to play~ (｀･ω･´)ﾉ Right now, I'm using 10-46 strings, but I'm thinking of switching to thicker ones!

The sound has a powerfulness that you wouldn't expect from such a small body~♪

But above all, the best part is...

オンラインお給仕、最高に楽しかったです！！

観てくれた世界中のご主人様,お嬢様！ありがとうございました！！

配信中に沢山コメントをくれたおかげで、みんなと一緒に会場でお給仕している気持ちになりました。

BAND-MAIDチームにも5ヶ月ぶりに会えて嬉しかった！心強かったです。

ご主人様,お嬢様、BAND-MAIDチームのみなさん、映像チームのみなさん、会場スタッフのみなさん、お給仕をさせてくれて本当にありがとうございました！

早くみんなの顔を直接見なか
en:
The online okyuji was so much fun!!

Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses around the world who tuned in!!

Thanks to all the comments during the stream, I felt like I was serving you all in the venue together.

I was really happy to see the BAND-MAID team after 5 months! It felt so reassuring.

Thank you so much to the Masters, Princesses, everyone on the BAND-MAID team, the video team, and the venue staff for allowing me to serve you!

I can't wait to see everyone's faces in person soon!

﻿
﻿
「しゃいしゃん、しょれいい！」って急に滑舌悪くなって「さ行」全滅しちゃって、大爆笑したという一コマを最後の写真で共有します。﻿

#ootd﻿

en:
I love simple outfits, but sometimes I just want to wear something flashy too! 

Oh, by the way. 

Yesterday, while A-chan @akane_bandmaid was taking pictures, I was supposed to say, "Sai-chan, that looks great!" but suddenly my pronunciation went all wrong, and I ended up saying, "Shai-shan, shore ii!" I completely butchered the "sa" sounds, and we all burst out laughing! I’m sharing that moment in the last photo. 

Thanks for always taking such great pics, A-chan! I really appreciate it! 

#ootd  
#bandmaid  
#saiki

Here’s what we looked like after yesterday's online okyuji. 

Everyone's hair color looks amazingーーー👍 

For the first day, I got my hair dyed really dark, almost black, and over the course of a week, it was designed to gradually reveal the color just in time for the online okyuji. It turned out exactly as planned!! 

@watai_yuu, you’re incredible👏 

And @kobatomiku, those arm muscles are impressive too👏

jp:
機材のメンテナンスDAY🥁

母校であるTSM渋谷校の近くだったので、帰り道に学校の前通ったら先生方を発見🏫👨‍🏫

CIVILIANの有田先輩(@drumcivilian )にも会えて、私は @room.13_official のTシャツを着てたからBLUE ENCOUNTの江口先輩(@bluengt)もいるって事にして(無理矢理w)、卒業生集合！！！！

懐かしかったなぁ〜。
一番の思い出は海外研修。

海外研修でアメリカへ行ってシトラスカレッジで沢山学び、人生初のレコーディ
en:
Maintenance Day for the equipment! 🥁

Since I was near my alma mater, TSM Shibuya, I passed by the school on my way home and spotted some teachers! 🏫👨‍🏫

I also ran into my senior, Arita from CIVILIAN (@drumcivilian), and since I was wearing a T-shirt from @room.13_official, I decided to pretend that my other senior, Eguchi from BLUE ENCOUNT (@bluengt), was there too (forcing it, lol). Alumni gathering!!!

It brought back so many memories. The best one was the overseas training.

During the overseas training, I went to America and learned a lot at Citrus College, and it was my first time recording in my life!

先日、2020-21秋冬展示会の時からずっと欲しかったコートとワンピースも代官山の店舗で購入したので、秋と冬に新しいお洋服達を着るのがとっても楽しみ☺︎♪

#junokamoto
en:
I fell in love at first sight with this dress from @junokamoto_dky at last year's spring/summer exhibition and ordered it. 

It's beautiful from every angle! 

I was also drawn to the name given to the outfit, "like melted ice candy." 

Recently, I bought a coat and a dress that I've wanted since the 2020-21 autumn/winter exhibition at the Daikanyama store, so I'm really looking forward to wearing my new outfits this fall and winter! ☺︎♪

Thank you so much, Jun-san!!

#junokamoto

jp:
久しぶりの投稿ですが…今日は珈琲のお話を！✨
.
今まで秘密にしてましたが…本当にいい珈琲屋さんなのでご紹介します！(｀･ω･´)
.
東急東横線の"新丸子"という駅にある SHIBACOFFEE (@shibacoffee )という珈琲屋さん。
.
わたしも知人から美味しいと紹介してもらってからここのお店のファンになりました(*´꒳`*)
.
基本は、SHIBACOFFEEのオンラインショップで豆を購入しているんですが、店頭には珈琲が飲めない @akane_ban
en:
It's been a while since my last post... but today, let's talk about coffee! ✨  
.  
I've kept this a secret until now, but I really want to introduce you to an amazing coffee shop! (｀･ω･´)  
.  
It's called SHIBACOFFEE (@shibacoffee) and it's located at the "Shin-Maruko" station on the Tokyu Toyoko Line.  
.  
I became a fan of this place after a friend recommended it to me for its delicious coffee (*´꒳`*)  
.  
Basically, I usually buy beans from SHIBACOFFEE's online shop, but they also have a physical store where you can enjoy coffee! @akane_ban

jp:
かなり時間が経ってしまいましたが…9月頭に、シャーマンキング展 東京凱旋へ行ってきました。

この日が来るのをずっと楽しみに待っていました。

どうやって言葉にしたら良いのか分からないぐらい感動した。

色々な感情がブワーッと溢れて幸せでたまらなかった。
ずっとこの空間に居たかったです。

数日間ずっと余韻に浸っていました。

葉くんの「なんとかなる」に何度も救われたし、私の心を奮い立たせてくれて背中を押してくれたシャーマンキング。

当時と変わらない気持ちで、これからも楽しみま
en:
It's been quite a while, but... I went to the Shaman King exhibition in Tokyo at the beginning of September.

I had been looking forward to this day for so long.

I was so moved that I didn't even know how to put it into words.

A rush of various emotions overflowed, and I was incredibly happy. I wanted to stay in that space forever.

I soaked in the afterglow for several days.

Leaf-kun's "It'll work out somehow" saved me countless times, and Shaman King inspired and pushed me forward.

With feelings unchanged from back then, I'm looking forward to what’s next!

.  
Woohoo!!  
.  
I'm so thrilled to receive so many congratulatory messages!!

.

Today, just like any other day, I'll be working on production! (｀･ω･´)

But today! Since it's my birthday!

I want to treat myself to sushi and unagi!

自分で選ぶの苦手なので、ゆりちゃんにお勧めをオーダーしたら…
.
全部可愛いいいいい!!!
うわあああああ!!!
.
全部可愛いいいいい!!!
.
私の好きな緑たくさん入ってる!
次の撮影時にどれ使おうか迷っ
en:
I ordered some earrings that match our outfits from my favorite Yuri-chan (@qyurip) at LA.LUM (@la.lum_store) 💕💕  
.  
I haven't worn earrings in years, and I realized my ears had closed up, so this will be my debut with earrings 🥰  
.  
I'm not great at choosing things myself, so I asked Yuri-chan for recommendations...  
.  
Everything is so cute!!!  
Waaah!!!  
.  
Everything is so cute!!!  
.  
There are so many greens that I love!  
I’m torn about which ones to use for our next shoot!

jp:
弾丸神戸帰省。

ずっと行きたかった「PEANUTS Cafe」に行けました。

三宮にあるスヌーピータウンショップにも寄れてスヌーピー三昧☺︎
次こそはPEANUTS HOTELに泊まりたい…！

家族や親戚達と過ごせて息抜きが出来ました。
パワーチャージしてきたので明日からまた制作頑張る！

またね、神戸！

#snoopy #peanuts #peanutscafekobe #peanutshotel #スヌーピー #神戸
en:
Quick trip back to Kobe! 

I finally got to visit the "PEANUTS Cafe" that I've always wanted to go to. 

I also stopped by the Snoopy Town Shop in Sannomiya and had a blast with all things Snoopy ☺︎ Next time, I definitely want to stay at the PEANUTS HOTEL...! 

I was able to relax and spend time with my family and relatives. I've recharged my energy, so I’ll be back to working hard on my projects starting tomorrow! 

See you again, Kobe! 

#snoopy #peanuts #peanutscafekobe #peanutshotel #スヌーピー #神戸

jp:
新しい眼鏡が完成したので迎えに行ってきたよ﻿
﻿
今使ってる眼鏡はレンズがクリアだからこのふたつはカラーレンズにしました﻿
﻿
お世話になったお店のお姉さんに今日も会えて嬉しみだった﻿
一緒にカラー選んでもらったり調整もめっちゃ丁寧にしてもらえて嬉しみです﻿
﻿
﻿
こりゃ、お気にだ。﻿
﻿
(見ていただいた写真達はSNSを更新するためにお姉さんにお願いして写真を撮ってもらったんだけど照れちゃって真顔しか出来なくて結局笑ってしまうという自分の苦手が全面に出た写真達です)﻿
﻿
en:
I went to pick up my new glasses! 

The glasses I'm using now have clear lenses, so I decided to go for colored lenses this time. 

I was really happy to see the shop assistant I’ve been taken care of again today! She helped me choose the colors and was super thorough with the adjustments, which made me really happy. 

These are definitely my favorites! 

(The photos you see were taken by the shop assistant for my social media update, but I got so shy that I could only manage a serious face and ended up smiling anyway, which really shows my struggle in front of the camera!)

ご主人様お嬢様からの
沢山のお誕生日おめでとう
コメントやメッセージ
ありがとうございますっぽ。
懐かしい方や昔からの方
世界中の方々から
おめでとうと言ってもらえて
本当にうれしい限りですっぽ。

昨日誕生日は
まさかのサプライズで
お祝いしてもらったっぽ。
小鳩びっくりしすぎて。
思考回路停止したっぽ🕊
感謝と喜びがとまらないっぽ。

これからも小鳩をどうぞ
宜しくっぽ🕊🕊🕊
2020.10.21

#ケーキがZV
#立体ミクッフィー
en:
Thank you so much for all the birthday wishes and messages from our Masters and Princesses! I'm truly grateful to hear from so many familiar faces and friends from all around the world.

Yesterday, on my birthday, I was surprised with a celebration! Kobato was so shocked that my brain just stopped working 🕊 I can't contain my gratitude and joy.

I hope you'll continue to support Kobato from here on out 🕊🕊🕊  
2020.10.21

#CakeIsZV  
#3D Miku-ffy

You all will definitely give me your thoughts, right? Right? 
Come on! 

#bandmaid

jp:
小鳩の髪色について。
About my hair po.

小鳩は最近、
紫色からの明るい赤色の
グラデーションにしたっぽ🕊
毎回メンテしたりする度に
少ーしずつ色が違ったりはするけどっぽね。

毛先に関してはずっと赤色だから
色を抜くことはないけどっぽ。

内側のインナー部分だけ
根本から紫色を入れてるので
伸びてきたらその分
ブリーチして入れてたり、
色の長さを増やしたい時はその分だけ
ブリーチしてもらったりしてるっぽ。

基本
en:
About my hair po.

Recently, I changed my hair from purple to a bright red gradient 🕊 Every time I get it maintained, the color is slightly different, but that's just how it goes.

The tips have always been red, so I don't plan on bleaching them.

For the inner part, I’ve got purple starting from the roots, so when it grows out, I bleach that part and add more color. If I want to increase the length of the color, I just get that part bleached a bit more.

Basically...

jp:
昔初めて自分でいい値段の買い物したfenderのベース。
アメデラ。

たくさん思い出があるな〜
また、いつか分からないけど
大きな音で鳴らす時が来るでしょう。
ぼろぼろだけどステッカーいまだにお気に入り。

#bandmaid #fender #4弦
en:
The first time I bought an expensive item for myself, it was a Fender bass.  
American Deluxe.  

I have so many memories with it~  
I don’t know when, but I’m sure the time will come when I can play it loud again.  
It’s a bit worn out, but I still love the stickers on it.

12/13は配信お給仕が待っていますね!!

楽しみでニンマリです(*´꒳`*)
.
.
リハがない日は、収録や取材などもやっていたり、とても充実した日々を過ごしております！！！
.
.
彩姫先生に配信お給仕で使うための音源を作ったり〜とか、配信ならではのお楽しみいただけることも色々考えておりますので、楽しみにしていただけると嬉しいです💕
.
.
あと今日は収録終わりで楽器屋さんをたくさん回って色んなギターや機材を弾いてきました！！
.
.

en:
On 12/13, we have a streaming okyuji waiting for us!!  
I'm so excited that I can't help but smile (*´꒳`*)  

On days without rehearsals, I've been busy with recordings and interviews, so I'm having very fulfilling days!!!  

I've been working on creating sound sources to use for the streaming okyuji with Sai-chan, and we're also brainstorming various fun things unique to streaming, so I hope you're looking forward to it💕  

Also, today after the recording, I visited a lot of music stores and played various guitars and equipment!!  

I'm ready to take on new challenges one after another!

2020.12.13 オンラインお給仕の会場で起こった、メンバー&BAND-MAIDチームによる誕生日サプライズドッキリ。
完全版は後日「お盟主様の会」で🎥！！
en: On December 13, 2020, a birthday surprise prank by the members and the BAND-MAID team took place at the online okyuji venue. The full version will be available later in the "OMEISYUSAMA-NO-KAI" 🎥!!

jp:
今年の誕生日はサプライズドッキリのオンパレードで、誕生日1週間前からサプライズが始まっていた事にビックリ。

1.鞄の中に大量のキットカット
2.ステージドリンクが強炭酸水
3.ハイハットの裏に大量の茎わかめ(大好物)
4.お給仕後の汗拭くタオルが熱々
5.インスタライブに参加出来ないはずの小鳩が0時になった瞬間に登場

ラストの「小鳩登場」が一番ビックリした。

メンバーとBAND-MAIDチームのみんなの演技が上手すぎて見事に全部ひっかかった。

とっても嬉しいサプライズの嵐。
en:
This year's birthday was a parade of surprise pranks, and I was shocked to find out that the surprises started a week before my birthday!

1. A ton of KitKats in my bag
2. The stage drink was super carbonated water
3. A bunch of seaweed stems hidden behind the hi-hat (my favorite!)
4. The towel to wipe off sweat after the okyuji was piping hot
5. Kobato, who was supposed to be unable to join the Instagram Live, appeared the moment it hit midnight

The last surprise, "Kobato's appearance," was the biggest shock of all.

The members and everyone on the BAND-MAID team acted so well that I totally fell for it all.

It was an overwhelming and delightful surprise! 🎉

皆様に大切な
お知らせになりますっぽ。
皆様の健康を第一に考え、
悔しいですが
このような決断になりました。

まだすぐには会えないけど、
この悔しさをバネに大きくなって
また皆様と向かい会って

お願いいたしますっぽ。
en:
We have an important announcement for everyone.  
Considering everyone’s health as our top priority, we’ve made the difficult decision to take this step.  

Though we can’t meet right away, let’s use this frustration as motivation to grow stronger. Until the day we can face each other again and serve you all.  

Let’s do our best together!  
Thank you for your continued support! 😊

今の私達、これからの私達
私達は私達らしく、

これからも止まることなく！
世界征服に突き進んで行く！！

そんな曲ですっぽ！！

そして！！！
1/13(水)よりUnseen Worldの

Music distribution 
to beg
en:
The music video for "Manners," a song that serves as a bridge connecting the return to our origins and the evolution of our current state in #UnseenWorld, has been released! 🕊

As we are now and as we will be in the future, we will continue to be ourselves, with our own manners.

We won't stop! We will push forward toward World Domination!!

That's the kind of song it is!!

And!!! Starting from 1/13 (Wed), the pre-release of the tracks from Unseen World will begin! 🕊

"Unseen World" music distribution to begin!

jp:

.

.
.
ジャケットの写真はメンバーみんなのお手手ですよ！
どれが誰のだか探して見て欲しいです♫
.

.
.
PHOTOBOOKも素敵ですよ!!
(さいちゃん…しゅてきでした……💕)

en:
Just a little longer until the release of Unseen World...✨

On January 20th, we're having an online listening party~ (*´꒳`*)
.
It'll be on Twitter starting at 9 PM (｀･ω･´)ﾉ
.
.
The jacket photo features all of our hands! 
I hope you try to guess whose is whose♫
.
The limited edition is in a special package that feels like such a wonderful reward, it's amazing💕💕
.
.
The PHOTOBOOK is also stunning!!
(Sai-chan... was so lovely...💕)
.
I really love our members!

jp:
明日いよいよBAND-MAID「Unseen World」が発売しますよおお✨
.
.
まずは先行配信で聴いてくださってるご主人様、お嬢様からたくさんの嬉しいお声を聴けて嬉しさとそして、一安心しております。。(*´꒳`*)
.
.
しかし
やっぱりCDってとてもいいですわね(*´꒳`*)
.
開ける時のドキドキ感
.
歌詞カードのワクワク感
.
特典とかもあるとより楽しくなっちゃいますね!!💕
.
.
.
そして気付いたらメジャーデビューしてから4枚目のアルバムなんです
en:
Tomorrow, BAND-MAID's "Unseen World" will finally be released! ✨  
.  
First of all, I'm so happy to hear all the wonderful feedback from our Masters and Princesses who have been listening to the early release. It brings me so much joy and a sense of relief. (*´꒳`*)  
.  
But you know, there's just something special about CDs, isn't there? (*´꒳`*)  
The thrill of opening it up...  
The excitement of the lyric booklet...  
And when there are bonus items, it makes it even more fun! 💕  
.  
And can you believe it? This will be our fourth album since our major debut!

.

もうご覧になりましたか？
.
.
CGじゃないですよ!
.
.
すごいですよね。感動しました🥺💕
.
.
わたくし…高所恐怖症なんですが、車の上に乗ってブイーンって頑張りました！！正直、足が今までに無いくらいめっちゃ震えました(　ﾟωﾟ)
.
でも曲が始まると震えが止まるんですよね。不思議〜〜(*´꒳`*)

en:
【New Music Video】  
BAND-MAID / Warning!  
.  
.  
Have you seen it yet?  
.  
.  
It's not CG!  
.  
.  
It's amazing, right? I was so moved 🥺💕  
.  
.  
I… have a fear of heights, but I did my best riding on top of the car, vroom vroom!! Honestly, my legs were shaking like never before (　ﾟωﾟ)  
.  
But once the song started, the shaking stopped. It's so strange~~ (*´꒳`*)  
.  
.  
It was snowing and raining, and I was shivering. Everyone did their best in the cold! (｀

jp:
Unseen World発売して数日経ちました(*´꒳`*)
.
.
何回くらい聴いていただけたでしょうか……?
.
DVDやBlu-rayは楽器隊によるインストのミュージックビデオなんですがご覧になりましたか?(*´꒳`*)
.
ブルーレイはマルチチャンネル機能が付いていて、楽器隊の手元など色々な角度でお楽しみいただけます✨
.
.
一生懸命撮ったので🥺
是非こちらも感想いただけると嬉しいです💕
.
.
オンラインお給仕も2/11にあります
en:
It's been a few days since the release of Unseen World (*´꒳`*)  
How many times do you think you've listened to it so far...?  

Have you checked out the DVD or Blu-ray? It features an instrumental music video by the band! (*´꒳`*)  
The Blu-ray comes with a multi-channel feature, so you can enjoy it from various angles, including close-ups of the band members' hands✨  

We worked really hard on it🥺  
I would love to hear your thoughts on it💕  

Also, we have an online okyuji on 2/11!

en:
I tried dancing to BAND-MAID's "After Life"! 

Did everyone get a chance to watch the music video for "After Life" that we released the other day? 👀 

The dancers in the MV looked like they were having so much fun, so I decided to give it a try too!!!! 

The choreography is by Sakana-sensei 💃★ Thank you for the wonderful maid dance! ✨ 

Make sure to watch the MV a lot!!!! And listen to our 4th ALBUM "Unseen World" a lot too!!!! 

#bandmaid  
#afterlife  
#dancedit  
#unseen

Today is #TwinTailDay!  
Kobato is also sporting twin tails today!  
Sorry to keep you waiting!!  

I’m so grateful to be appearing on the radio and other shows every day!  
Make sure to listen to #UnseenWorld a lot!  

During my break from work today, I went to get the HIFU treatment I’ve been curious about at #Qpu @qpu_kogao!  
My jawline looks so sharp now! 🕊  
I definitely want to make this a regular thing!!  

#bandmaid #miffy #ツインテール

jp:
🕊
本日『about Us』リリースしましたっぽ。
びっくりしたっぽ？？
サプライズですっぽ。🕊

沢山の気持ちを詰め込んだ一曲っぽ。
この曲、実は日本武道館お給仕の日の為に
作った曲なんですっぽ。

コロナ禍の中で、
今の私達がこうして頑張れるのも
本当にご主人様やお嬢様が
いてくれるからだと日々強く感じて、
日本武道館の日にこの感謝の気持ちを
伝えたくて、作ろうってなったんですっぽ。

みんな大変で、辛い日々が続くけど、
en:
🕊  
Today we released "about Us"! Surprised? It's a surprise! 🕊  

This song is packed with so many feelings. Actually, it was created for our performance at Nippon Budokan.  

During these challenging times with COVID, we truly feel every day that we can keep pushing forward because of our Masters and Princesses. We wanted to express this gratitude on the day of our Budokan performance, which is why we decided to create this song.  

Everyone is going through tough times, and the days can be hard, but...

jp:
【NEWS】
BAND-MAID New Song "about Us"
https://bandmaid.tokyo/contents/404025
#bandmaid

みなさん、元気に過ごしてますか？
私たちはとっても元気に過ごしているよ。
こんな世の中になってしまったけど、
少しずつでもみんなが喜び、癒し、元気だったりを感じてもらえるようにと気持ちを込めて、ささやかですが「about Us」という曲をあなたに届けます。
2/4から配信するので世界中のみんなに聴いてほしいです。

この曲は、私たちの今の気持ちが強く詰まっています。
世の中は突然「コロナ禍」という状態になって、
私たちはみんなが喜ぶことはなんだろうって沢山
en:
Hey everyone, how are you doing?  
We're doing really well!  
Even though the world has changed so much,  
we want everyone to feel joy, healing, and energy, even if just a little bit. With that feeling in mind, we're excited to share a song called "about Us" with you.  
It'll be available from 2/4, and we want everyone around the world to listen to it.  

This song is filled with our current feelings.  
The world suddenly entered a state of "COVID-19 pandemic,"  
and we've been thinking a lot about what brings everyone joy.

jp:
New Song「about Us」

BAND-MAIDからのサプライズ。
受け取ってもらえたかな？

この曲はね、日本武道館の日にみんなに届けたいと思って作っていたんだよ。
感謝の気持ちと愛を伝えたいという強い想いを込めて作った大切な曲です。

こうして私達が前を向いて進んでいけるのは、いつも応援してくれるご主人様、お嬢様達のおかげです。

たくさん曲をリリースできるのも、世界中でお給仕ができるのも、武道館お給仕を発表できたのも、支えてくれるみんながいるからです。

みんなの支
en:
New Song "about Us"

A surprise from BAND-MAID. 
Did you receive it well? 

This song was created with the hope of delivering it to everyone on the day of our performance at Nippon Budokan. 
It's a very special song filled with strong feelings of gratitude and love that we want to convey. 

The reason we can keep moving forward like this is all thanks to our Masters and Princesses who always support us. 

Being able to release so many songs, perform for everyone around the world, and announce our Budokan performance is all possible because of the support from all of you. 

Thank you for your support!

jp:
about Usという作品をリリースさせていただきました！
突然のサプライズでしたが、もう聴いていただけましたか？
.
本当は武道館でやろうと思って作った曲だったのーーーー！
.
武道館の発表をした時ね
.
ご主人様、お嬢様がすごく喜んでくださって
.
武道館に立てるのはみなさんの応援のお陰なんだーー！って改めて感じましたの。
.
それでね、
ご主人様、お嬢様にたくさん支えられて来たから、感謝の想いを伝えたいって強く強くメンバー全員感じてこの曲
en:
We’ve just released a new song called "about Us"! 
It was a sudden surprise, but have you had a chance to listen to it yet? 
.
Actually, this song was originally created with the intention of performing it at Budokan! 
.
When we announced Budokan, 
our Masters and Princesses were so incredibly happy. 
.
I truly felt that being able to stand on that stage is all thanks to your support! 
.
So, we all strongly felt the desire to express our gratitude to our Masters and Princesses, and that’s what inspired this song. 🎶

jp:
オンラインお給仕
ありがとうございましたっぽ。

本日初披露した新しいギターは
#zemaitis のなんと小鳩シグネイチャー🕊
デザイナーの竹内さん(@adesigner )に
小鳩の希望を完璧に最高に
かっこよくデザインしていただき、
ボディーにもゼマイティス様に
わがままをきいていただき
完成しましたっぽ。

また後日詳しく書くっぽね🕊

いやーそれにしても最高に
楽しい時間だったっぽ。
ありがとっぽー！！！！
今日は
en:
Thank you for the online okyuji! 

Today, we unveiled a brand new guitar, the #zemaitis, which is none other than Kobato's signature model 🕊. The designer, Takeuchi-san (@adesigner), perfectly captured Kobato's vision and designed it in the coolest way possible. We also got to indulge in some requests for the body from Zemaitis, and it turned out amazing!

I'll write more details about it later 🕊.

Wow, it was such an incredibly fun time! Thank you so much!!!! Today was...

jp:
2021年2月11日。日本武道館の予定だった大切な日。

そんな大切な日にオンラインお給仕という形でお給仕が出来て、みんなと一緒に同じ時間を共有する事が出来てとても嬉しかったし、やっぱりお給仕してる瞬間が一番楽しくて幸せって思えました。

全世界のご主人様お嬢様と"今この瞬間を一緒に楽しんでる"って感じる事が出来たし、目の前にみんながいる光景が見えたんだ！！！！！

武道館でのお給仕と変わらない気持ちで演奏してたよ！！！！

そう思えたのはみんなのおかげた
en:
February 11, 2021. A very important day that was supposed to be at Nippon Budokan.

I was so happy that on such an important day, I could serve you all online and share the same moment together. It really made me feel that the moments spent serving are the most fun and fulfilling!

I could feel that all the Masters and Princesses around the world were "enjoying this moment together," and I could see everyone right in front of me!!!!!!

I performed with the same feelings as if I were serving at Budokan!!!! 

I could feel that way thanks to all of you!

jp:
昨日はオンラインお給仕にご帰宅いただきありがとうございました(*´꒳`*)
.
まだ会えない日々が続きますが、配信を通して元気を癒しをお届け出来ていたら嬉しいです✨✨
.
大好きな💕ななちゃん (@7.style )と
ゆうきしゃん(@yuki.1754 )が来てくれました❣️
.
私はゆうきしゃんにやっていただきました(*´ω`*)💕
.
.
へっへへ〜💕💕💕綺麗にしていただき感謝です🥲💕
(写真はライブ後🎈)
.
.
ずっとバタ
en:
Thank you for coming home to our online okyuji yesterday! (*´꒳`*)

Even though we still have some days ahead where we can't meet in person, I hope we can bring you some energy and healing through our streams✨✨

My beloved 💕 Nana-chan (@7.style) and Yuuki-chan (@yuki.1754) came to visit❣️

I got to be pampered by Yuuki-chan (*´ω`*)💕

Hehehe~ 💕💕💕 I'm so grateful for the lovely treatment🥲💕 
(The photo is from after the live show 🎈)

I've been super busy...

en:
Alright! Before February ends, I need to update you all about my birthday (it was on 2/8) and, honestly, I really need to update my Instagram too! 

So here it goes! 

For my birthday, we had a rehearsal, and the members and staff celebrated with me! Thank you so much! 
(Last year, we also had a rehearsal the day before my birthday, and they celebrated then too!)

This was my first time being celebrated in such a sparkly and cute way! Look at these balloons! So shiny! ✨

Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses for your warm birthday wishes! I feel so lucky! 💖

en:
It's been a while since my last update!

I went to a place called Art Bar for the first time with Ainachan @ainayamauchi3131!

It was like heaven, where you can drink while painting.

I was so motivated that I even bought an easel to display my art at home!

Action painting is a great stress reliever.

I'll definitely go again (I've already made a reservation)!

#art #絵 #お酒

jp:
シャーマンキング、ついに放送開始…！！！！

20年前、リアルタイムで毎週わくわくどきどきしながらTVの前で待っていたあの感じが鮮明に蘇ってきました。

人生で二度もシャーマンキングをリアルタイムで楽しめる日が来るなんて。

本当に嬉しいです。

当時と変わらず大興奮させてくれる。

ありがとう、シャーマンキング！！

写真は去年シャーマンキング展にて購入したキャンバスボード☺︎

#シャーマンキング #shamanking #アニメ #漫画 #anime #manga #ja
en:
Shaman King has finally started airing...!!!!

The feeling of waiting in front of the TV every week, filled with excitement and anticipation, from 20 years ago has come rushing back to me.

I can't believe I get to enjoy Shaman King in real-time for a second time in my life.

I'm truly so happy.

It still gets me just as hyped as it did back then.

Thank you, Shaman King!!

The photo is of the canvas board I bought at the Shaman King exhibition last year ☺︎

#シャーマンキング #shamanking #アニメ #漫画 #anime #manga #ja

本日4/2(金)発売の
「Player」5月号はBAND-MAID
表紙＆巻頭特集でごじゃります!!🌸

50数年という長い歴史の中で女性バンドが表紙を飾るのは初との事で光栄です🥲💕

ありがとうございます💞
ロングインタビューなのでじっくり楽しんでご覧いただけたら嬉しいです✨

The May issue of "Player" magazine featuring BAND-MAID will be on sale on April 2.

#bandmaid #prsg
en:
The May issue of "Player" magazine featuring BAND-MAID will be on sale today, April 2! 🌸

It's an honor to be the first female band to grace the cover in the magazine's 50+ year history! 🥲💕

Thank you so much! 💞 It's a long interview, so I hope you can take your time and enjoy it! ✨

#bandmaid #prsg

jp:
本日4月2日(金)発売「Player」5月号、BAND-MAID表紙＆巻頭特集！

なんとガールズバンドがPlayerの表紙を飾るのは初との事で、最高に嬉しい気持ちと同時に、表紙に恥じないバンドになれるように成長し続けていきたいという気持ちが更に強くなりました。

光栄です。

とても楽しくロングインタビュー＆撮影していただいたので、お楽しみに！

The May issue of "Player" magazine featuring BAND-MAID will be on sale
en:
Today, April 2nd (Friday), the May issue of "Player" magazine featuring BAND-MAID will be released! 

It's the first time a girls' band has graced the cover of Player, and I couldn't be happier! At the same time, it strengthens my desire to continue growing into a band worthy of being on the cover.

It's such an honor.

We had a really fun long interview and photoshoot, so stay tuned!

jp:
ハイキュー!!展 in名古屋

しっかり目に焼き付けてきました。

感動が止まらなかった〜

特に自分の好きなシーンの原画は涙腺崩壊しますね…最高だった…

ハイキューは一人一人にドラマがあって共感しかなくて、人間味のある魅力的な登場人物ばかりなので全員尊敬している。

仲間って良いなぁ。青春って良いなぁ。

スポーツも音楽も共通する部分がとても多いと思っているので、ハイキューから沢山パワー貰っています。

大人になってからこんなにどハマりしたアニメと漫画って初めてかも。
en:
I just visited the Haikyuu!! exhibition in Nagoya!

I made sure to engrave it in my memory.

I couldn't stop feeling emotional~ 

Especially the original drawings of my favorite scenes had me in tears... it was amazing...

Haikyuu has a story for each character that resonates so deeply, and every character is so relatable and full of humanity, I respect them all.

Having friends is wonderful. Youth is wonderful.

I believe there are many similarities between sports and music, and I've gained so much power from Haikyuu.

This might be the first time I've become so obsessed with an anime and manga as an adult.

みんな、昨夜は
メイドの日のオンラインお給仕観てくれてありがとう！

画面越しだけど
みんなと繋がれて良かったです

無観客ライブはとっても素敵だけど
やっぱり早く実物のみんなに会いたいよね

やっぱり寂しいよね。　

みんながいることを想像してベース弾いたよ！

ありがとう。

またどこがで会える日を楽しみにしています

#bandmaid #メイドの日 #thedayofmaid #打ち上げしたい
en:
Everyone, thank you for watching the online okyuji for Maid Day last night!

Even though it was through a screen, I’m so glad we could connect.

An audience-less live is really wonderful, but I still want to meet all of you in person soon.

It’s definitely lonely, isn’t it?

I played the bass imagining all of you being there!

Thank you.

I’m looking forward to the day we can meet again somewhere.

#bandmaid #メイドの日 #thedayofmaid #打ち上げしたい

jp:
🕊
昨日5/10 #メイドの日
ライブ配信お給仕でしたっぽ。

久々のお給仕でもうへとへとになるくらい楽しかったっぽぉ。

OAとして、なんとcluppoが
出演いたしましたっぽ。
緊張したっぽぉ🌏❤️

皆様いかがでしたかっぽ？？🕊
まだ観てない方は
アーカイブで見れますので
急いでみてっぽ！笑

そして昨日発表しましたが
BAND-MAID PRIME が
開始されますっぽ。
お盟主様の会とはまた違った
特別な動画などを
ばんばんあげていくので
こちらも
en:
🕊  
Yesterday, on 5/10, we had a live streaming okyuji for #MaidDay!  

It was so much fun that I was completely exhausted from the okyuji after such a long time!  

As a special treat, cluppo made an appearance! I was super nervous! 🌏❤️  

How did everyone enjoy it?? 🕊  
For those who haven't seen it yet, you can catch the archive, so hurry and check it out! LOL  

And as we announced yesterday, BAND-MAID PRIME is starting!  
It'll feature special videos that are different from the OMEISYUSAMA-NO-KAI, so stay tuned for that too!

jp:
10代の頃から、イヤホン、スピーカとかの新調した後って
この上ないくらいワクワクしてしまう

子供の頃に新しいゲーム手に入れた時みたいな気持ち

どうしようめっちゃ楽しい！ってなる
わかる人はわかるでしょ？

今回は、リケーブル（オヤイデ）とイヤーパッド交換を…
ヘッドフォンはMDR-1Rです

さっそく交換した後聴いてみると…
音全然違うのですが…

お酒飲もうかな。

#bandmaid #お酒と音楽 #mdr1r #oyaide
en:
Ever since I was a teenager, I've felt an incredible excitement after getting new earphones or speakers. 

It’s like the feeling of getting a new game when I was a kid. 

What should I do? I’m having so much fun! I’m sure some of you can relate, right? 

This time, I swapped out the cable (Oyaide) and changed the ear pads... The headphones are MDR-1R. 

As soon as I listened to them after the swap... the sound is completely different! 

Maybe I should have a drink. 

#bandmaid #DrinksAndMusic #mdr1r #oyaide

I tried really hard to make it for Sai-chan (by the way, she said she wants something soothing), but it doesn’t feel finished yet, so I haven’t been able to give it to her. I don’t know what to do!

Art is so free, which makes it difficult, and I can’t see the end in sight.

MASSIVE Vol.38

表紙・特集を務めさせていただきました✨✨
きゃーーー！
ありがとうございます💞
嬉しい嬉しい嬉しいです💞

もうお読みいただけましたか？？
非常に読み応えがありまして、
私は３日に分けて読みました(｀･ω･´)w

個人的には取材をしてくださった
増田さんとのお話がとても楽しくて
その会話をそのまま綺麗に文章に起こして下さってて、
なんだか楽しかった時間を思い出せて嬉しかったです！！✨✨

あと写真たくさんあって嬉しいですね！！
さいち
en:
MASSIVE Vol.38

I had the honor of being featured on the cover and in a special feature! ✨✨ 
Kyaaa—! 
Thank you so much! 💞 
I'm so, so, so happy! 💞 

Have you had a chance to read it yet?? 
It’s really packed with content, and I took my time reading it over three days (｀･ω･´)w 

Personally, I really enjoyed the conversation with Masuda-san who conducted the interview. They beautifully captured our chat in writing, and it brought back such fun memories! I'm so glad! ✨✨ 

Also, there are so many photos, which makes me happy too!! 
Sai-chan

jp:
バジルちゃん(@kazi_baziru )と「僕のヒーローアカデミア展 DROWING SMASH」に行って来ました！

お互い仕事終わりにダッシュで駆け込んでギリギリ最終日に間に合った…！
　

展示コーナーがすっごく豪華で充実していて、終始心打たれまくりました。

我等の推しは轟くんとトガちゃん。

会場内は会話厳禁なので、ジェスチャーで喜びと感動を伝え合っていました🤝

バジルちゃんと一緒に行けて嬉しかったー！！！！ありがとう💞

私もヒーローになれるように頑張ります。
en:
I went to the "My Hero Academia Exhibition DROWING SMASH" with Baziru-chan (@kazi_baziru)! 

We both dashed in after work and barely made it just in time for the final day...!

The exhibition area was incredibly luxurious and fulfilling; I was moved the entire time.

Our favorites are Todoroki-kun and Toga-chan.

Since talking was prohibited inside the venue, we communicated our joy and emotions through gestures 🤝

I was so happy to go with Baziru-chan!!!! Thank you 💞

I’ll do my best to become a hero too!

en:

I wore clothes from @jour.de.muguet~✨  
All the outfits are so cute~🥺💕  

For the shoot, I wore my usual maid outfit though🤣  
Lately, I've been stuck at home working on composing music, so I can only wear cute outfits when I go out like this (´-ω-`)✨  

I was so happy when the members said I looked cute (*´꒳`*)💕💕  

It's a nice day today☀️  
Wishing everyone a lovely holiday~💕  

These days, I've been practicing and composing...

『Flapping wings』の
Music Videoが公開されたっぽ。
見ていただけましたかっぽ？？
今までとはまた違った感じを見れたのではないでしょーかっぽ！？🕊🌟
豆を切なく握りしめたり
鳩の仕分けしたり
ピアノで鳩さんとふわふわしたり
寝ちゃったり
歩いたり
撃たれたり、、、
沢山観て気づいてほしいっぽ！
カラフルなcluppoの世界で
みんな平和っぽ🎵🕊🌏

今回のMVのcrowの皆様
田邊有希様（ex-BRADIO)
ナガイケジョ
en:
#cluppo  
The music video for "Flapping Wings" has been released!  
Have you had a chance to check it out??  
I think you might have seen a different side of us this time, right?! 🕊🌟  
There are moments where we tightly hold onto beans,  
sort pigeons,  
float around with the pigeons at the piano,  
fall asleep,  
walk,  
and even get shot...  
I hope you watch it a lot and notice all these details!  
In the colorful world of cluppo,  
everyone is living in peace 🎵🕊🌏  

A big thank you to the crows in this MV:  
Yuki Tanabe (ex-BRADIO)  
Nagai Kejo

jp:
TVアニメ「プラチナエンド」のオープニングテーマを担当させていただく事になりました！

オープニングテーマのお話をいただく前からプラチナエンドのファンだったので、アニメ化をずっと楽しみに待っていました。

ファンである作品に携わる事が出来て、本当に幸せです。

本日より「Sense(TV Size Ver.)」が先行配信開始です！

疾走感と世界観を大切にしたフレーズをたっぷり詰め込みました。

歌詞にも注目してほしいです。

「Sense」
たくさん聴いてください👼

#
en:
I'm excited to announce that we've been chosen to perform the opening theme for the TV anime "Platinum End"! 

I've been a fan of Platinum End even before we got the opportunity to work on the opening theme, so I've been eagerly looking forward to the anime adaptation.

I'm truly happy to be involved with a work that I love as a fan.

Starting today, "Sense (TV Size Ver.)" is available for early streaming!

We've packed it full of phrases that capture the exhilarating feel and world of the series.

I hope you'll pay attention to the lyrics as well.

"Sense"
Please give it a listen! 👼

#
