en:
I went on a tour of the large Platinum End advertisements at three locations in Tokyo! 👼

Photos 1-4: Shibuya  
Photos 5-7: Shinjuku  
Photos 8-10: Ikebukuro  

It was so thrilling with such a powerful presence! I was so happy that I ended up taking a ton of photos.  

The TV anime "Platinum End" starts airing on October 7, 2021 (Thursday)!  

I want to heat things up with the new BAND-MAID song "Sense," which is the opening theme! I’m so excited!!!!  

"Sense" (TV Size Ver.) is available for early streaming 🎵  

#プラチナエンド #PlatinumEnd

(優柔不断でベルトとサスペンダー同時に即決出来ずベルトを先に買ったけど、サスペンダーが売り切れてしまってさ。けどハーネスにしたかったからネットサーフィンしまくって見つけられたの！この喜びの大きさ伝われ！！！)

en:
💖

I've been searching for the perfect harness for years, and this year I found it at @togaarchives! I'm so happy! 
(I was indecisive and couldn't decide between a belt and suspenders, so I bought the belt first, but then the suspenders sold out. But I really wanted a harness, so I surfed the internet like crazy and finally found it! I hope you can feel how happy I am!!!)

I'm so thrilled to finally be able to do the outfit I've wanted for so long. Please take a look!
That's all!

#bandmaid  
#saiki

jp:
KANAMI
#bandmaid

𓉞
⁡
⁡
⁡
カラコンして濃ゆいお化粧をして作り込んだ派手めな、お顔。も！
⁡
裸眼で覇気のない地味なお顔。も、お気に。
⁡
⁡
⁡
そしてやはりしっくりくるのね。ブラック
⁡
私はもうブラックに愛されているのかもしれない
⁡
つい最近は、私ってブルー似合ってるかもしれない。とも思った
⁡
その後には、頭にブルーのもんずっとくっついてるがな。とも…思ったよ
⁡
昨晩は、とっても素敵な音楽を聴いて、自分まで素敵になった気分
⁡
今日もそのまま素敵な気分
⁡
⁡
en:
𓉞

With colored contacts and bold makeup, I can create a flashy look! 
And I also love my bare face, which is plain and lacks energy. 

But somehow, I feel most at home with black. 
Maybe I’m just loved by black. 
Recently, I thought I might actually look good in blue too. 
But then I realized I’ve got a blue something stuck to my head... 

Last night, I listened to some really wonderful music and felt like I became wonderful myself. 
I’m still feeling great today!

en:
Here’s a behind-the-scenes shot from the photoshoot for the May issue of "Player."

When we were shooting with the instruments, I chose the bass drum.

Of course, it ended up being the snare for the actual performance.

Thank you to the photographer and staff who took the commemorative photos! (Sorry for always goofing around!)

jp:
10月10日ドラムの日🥁
.
ふづき(@fuzuzu)がドット絵をプレゼントしてくれました！嬉しすぎる💛

最初は、私が髪色暗めの時に作ってくれたイラストをもらったんだけど、その後「今の髪色も作った！」って送ってくれました🤣✨

染めたて暗めver.と、色が抜けて明るくなってきたver.の2パターン用意してくれるなんて…！！

さすがふづき。いつも近くで私の事を見てくれているのが伝わりますな…。

尊い！！！大好き！！！！！

いつも素敵なイラストありがとう🥰
en:
October 10th is Drum Day 🥁  
Fuzuki (@fuzuzu) gifted me a pixel art! I'm so happy 💛  

At first, I received an illustration when my hair was darker, but then she sent me, "I made one with your current hair color too!" 🤣✨  

She prepared two versions: one with the freshly dyed darker color and another with the lighter shade as it fades...!!  

As expected of Fuzuki. It really shows how closely she pays attention to me...  

So precious!!! I love it!!!!  

Thank you for always creating such wonderful illustrations 🥰

jp:
MISA
#bandmaid #cheers

MIKU KOBATO🕊
#bandmaid #cluppo

♡
⁡
⁡
#bandmaid
#saiki

10月21日
9回目の810歳のお誕生日
お友達に祝ってもらいましたっぽ🕊

なんとケーキがcluppo仕様！！
そしてミクッフィーの
cluppo ver.の看板？まで！！
凄すぎてびっくりしたっぽぉ！！

あとはねー、人生初の小鳩を
食べましたっぽ！！💦
でも柔らかくて
おいしかったですっぽ。。
複雑な心境、、！

あとあと！大空を飛びたくて
ヘリに乗ったっぽ！鳩だけど。
夕焼けが見れて綺麗だったっぽぉ！

沢山詰まったとってもすてきな
誕生日となりましたっ
en:
October 21st  
Celebrating my 810th birthday for the 9th time! My friends threw me a little party 🕊  

And guess what? The cake was in cluppo style!!  
They even had a sign for the cluppo version of Mikuffi!! I was so surprised, it was amazing!!  

Oh, and I tried Kobato for the first time in my life!! 💦  
It was soft and delicious, but my feelings are a bit complicated...!  

Also! I wanted to fly high in the sky, so I rode in a helicopter! Even though I'm a pigeon.  
I got to see the beautiful sunset!  

It was a wonderful birthday filled with so many great moments!

en:
Today is Record Day!  
The weather is nice, perfect for a drink!  

BAND-MAID's records have quite a presence!  

Also, my collection of hobby records is steadily growing. Starting with the classics first.

jp:
実は今年の初めに
間違えて極太ストラップを
購入したのを今恥ずかし報告

11.4cmもあるから肩から出ちゃいそうになるもしくは弾いてる途中で出ちゃう

普段は同じブランドの8.5cm

ステージでは一生使わない太さ 笑

#ベースの日  #ベースの日にこの報告
en:
Actually, I’m embarrassed to admit that at the beginning of this year, I accidentally bought an extra thick strap. 

It’s 11.4cm long, so it looks like it might pop out from my shoulder or get in the way while I’m playing! 

Usually, I use an 8.5cm strap from the same brand. 

This thickness is something I’d never use on stage, haha! 

#BassDay #ReportingThisOnBassDay

en:
12.25  
Thank you for joining our acoustic stream! 🕊  
I’m sure many of you were surprised by the different arrangements and compositions compared to our usual performances!  

This time, Kobato did an acoustic arrangement of "Sayonakidori" for the first time! I was really nervous! 🕊  

Since it was a Christmas version, I wore special casual clothes instead of the maid outfit for this okyuji! So rare!!! If you'd like, check out Kobato's full outfit too!  

By the way, on this day, all the members brought matching bags. So cute~ lol

jp:
.
アコースティックお給仕の衣装❣️

メイド服以外の衣装を選ぶ時には、絶対に @panormo_official のお洋服を着ると決めていました。

バイオリニストのゆきちゃん(@hanaiyuki )が作るお洋服だからこそ、演奏者が喜ぶ細かい工夫がたくさん散りばめられていて、ドラムがとても叩きやすかったです！

特別なお給仕の日に、自分が大好きなお洋服を着れて嬉しかったです！

メンバーみんなで衣装のテーマカラーを決めたりコーディネートを組む時間がすごく楽しかったので、またいつかやり
en:
Acoustic okyuji outfits❣️

When it came to choosing outfits other than our maid costumes, I was determined to wear something from @panormo_official.

Since the clothes are made by our violinist Yuki-chan (@hanaiyuki), they are filled with thoughtful details that make it easy for performers to play, and I found it really comfortable to drum in them!

I was so happy to wear my favorite outfit on such a special okyuji day!

It was so much fun to decide on the theme color for the outfits and coordinate everything together with the members, so I hope we can do it again someday!

jp:
There are currently more than 90 movies uploaded to the "BAND-MAID PRIME" subscription video service. There are many videos that can only be seen here.

This site is available in English, and you can register with your credit card or Paypal. We hope you

.
アコースティックお給仕でお世話になった子達🥁

カホンは、ずっと気になっていたLa Rosa Percussionのカホン。

初めて叩いたのですが、鳴りが良過ぎてビックリした！感激！

低音も高音も全体的にバランス良く鳴ってくれるので、叩いていてとても気持ち良かったです。

座り心地も良かったな〜

BAND-MAIDでカホン演奏したのは何年ぶりだろう…？
久しぶりに叩けて楽しかった！

ドラムセットはTAMAの小口径セット。

シングルペダルで演奏したのも久しぶり
en:
I had a great time with the kids during the acoustic okyuji! 🥁

I finally got to try out the La Rosa Percussion cajón that I've been curious about for a while.

It was my first time playing it, and I was blown away by how amazing it sounded! So moving!

The bass and treble were perfectly balanced, making it feel really good to play.

The seating was comfortable too~ 

I wonder how many years it's been since I played cajón with BAND-MAID...? It was so much fun to play again after such a long time!

For the drum set, I used a TAMA small-diameter kit.

It's been a while since I played with a single pedal too!

jp:
✧
⁡
⁡
クリスマスに配信された「BAND-MAID ONLINE ACOUSTIC」で着ていた私服衣装です
⁡
ベージュ系 × レッド系 の縛りでコーデ組み楽しかったぁ…いつものメイド服のモノトーンではなく
柔らかさのある色味でまとまってよかったよかった！
ベージュとレッドの割合で普段のメンバーの個性も伝わったらいいなぁと思って…
勝手に
MISAちゃんは赤多めがいいな〜とか
KANAMIちゃんのベージュはブラウン寄りにしたいな〜とか
小鳩はベージュ多めで赤も深い色がいいし〜シフ
en:
✧

This is the casual outfit I wore during the "BAND-MAID ONLINE ACOUSTIC" streamed on Christmas! 

I had so much fun coordinating with a beige and red theme... It was nice to step away from the usual monochrome maid outfits and go for softer colors! I hope the balance of beige and red helps convey each member's personality as well... 

For example, I thought MISA-chan would look great with more red~ and I’d love to see KANAMI-chan in a beige leaning towards brown~ and for Kobato, I think a lot of beige with deep red would be nice too~ Shifu!

今年も#メイドの日 楽しかったですね(*´꒳`*)💕
(アーカイブもあるのでyoutubeをチェック♪)

そしてそして発表しました！

en:
Thank you for watching BAND-MAID "THE DAY OF MAID" SPECIAL TALK today! 💕✨

This year's #MaidDay was so much fun! (*´꒳`*)💕 
(There's an archive available, so check it out on YouTube♪)

And, we have some announcements! 
⭐︎ A NEW EP will be released in the summer of 2022!

⭐︎ We’ve decided to hold an okyuji at Tokyo Garden Theater on January 9, 2023 (Monday, public holiday)! 🌸

Stay tunedーー✨💕 

Today was 5/10 "THE DAY OF MAID" ✨

jp:
久々！やっほー！Hello！
元気だよ！
en:
Long time no see! Hey there! Hello!  
I'm doing well!

jp:
可愛いお花をいただいたのっ!!💕

前にお友達のゆりちゃん(@qyurip )と久しぶりに会えた時に、お洒落なお菓子とお花をプレゼントしてくれたのです…(*´꒳`*)

こういうのをサラッと出来ちゃうの本当に素敵すぎる〜✨✨

わたしもそんな気遣いが出来る素敵な女性になりたいであります(´；ω；｀)💕
💕💕

という今日は嬉しい出来事のお話でしたとさ！

めでたしめでたし(｡´•ㅅ•｡)

When I met my friend for the first time i
en:
I received some cute flowers!! 💕 

When I met my friend Yuri-chan (@qyurip) after a long time, she gifted me some fashionable sweets and flowers... (*´꒳`*)

It's really amazing how effortlessly she can do things like this~ ✨✨

I also want to be a wonderful woman who can show that kind of thoughtfulness (´；ω；｀)💕 
💕💕

So today, I shared a happy little story!

And they lived happily ever after (｡´•ㅅ•｡)

jp:
2022.6.5
predia Final Live ~Thank you for all my dia~＠立川ステージガーデン

prediaさんのFinal Liveをしっかりと見届けました。

初めて会った時からラストまで、prediaさんはずっとキラッキラに輝いていました。眩しかった。

prediaさんらしい力強く美しい圧巻のステージに終始涙が止まりませんでした。6人に会った時はさらに大号泣。

何年経っても変わらずに「もぉ〜！あーちゃん！」って、優しく温かく抱きしめて寄り添っ
en:
2022.6.5  
predia Final Live ~Thank you for all my dia~ @ Tachikawa Stage Garden  

I was able to witness predia's Final Live in its entirety.  

From the first time I met them until the very end, predia shone brightly the whole time. It was dazzling.  

Their powerful and beautiful stage presence left me in tears throughout the performance. When I saw the six of them together, I cried even harder.  

No matter how many years go by, they still warmly embrace me and say, "Aww, A-chan!" with such kindness.

jp:
🕊🌏❤️

少し経ってしまいましたが、、
7月7日七夕の日にcluppoの"With you"が
配信リリースされましたっぽ。

TVアニメ『咲う アルスノトリア すんっ！』
EDテーマになってますっぽ！！
cluppoとしては、初のアニメタイアップ。✨

タイアップならではの
今までのcluppoとは違った曲、歌い方、雰囲気、
全部楽しんでほしいっぽ。
アニメも宜しくっぽね🕊
MVも Youtubeにて公開されてますっぽ。

ギターを持ってないMVは初でしたっぽ。
en:
🕊🌏❤️

It's been a little while, but on July 7th, Tanabata, cluppo's "With you" was released! 

It's the ending theme for the TV anime "Sakiu Arusunotoria Sun!"✨ 
This is cluppo's first anime tie-up!

I hope you enjoy this song, singing style, and vibe, which are all different from what you've heard from cluppo before, thanks to the tie-up. Please support the anime too! 🕊 The music video is also available on YouTube!

This was the first MV where I didn't hold a guitar!

jp:
ゲネプロ2日間終了。
やりきった後の疲労感が懐かしい。

みんなに会えるまであとちょっと！
en:
The two days of the dress rehearsal are over.  
That feeling of exhaustion after giving it your all is so nostalgic.  

Just a little longer until we can meet everyone!

嬉しかったです、、、(´；ω；｀)

次は8月17日BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPANですね！！
わっくわっくです✨✨

ところで写真についてなんですが、急にさいちゃんが抱き寄せてくれました…😂💕💕

en:
DOWNLOAD JAPAN 2022 at Makuhari Messe

Thank you so much💕 
It was our first time performing in front of an audience in two and a half years!! 
I was so happy... (´；ω；｀)

Next up is BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN on August 17!! 
I'm super excited✨✨

By the way, about the photo, Sai-chan suddenly pulled me in for a hug... 😂💕💕 
I have this face of pure happiness... I'm so sorry to all the SAIKI fans around the world... fuh fuh fuh

#downloadja

jp:
2022.8.14
Download Japan 2022
オープニングアクト
ありがとうございましたっぽ🌟

唯一の日本人バンドとして
光栄なステージ出演ができて
とても嬉しかったですっぽ。

お久しぶりすぎた有観客、
テンション爆上がりでしたっぽ。
早朝にもかかわらず
見に来てくださった方々
感謝っぽ！！
(ばーんって始めた瞬間に靴脱げたとか
機材トラブったりとかリボンも取れたとか
いろいろあったけど☺︎それも含めて)

とにかくとにかく
とぉっても楽しかったで
en:
2022.8.14  
Download Japan 2022  
Opening Act  
Thank you so much! 🌟  

As the only Japanese band,  
I was honored to perform on such a stage,  
and it made me really happy!  

It had been way too long since we played in front of an audience,  
and my excitement was through the roof!  
I’m so grateful to everyone who came out to see us,  
even though it was early in the morning!  
(There were a lot of things that happened, like my shoes flying off when we started,  
technical troubles, and my ribbon coming undone, but☺︎ all of that was part of the fun!)  

Anyway, it was super, super fun!

jp:
🕊♪♪♪

遂に始まりましたっぽ。
PRE US OKYUJI IN JAPAN
初日は大阪なんばhatch

約3年ぶりだなんて、
浦島太郎気分っぽね。。
早いっぽ。でもお待たせっぽ。

緊張と嬉しさとが入り混じった
久々の感情でしたっぽ。
コロナ前とは少し違うお給仕だったけど、
ご主人様お嬢様がご帰宅してくれて、
顔を合わせて出来たお給仕は
やっぱり素敵なものでしたっぽ。

久々のぐだぐだMCやおまじないタイムも
楽しんでいただけたかなっぽ？？

OMJタオル
en:
🕊♪♪♪

It's finally begun!  
PRE US OKYUJI IN JAPAN  
The first day is at Osaka Namba Hatch.

Can you believe it's been about 3 years?  
I feel like Urashima Taro...  
Time flies, but thanks for waiting!

I was filled with a mix of nervousness and happiness,  
a long-lost feeling.  
The okyuji was a bit different from before COVID,  
but having our Masters and Princesses come home  
and being able to see each other made it truly wonderful.

I hope you enjoyed the long-awaited silly MC and the magic time too!  

OMJ towel!

jp:
2022.8.17
PRE US OKYUJI@なんばHatch
初日、大阪！ありがとうございました！

2年半ぶりの有観客お給仕、みんなに会えて本当に本当に嬉しかった！待っててくれてありがとう！！

大阪わくわくしすぎて本番前にたこ焼き3パック(ソース、塩、ポン酢)と551を2個食べてしまった結果、胃下垂の私はお腹がパンパンに膨らみました。
※食べる前(写真4枚目)→食べた後(写真5枚目)

これがMCで話した新衣装の恐怖です。

そろそろ本気で怒られそうなので、お給仕前と撮影前は
en:
2022.8.17  
PRE US OKYUJI @ Namba Hatch  
Thank you so much for the first day in Osaka!  

I was really, really happy to see everyone after 2 and a half years of performing without an audience! Thank you for waiting for us!!  

I was so excited about Osaka that I ended up eating 3 packs of takoyaki (sauce, salt, ponzu) and 2 551s before the show, and as a result, my stomach is completely stuffed since I have a sagging stomach.  
*Before eating (4th photo) → After eating (5th photo)*  

This is the fear of our new outfits that I talked about during the MC.  

I feel like I'm about to get seriously scolded, so I need to be careful before the okyuji and photo shoots!

本日は
BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN
愛知DIAMOND HALLお給仕へご帰宅いただきありがとうございました💞

今日もとっても楽しい一日になりました(*´꒳`*)✨

大阪とセットリストが違うんですが、個人的には3セクション目がとっても大変疲れる曲達が続きまして…!!笑
大変でした！！🤣w
うむ！修行修行！！でもそれが楽しいのです♫

お久しぶりに愛知に帰れて嬉しかったです💕
またお会いしましょう(｀･ω･´)ﾉ✨✨

#bandma
en:
Today, we had the BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN at Aichi DIAMOND HALL. Thank you for coming home! 💞

It turned out to be such a fun day! (*´꒳`*)✨

The setlist is different from Osaka, and personally, the third section had some really exhausting songs one after another...!! Haha, it was tough!! 🤣w 
But that's all part of the training! And yet, it’s so much fun! ♫

I was so happy to be back in Aichi after a long time! 💕
Let’s meet again soon! (｀･ω･´)ﾉ✨✨

#bandma

new merch
#bandmaid #preusokyujiinjapan

最近のお給仕では新インスト「from now on」を演奏させていただきましたの〜(*´꒳`*)

レコーディングでは頭のリフはワーミーを使って弾いていますが、お給仕では今のところエクスプレッションペダルを繋いで 、写真のH9でオクターブコントロールしています( ´∀｀)

9月21日発売のNEW EP『Unleash』の
初回生産限定盤には「from now on」のMusic Videoを収録したBlu-ray/DVDが付属します💿ふお！！
楽器隊のみのMusic Videoという事で、
en:
In our recent okyuji, we performed the new instrumental "from now on"! (*´꒳`*)

During the recording, I used a whammy pedal for the main riff, but for the okyuji, I'm currently connecting an expression pedal and controlling the octave with the H9 in the photo ( ´∀｀)

The limited edition of our new EP "Unleash," which will be released on September 21, comes with a Blu-ray/DVD that includes the Music Video for "from now on"! 💿 Wow!! Since it's a Music Video featuring only the instrumentalists,

jp:
2022.8.25
PRE US OKYUJI@DIAMOND HALL
2公演目、名古屋！

久しぶりの名古屋楽しかったー！ありがとうございました！！

ご主人様&お嬢様、メンバー、スタッフさん達のニコニコな笑顔をステージの上からいっぱいみる事が出来ました！

みんなが笑ってくれて大大大満足☺︎

差し入れでいただいた名古屋のみたらし団子、甘すぎずめちゃくちゃ美味しかったなぁ！

お次は仙台！待っててね〜！
en:
2022.8.25  
PRE US OKYUJI @ DIAMOND HALL  
Second show in Nagoya!  

It was so much fun to be back in Nagoya after a while! Thank you so much!!  

I was able to see the smiling faces of our Masters & Princesses, the members, and the staff from the stage!  

Seeing everyone smile made me super, super happy ☺︎  

The mitarashi dango we received as a gift from Nagoya was just the right amount of sweetness and incredibly delicious!  

Next up is Sendai! Can’t wait to see you all there~!

jp:
愛知スペシャルカラーをゲット出来た方〜？( ´∀｀)
このお色はみんちょが大好きなやつですー💞

次は9月3日に仙台スペシャルカラーがありますねぇ✨
誰のイメージカラーかお分かりでしょうか？？(*´꒳`*)ふふふっ

好きなお色のお話なんですが、
私は緑が好きなんですけど
姉も緑が好きで
母も緑が好きで
そういえば小さい頃から家の中に緑色の物が多くあったんですよね(･ω･三･ω･)

つまり、そういう事が関係しているのかしら…？🤔✨

みなさんのお好きなカラーは何かしら〜？
en:
Did anyone manage to get the Aichi special color? ( ´∀｀)  
This color is one that Mincho absolutely loves! 💞

Next up, we have the Sendai special color on September 3rd! ✨  
Do you know whose image color it is?? (*´꒳`*) Hehe!

Speaking of favorite colors, I really like green,  
and my sister loves green too,  
and my mom loves green as well.  
Now that I think about it, there were a lot of green things in our house since I was little (･ω･三･ω･)

So, I wonder if that has something to do with it…? 🤔✨

What about you all? What’s your favorite color?

jp:
🕊🌻

気づけば9月になりましたっぽ。
久々のサマソニ出演からの
名古屋お給仕が終わりましたっぽ🕊

やっぱりお給仕は楽しいなと
毎回ひしひしと感じていますっぽ。
(名古屋の輪廻は気合い入れすぎて
首を振りすぎましたっぽ。
無事次の日は首が機能しませんでしたっぽ。w)

明日は仙台お給仕っぽ🕊
飛ばしていくっぽよ〜！！

そして今月21日は
New EP『Unleash』の発売日！
とても強い&私達らしい1枚になっているので
皆様ご予約必須ですっぽ🕊
優しく
en:
🕊🌻

Before I knew it, September has arrived! 
Our performance at Summer Sonic was a blast, and we just wrapped up our okyuji in Nagoya! 🕊

I really feel the joy of performing every time. 
(For the Nagoya show, I got a bit too pumped up during the "Rinne" part and ended up shaking my head way too much. The next day, my neck was definitely not functioning properly! 😂)

Tomorrow, we have our okyuji in Sendai! 
Let’s go all out! 🕊

And don’t forget, on the 21st of this month, our new EP "Unleash" will be released! 
It’s a strong and very "us" kind of album, so make sure to pre-order it! 🕊
Be kind!

jp:
NEW LOGO-T
#bandmaid #SAIKI #miyagi
#bandmaid #miyagi #thankyou

昨日は、仙台お給仕！
ありがとうございました！

普段ほとんど押さないBAND-MAIDが20分も押しました笑
待たせたみんなには、ほんっとうに申し訳ない。
けど…。
良い時間でもあったな。

すごく愛を感じた夜でした。
メンバー愛がまた、深まったね！
（さいちゃんの衣装のスカートの外側のヒラヒラが何故か見当たらなくてみんなであたふた布切ったり縫ったりして作ってた笑）　

うん。いい夜でした！！

写真はビール飲んでGOODポーズ。　

#bandmaid
en:
Yesterday was an okyuji in Sendai!  
Thank you so much!  

BAND-MAID, who usually doesn't run late, ended up being 20 minutes behind schedule, haha.  
I'm really sorry for keeping everyone waiting.  
But...  
It was a great time nonetheless.  

I felt so much love that night.  
Our bond as members has deepened even more!  
(For some reason, Sai-chan's skirt's outer frills were missing, so we all panicked and ended up cutting and sewing fabric to make it, haha.)  

Yeah. It was a wonderful night!!  

Here's a photo of us drinking beer and striking a GOOD pose.  

#bandmaid

jp:
昨日はBAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN
宮城・SENDAI にご帰宅いただきましてありがとうございました✨

開演が20分も遅れてしまってごめんなさいでした・・
今思うとアナウンスが出来ればよかったのに・・
てんやわんやのてんやわんやでした・・(´；ω；｀)

なにがあったかと言うと
リハが終わり、準備準備〜お着替えお着替え〜♪と思ったら

さいちゃんのスカートに付けるヒラヒラが！！
“””無い・・””””

「スカートに付けるヒラヒラを付けないで
en:
Yesterday was the BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN. Thank you for coming back home to Sendai, Miyagi! ✨

I’m really sorry that the show started 20 minutes late... Looking back, I wish we could have made an announcement. It was a complete whirlwind! (´；ω；｀)

So what happened was, after the rehearsal, we were all set and ready to change outfits when...

Sai-chan's frills for her skirt were nowhere to be found!! 
“””They’re missing... ”””” 

“Don’t put on the frills for the skirt!”

jp:
2022.9.3
PRE US OKYUJI@仙台Rensa
3公演目、仙台！ありがとうございました！

本番直前にハプニングもありましたが、メンバー＆スタッフの団結力と絆を発揮して挑んだお給仕は、貴重な経験と素敵な思い出。

お待たせしてすみません…！
ご主人様,お嬢様の暖かさに感謝です。

みんなのおかげで最高に熱いお給仕になりました！！！楽しかったね！！！

また遊ぼうねー！！

お次はZepp DiverCity TOKYO！
お待ちしています〜☺︎

あ。一番最後
en:
2022.9.3  
PRE US OKYUJI @ Sendai Rensa  
Third show, Sendai! Thank you so much!  

There was a little hiccup right before the performance, but the unity and bond of the members and staff shone through, making this okyuji a valuable experience and a wonderful memory.  

Sorry for keeping you waiting...!  
I'm grateful for the warmth of our Masters and Princesses.  

Thanks to everyone, it turned into the most intense okyuji ever!!! It was so much fun!!!  

Let's hang out again soon!!  

Next up is Zepp DiverCity TOKYO!  
We’re looking forward to seeing you there~ ☺︎  

Oh. One last thing...

jp:
ハイキュー!!の舞台となった宮城県でお給仕をするとなったら、こうなってしまうよね。

会場リハーサル時の私です。

BAND-MAIDチームの中にもハイキュー好きなスタッフさんがいるので、テンションあがりまくってました。
(照明さんパワーでイケてる写真撮ってもらっちゃった)

#ハイキュー‼︎ #ハイキュー #及川徹
en:
If we were to do an okyuji in Miyagi Prefecture, the setting of Haikyuu!!, it would definitely turn out like this!

Here’s a pic of me during the venue rehearsal.

There are some staff members in the BAND-MAID team who love Haikyuu, so we were all super hyped up! 
(Thanks to the lighting crew, we got some awesome photos!)

#Haikyuu‼︎ #Haikyuu #OikawaToru

TOKYO ZEPP DIVERCITY
new merch

仙台お給仕の後は、仙台に残ってハイキュー!!巡りをしてきました。
en: After the okyuji in Sendai, I stayed in Sendai and went on a Haikyuu!! tour.

jp:
.
ハイキュー!!聖地巡礼@カメイアリーナ仙台(仙台市体育館)

念願の聖地巡礼。

漫画とアニメに出てくる風景そのまますぎて大興奮でした。感激。。。

オブジェは写真投稿NGなので載せられませんが、実物のオブジェは想像以上の大きさでビックリでした…！！

いつか軽米町にも絶対に行きたい！

宮城、とっても素敵な場所でした。
またゆっくり行きたいです。

#ハイキュー!! #ハイキュー #聖地巡礼
en:
Finally made my long-awaited pilgrimage to the sacred site at Kamei Arena Sendai (Sendai City Gymnasium)! 

I was so excited to see the scenery just like in the manga and anime. It was truly moving... 

I can't post pictures of the sculptures since photography is not allowed, but they were way bigger than I imagined...!! 

I definitely want to visit Karumai Town someday! 

Miyagi is such a wonderful place. I want to take my time and visit again. 

#Haikyuu!! #Haikyuu #Pilgrimage

jp:
昨日は
BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN
東京・Zepp Divercityお給仕へご帰宅いただきましてありがとうございました💞

4枚目の写真…
金麦ですね。。
何年振りのお酒なの…?
ステージで飲むの美味しすぎてびっくりしました。

からの正直記憶がちょっとふわふわしています😂
(とても楽しかったのは覚えておりますが…!!)

あと曲がめちゃくちゃ遅く感じて、お給仕終わったあとに「曲が私について来なかった！」と言ってました、、
(何を馬鹿な
en:
Yesterday, we had the BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN at Zepp Divercity in Tokyo. Thank you for coming home! 💞

In the fourth photo... it's Kanbaku, right? How many years has it been since I had alcohol...? I was so surprised at how delicious it was to drink on stage.

After that, to be honest, my memory is a bit fuzzy 😂 (But I do remember having a lot of fun…!!)

Also, the songs felt super slow, and after the okyuji, I was saying, "The songs didn't keep up with me!"... (What a silly thing to say!)

jp:
2022.9.7
PRE US OKYUJI@Zepp DiverCity TOKYO

4公演目、東京！ありがとうございました！

かなみが久しぶりに覚醒した日でもありましたね。あー、本当に最高ね。カッコ良いよ。自慢のメンバーだよ！！

ライブって何が起こるか分からないからね。毎回のお給仕全てが新鮮だし、毎回ドキドキしている！

きっとみんなもそうだよね？？

熱くて楽しい時間をありがとう！！

いよいよラストはeggman。
思いっきり楽しむぞー！！
みんなのパワーをくれ
en:
2022.9.7  
PRE US OKYUJI @ Zepp DiverCity TOKYO  

Thank you for the 4th performance in Tokyo!  

It was also the day Kanami awakened after a long time. Ah, it was truly the best. So cool! I'm so proud of our members!!  

You never know what will happen at a live show. Every okyuji is fresh and exciting, and I’m nervous every time!  

I’m sure everyone feels the same way, right??  

Thank you for the hot and fun time!!  

Now, it’s finally time for the last show at eggman. Let’s have a blast!! Give me all your power! 💪✨

先日、BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN"全5公演が終わりました✨

最終日は思い出のライブハウスEGGMANでした!!

週に何回も出演していた思い出しかない場所に戻って来れて本当に嬉しかったです(´；ω；｀)✨

距離がとっても近くてドキドキしちゃいました！🤣💕

4枚目の写真は…
さいちゃんがメンバーに集合をかけて、
最後にセットリストになかった新曲「infulencer」をやろうと言ってる所です！

(正直、焦りました😂ふお！)

何
en:
The other day, BAND-MAID's "PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN" with all 5 performances wrapped up! ✨

On the final day, we were back at the memorable live house, EGGMAN!! 

I was so happy to return to a place where I have so many memories from performing multiple times a week (´；ω；｀)✨ 

The distance was super close, and it made my heart race! 🤣💕 

In the 4th photo... Sai-chan gathered the members and suggested we play a new song, "influencer," that wasn't on the setlist! 

(To be honest, I panicked a bit 😂 Whoa!) 

What a memorable experience!

jp:
先日はeggmanで久々のお給仕でした！
来られた方はありがとうございました。

セトリになかった新曲influencerもやったね〜
こういうことやったのめっちゃ久々！ライブって楽しいな。

BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPANがついに幕を閉じた!

みんなからパワーをたくさんもらえたのでアメリカで自信持ってお給仕できることでしょう。そして鍛えて帰ってきます。

アメリカのみなさんよろしくお願いします。

#bandmaid
en:
The other day, we had our first okyuji in a while at eggman! Thank you to everyone who came. 

We even played the new song "influencer," which wasn't in the setlist! It's been ages since we did something like that! Live shows are so much fun. 

BAND-MAID PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN has finally come to a close! 

Thanks to all the power you gave us, I’m sure we’ll be able to perform confidently in America. And I’ll come back even stronger! 

Looking forward to seeing everyone in America! 

#bandmaid

jp:
2022.9.9
PRE US OKYUJI@shibuya eggman

ラストは我等のホームeggman🥚
ありがとうございました！！

何年経ってもスタッフさんみんながおかえりと暖かく迎えてくれるので、実家に帰ってきたようなポカポカした気持ちになる。

そんな大好きなeggmanでPRE US OKYUJI in JAPANのラストを飾る事が出来てとっても嬉しかったです！！

みんなとの距離が近いのも嬉しかった！

楽しすぎて一瞬だった全5公演。
大阪、名古屋、仙台、東
en:
2022.9.9  
PRE US OKYUJI @ Shibuya Eggman  

The last show was at our home, Eggman 🥚  
Thank you so much!!  

No matter how many years pass, the staff always warmly welcomes us back with "Welcome home," making me feel all warm and fuzzy, like I've returned to my family.  

I was so happy to be able to wrap up the PRE US OKYUJI in JAPAN at my beloved Eggman!!  

I also loved how close we were to everyone!  

The five shows flew by in an instant; they were so much fun!  
Osaka, Nagoya, Sendai, Tōno...

en:
It's already that time...  
Our new EP "Unleash" will be released next week!!! On September 21st!  

In the lead-up to the release, I thought I’d share a bit about the songs without giving away too much (*´꒳`*)  

M-1: "from now on" is...  
Surprisingly, it's an instrumental track✨✨  
We've been playing it at recent okyuji too!  

The members have been asking for an orchestral instrumental track for a while, so we finally made that request come true!!!✨  

The first limited edition will include the Music Video for "from now on" on Blu-ray!

en:
Whispering a little secret (｀･ﾉω･´)

Our new EP "Unleash" is coming out this week!!! It's on September 21... it's almost here (｀･ﾉω･´)

Today, in preparation for the release, I'll introduce some of the songs without giving away too much... but since it's late at night, I'll keep it a bit hush-hush...

M-3: Unleash!!!!!  
A song themed around the second chapter of World Domination! I'm so happy to hear that the anime MV we released has been well received!! 💞 I can't help but watch it over and over 💞

M-4: Sense  
Starting with an orchestral intro, this is becoming a staple song for BAND-MAID!

The new EP "Unleash" is coming out this week!!! September 21st! Just 2 more days✨

Today, we’ll introduce some tracks without giving away too much...

M-5: I'll  
This is the song that Sai-chan said, "I want a song like this!" and we finally made it happen! I wonder if we can show you a new side of BAND-MAID…? (･ω･三･ω･)

M-6: Corallium  
This track has become a popular one during our okyuji💞  
From Mincho's perspective, I think the way it starts and the guitar solo turned out super cool! What do you think...? (｡´•ㅅ•｡)

本日わたしお誕生日でした〜✨
沢山のお祝いのメッセージありがとうございます〜(*´꒳`*)💞

あっという間に1年経って、びっくりしています！！

そしてそして久しぶりにサプライズでメンバーにお祝いしてもらいました😭💞💞

突然電気が真っ暗になって、さいちゃん達がハッピーバースデーを歌いながらケーキ持ってきてくれたんですが、完全に自分の事じゃないと思って一緒になってハッピーバースデー歌って盛り上げてしまったアホな私でごじゃります(　ﾟωﾟ)

メンバーからもらう誕生日プレゼントも
en:
Today was my birthday~✨ Thank you so much for all the wonderful messages of celebration~ (*´꒳`*)💞

I can’t believe a year has gone by so quickly!!

And guess what? I was surprised by the members who celebrated with me after a long time! 😭💞💞

Suddenly, the lights went out, and Sai-chan and the others came in singing Happy Birthday while bringing a cake. I totally thought it wasn’t for me and ended up singing along with them like a fool (　ﾟωﾟ)

I also received birthday presents from the members~

🕊  
I was just writing about how it feels like September...  
But wait, tomorrow is already October! LOL  
It's been a while! This is Kobato!  

We’ve successfully wrapped up the 5 shows in Japan for our PRE US okyuji.  
Thank you so much! 🕊  

And on September 21, we released our new EP,  
『Unleash』.  
I’m sure everyone reading this has already been listening to it a lot, right?  

This time, the limited edition is super luxurious!  
The cover is all sparkly✨ and looks amazing🌟🌟—so cute and powerful!

en:
🕊🎨❤️  
The other day, I had the pleasure of visiting the wonderful chalk art exhibition "BORDERless"! 🕊  

The pieces created by Moeco (@moecochalkartonly) were so incredibly three-dimensional and immersive that it was hard to believe they were made with chalk! They were truly beautiful!! ✨ Not only the artwork, but the neon light piece that said "Love and Peace" really hit the spot for Kobato's taste! ❤️ The entire space of the exhibition was just amazing!! 🕊  

@moecochalkart  
#moecochalk

あと
en:
🇺🇸USA🕊  
10/9  
AFTERSHOCK  

The long-awaited day has finally arrived!  
Our performance at the festival, which kicked off our time in the US, was incredibly hot and intense 🔥. I turned into a boiled pigeon, but the cheers and excitement from the amazing audience made it so much fun, turning it into a wonderful okyuji.  

To my surprise, I got to chat with the lovely three from The Warning, and we talked about wanting to collaborate! ✨  

We even got to take a photo with The Pretty Reckless!  

Also...

遂に!!
USツアー完走しました(´；ω；｀)
約1ヶ月...13公演…
ここまで頑張って来れたのは、大好きなメンバーと支えてくれたBAND-MAID Crewの皆んな、そして応援してくれたご主人様、お嬢様のおかげです！！
来年の1/9 には10周年の幕開けであるガーデンシアターが待っていますので、USツアーで成長した私たちの姿を見せられれば嬉しいです✨

ひとまず本日
GUNS N' ROSES JAPAN TOURのサポートアクトが待っています❗️
こちら楽しんで盛り上げたいと思います
en:
Finally!!  
We’ve completed our US tour (´；ω；｀)  
About a month... 13 shows...  
We’ve made it this far thanks to my beloved members, the amazing BAND-MAID Crew supporting us, and all the Masters and Princesses cheering us on!!  
On January 9th next year, we have the Garden Theater waiting for us, which marks the beginning of our 10th anniversary, so I’d be thrilled to show you the growth we’ve achieved during the US tour✨  

For now, today we’re supporting the GUNS N' ROSES JAPAN TOUR❗️  
I’m looking forward to enjoying it and making it an exciting experience!

jp:
BAND-MAID on GUNS N' ROSES JAPAN TOUR🔥
#bandmaid #gunsnroses
#bandmaid #gunsnroses #thankyou

2022.11.6
"GUNS N' ROSES JAPAN TOUR"@さいたまスーパーアリーナ

サポートアクトとしてBAND-MAID出演させていただきました！

サポートアクトとしてお誘いいただけた事、同じステージに立てた事、本当に嬉しいです。光栄です。

最っっっ高に楽しかった！！

ありがとうございました！！！！！

#bandmaid #gunsnroses
en:
On November 6, 2022  
"GUNS N' ROSES JAPAN TOUR" @ Saitama Super Arena  

We had the honor of performing as a support act for BAND-MAID!  

I’m truly happy to have been invited as a support act and to have shared the same stage. It’s such an honor.  

It was absolutely, incredibly fun!!  

Thank you so much!!!!!!!  

#bandmaid #gunsnroses

いつのまにか年末ですがっぽ！
今年はクリスマスっぽいことを🎄
出来たのでお裾わけっぽ！

小鳩といつも仲良くしてくれてる
みゆちゃん @raita_miyu の
誕生日お祝いと
クリスマス前ディナーしたっぽ。
3枚目は知らない間に撮られてた
隠し撮りっぽww
気づいたらもう10年くらいの仲ですっぽ。

25日は毎年祝わせてくれてる
えとぴこ @eto444_  と
誕生日お祝いandクリスマスを
しましたっぽ🕊🕊
えとぴこと過ごすクリスマスは
もはや定番にな
en:
🕊  
Before we knew it, it's already the end of the year! This year, we were able to do something Christmas-y 🎄, so here's a little share!  

I celebrated the birthday of my dear friend Miyu-chan @raita_miyu, who always gets along well with Kobato, and we had a pre-Christmas dinner together. The third photo was secretly taken without me knowing, lol. Can you believe we've been friends for about 10 years now?  

On the 25th, I celebrated with Etopiko @eto444_ as usual, combining birthday celebrations and Christmas! Spending Christmas with Etopiko has become a tradition now. 🕊🕊

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2023
#bandmaid

謹賀新年
Happy New Year 2023

2022年は
久々の有観客お給仕ができたり
US Tourに行けたり
溜まったパワーを
発散するような1年になりましたっぽ。
今年はBAND-MAIDにとって
記念すべき10周年目の年。

en:
Happy New Year 2023!

In 2022, we were able to perform in front of an audience for the first time in a while and even went on a US Tour. It felt like a year where we could unleash all the pent-up energy! This year marks a significant milestone for BAND-MAID as we celebrate our 10th anniversary. We want to make it the best year ever! 🕊

Thank you all for your continued support this year as well!

#bandmaid #happynewyear 
#2023 #YearOfTheRabbit #miffy
#Image by Kobato

2023.1.9

本当に本当に、楽しい夜でした。

お気持ち、音で伝わってたらいいな

演奏中、今まで体験したことのない感情になった
こんな感情を味わえる人生で本当によかった

そんな夜でした

みんな大好きです！
一人一人に伝えたい気持ちです

今年はたくさんステージに立てそうなので
とても楽しみです

2023 BAND-MAID 10周年　良い年になりますように。

#bandmaid
en:
January 9, 2023

It was truly, truly a fun night.

I hope my feelings were conveyed through the music.

During the performance, I experienced emotions I've never felt before. I'm really grateful to have a life where I can feel such things.

It was a night like that.

I love everyone! I want to express my feelings to each and every one of you.

It looks like I'll be able to stand on stage a lot this year, so I'm really looking forward to it.

Here's to a great year for BAND-MAID as we celebrate our 10th anniversary in 2023!

#bandmaid

jp:
new bass

今回もお世話になっているBLACK CLOUDのボスに
考えたデザインお願いしたらそのまんま再現してもらいとてもかっこ良いイケオジみたいなベースが誕生しました。
ジャガーシェイプ、5弦、PJピックアップ。

昨日、突然一曲目から使ったので
ん？と思った方も多いと思うのでご紹介🍺

#bandmaid
en:
New bass

I asked the boss of BLACK CLOUD, who has been taking care of us again this time, to create a design I thought of, and he perfectly recreated it, resulting in a super cool, handsome-looking bass! It’s a Jaguar shape, 5-string, with PJ pickups.

Yesterday, I suddenly used it from the first song, so I think many of you were like, "Huh?" Here’s the introduction! 🍺

#bandmaid

en:
🕊🎸  
On January 9, 2023,  
we kicked off our 10th anniversary at the Ariake Garden Theater with an okyuji! 🕊  

Hearing everyone's voices during the okyuji was just the best!  
It was quite a tough setlist, but how did you all enjoy it? 🕊  

Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses who watched the stream!  

Thank you for your watching and comments po!!  

And we also announced our tour!  
This year, we’ll be flying around both domestically and internationally!

jp:
2023.1.9@東京ガーデンシアター

BAND-MAID 10th Anniversary tourが3月からスタートします。

そしてツアーファイナルは、私達の目標だった横浜アリーナ。

ついにきたね。本当に嬉しいです。

10周年、盛大にお祝いしましょ！
今年も突き進みます！ついてきて！

photo by @kawado_photo 

#bandmaid
en:
2023.1.9 @ Tokyo Garden Theater

The BAND-MAID 10th Anniversary tour will kick off in March!

And the tour finale will be at Yokohama Arena, which has been our goal.

It's finally here! I'm really happy about it.

Let's celebrate our 10th anniversary in style! We're going to keep pushing forward this year! Stay with us!

photo by @kawado_photo 

#bandmaid

時間が経つのは早いですね！！！！！

en:
2023.01.09

#TokyoGardenTheater

It's already been over a week since this okyuji ended (･ω･三･ω･)💦

Time flies, doesn't it!!!!!!! 
I had so much fun... (´；ω；｀)💕 
I do wish I could go back to that day again...

But guess what! This year, we announced a tour! ✨ 
I’m so excited to visit so many different places (*´꒳`*)💓

The tour finale will be at Yokohama Arena on 11/26! ✨ 

It's been my dream to stand here for so long (｀･ω･´)

en:
♡  
⁡  
Thank you so much for the birthday wishes this year!  
⁡  
The wonderful flowers and amazing gifts—I'm truly grateful from the bottom of my heart.  
I'll show them off in a photo! Please take a look.  
I'm filled with happiness!  
I feel so lucky.  
Seriously, thank you!  
⁡  
To make this a fantastic year and to become my own version of a song princess,  
I’ll do my best and keep pushing forward!  
I appreciate your continued support!  
⁡  
Thank you very much.  
LOVE!  
⁡  
#bandmaid  
#saiki

やほ。みんな元気？
春の匂いがするね〜
温かいとアクティブになりますね。

ご紹介が遅れましたが
前回載せたベースの色違いの子を。
珍しくソニックブルーです！レリック加工して頂いたらかなり渋くなりました。

en:
Hey there! How's everyone doing?  
You can really smell spring in the air~  
When it gets warm, I feel so much more active!  

Sorry for the late introduction, but here’s the color variation of the bass I posted last time.  
It's a rare Sonic Blue! After getting the relic finish done, it turned out really cool.  

I've been using it for practice and recording.  

The more I play it, the better it sounds!  

#blackcloud  
#blacksmorker  
#bandmaid  
#5string  
#5弦ベース

jp:
🕊🕊
遅くなりましたが
遂に10周年アニバーサリー
ツアーが始まりましたっぽ。

まずは九州編。
小鳩の愛する地元熊本からスタートし、
鹿児島、福岡とお給仕しましたっぽ。

熊本ではド緊張をかました小鳩タイムが
今でも若干恥ずかしいっぽ。w
でもいつ帰っても暖かい九州は
やはり最高でしたっぽ🕊

全SOLD OUTもありがとうございましたっぽ！

2023.3.23 熊本B.9 V1 1枚目から3枚目
3.25 鹿児島 CAPARVO HALL 4枚目から7枚目
en:
🕊🕊  
Sorry for the delay, but our 10th Anniversary Tour has finally begun!  

First up is the Kyushu leg. We kicked things off in Kobato's beloved hometown of Kumamoto, then moved on to Kagoshima and Fukuoka for our performances.  

In Kumamoto, Kobato's super nervous "Kobato Time" is still a bit embarrassing for me, haha. But no matter when I return, the warmth of Kyushu is just the best! 🕊  

Thank you all for the full SOLD OUT shows!  

2023.3.23 Kumamoto B.9 V1 from the 1st to the 3rd show  
3.25 Kagoshima CAPARVO HALL from the 4th to the 7th show

jp:
10TH ANNIV. TOUR NORTH AMERICA-T

#bandmaid #bmnorthamericatour2023

MAID KANJI-T

#bandmaid #bmnorthamericatour2023

10TH ANNIV. KAGAMI-T

#bandmaid #bmnorthamericatour2023

🕊🕊
九州の次は関西編
神戸、京都、大阪へ。

神戸はあーちゃんの出身地だし🍌
京都は言わずもがな小鳩の大好きな場所で🍵
大阪はさいちゃんの阪神タイガース🐯
ということで
こちらも沢山盛り上がりましたっぽね！！

京都は皆様が待ち望んでたであろう
BAND-MAIKOさんの出演は
叶わなかったですが、
私達が敬意をこめて
BAND-MAIDver.つまり原曲で
BAND-MAIKOのアルバム曲を
やらせていただきましたっぽ🕊

九州でも思ったけど、
やっぱ
en:
🕊🕊  
After Kyushu, it's time for the Kansai edition!  
Heading to Kobe, Kyoto, and Osaka.  

Kobe is A-chan's hometown 🍌  
Kyoto is, needless to say, Kobato's favorite place 🍵  
And Osaka is Sai-chan's Hanshin Tigers 🐯  
So it looks like we had a blast here too!!  

In Kyoto, we know everyone was eagerly waiting for  
BAND-MAIKO's appearance,  
but unfortunately, that didn't happen.  
However, with great respect,  
we performed the BAND-MAID version, meaning the original songs,  
from BAND-MAIKO's album 🕊  

I thought this in Kyushu too,  
but after all...

Thanks to everyone!  
Thank you.

jp:
❂
⁡
⁡
⁡
こんな暑苦しい日々なのに冬服！！！失礼しまーす
⁡
可愛いアクセサリー教えてもらったからね。お伝えしなきゃー！と思ってたのにね。
月日は流れ(また言ってるよ)今になってもうた！
ま。いいよねー
見てってよー
⁡
⁡
私の耳にいらっしゃるピアス！
可愛いね〜？そうだよね〜
わかる〜似合う〜
⁡
シルバーアクセサリー大好きだけどシルバーだけ所持しているわけではないんだよ〜？ってな。そんな中の一つです♡
⁡
ブランドは @onov_official_ ね。
en:
❂

Even on these sweltering days, I'm wearing winter clothes!!! Excuse me!

I was told about some cute accessories, and I thought I had to share! But time has passed (I'm saying it again), and here we are now! Well, it's fine, right? 

Take a look!

Here are the earrings I have on! Aren't they cute? Right? I know, they suit me well!

I love silver accessories, but I don't only own silver ones, you know? This is just one of them ♡

The brand is @onov_official_!

2023.7.9  
NIIGATA LOTS  

When it comes to sake, it's got to be Niigata!!  
It was our first okyuji in Niigata in a while.  
In the first photo, I caught MISA-chan during the MC with Sai-chan and made her talk. LOL  
MISA-chan is just so adorable!

jp:
🌏🇯🇵🕊
日本ツアー振り返り

2023.7.15
SHIZUOKA ROXY

静岡は本当にあつあつな
お給仕だったっぽ！！
MCでは大好きな
沼津みなと新鮮館の歌を
披露しましたっぽ。w
詳しくてさいちゃんが
若干ひいてたっぽ。
ぽ？知らない？？
とっても耳に残る
素敵なお歌っぽ。
写真1枚目は
『おまじないタイムしてたら
メンバーが急にいないっぽ！！
神隠しにあったっぽ？！』

#bandmaid #静岡 #鰻 #沼津みなと新鮮館 #お給仕 #tou
en:
🌏🇯🇵🕊  
Looking back on our Japan tour

2023.7.15  
SHIZUOKA ROXY

Shizuoka was really a hot and steamy okyuji!!  
During the MC, we performed a song from Numazu Minato Shinsenkan, which I absolutely love. LOL  
Sai-chan was a bit taken aback by how detailed I was.  
What? You don’t know??  
It’s such a catchy and wonderful song!  
In the first photo, it looks like while we were doing our "magic time," the members suddenly disappeared!!  
Did they get spirited away?!  

#bandmaid #Shizuoka #eel #NumazuMinatoShinsenkan #okyuji #tou

jp:
7月のお給仕振り返りっぽ🕊
🌏🕊🇯🇵

2023.7.19
KAWASAKI CLUB CITTA'

あーちゃんに
おまじないタイムを
乗っ取られましたっぽ。

衝撃の出来事でしたっぽ。

なんか、、悔しかったっぽ。

負けないっぽ！！！

(すっごく面白くて
崩れ落ちましたっぽ。
お給仕も暑くて激しくて
楽しかったっぽ！！
アメリカ前の最高の
お給仕になりましたっぽ。)

小鳩がこの日
死んで生き返った
あのシーンは次の投稿っぽ。
お楽しみ
en:
Looking back at July's okyuji 🕊  
🌏🕊🇯🇵  

2023.7.19  
KAWASAKI CLUB CITTA'  

I got totally hijacked by A-chan during the spell time.  

It was a shocking event.  

Honestly... I felt a bit frustrated.  

I won't lose!!!  

(It was super funny, and I just crumbled with laughter. The okyuji was hot, intense, and so much fun!! It turned out to be the best okyuji before heading to America.)  

Kobato's scene where she died and came back to life that day will be in the next post. Stay tuned!

BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY TOUR in JAPAN

2023.7.15 @ LIVE ROXY SHIZUOKA  
2023.7.19 @ Kawasaki CLUB CITTA'

In Kawasaki, I totally hijacked Kobato's spell-casting time 🫶 (sorry!)

In July's domestic tour, I received so many smiles and so much energy from everyone! Thank you!

I'm looking forward to the North America tour in August too 🔥

✐
⁡
Lollapalooza 2023 in Chicago
⁡
It was a wonderful time!
Thank you very much.
⁡
⁡
「まさか！」体験をしてきた日でしたねー。
偉大なフェスに出演したこと。オーディエンスのみんなが目の前に居てくれて一緒に音楽を楽しんだこと。その場に居ない人たちまでもが喜び感動してくれたこと。
素晴らしい時間で、とっても幸せだったー。
⁡
私自身、味わったことのない緊張に包まれていたよ！ぷるぷるしてた！笑
けど。不
en:
✐  
⁡  
Lollapalooza 2023 in Chicago  
⁡  
It was a wonderful time!  
Thank you very much.  
⁡  
It was a day filled with "No way!" experiences.  
Performing at such a great festival, having the audience right in front of us enjoying the music together, and even those who weren't there feeling joy and emotion.  
It was an amazing time, and I was so happy!  
⁡  
I was wrapped in a level of nervousness I’ve never experienced before! I was shaking! Haha  
But...

今年もお誕生日を迎えましたー✨💓
お祝いのメッセージたくさんありがとうございます✨
みなさんにハッピーを届けられるような楽曲作りも、ギターも頑張ります!!!

今年、BAND-MAIDは10周年です💓
11/26にある横浜アリーナに向けてあと2ヶ月!!精一杯成長したいと思います！！

Today is my birthday!
Thank you for always supporting me.

I'll do my best to bring happiness to eve
en:
This year, I've celebrated my birthday! ✨💓  
Thank you so much for all the birthday messages! ✨  
I'll work hard on creating songs that bring happiness to everyone, as well as on my guitar skills!!!  

This year, BAND-MAID is celebrating our 10th anniversary! 💓  
With just 2 months to go until our show at Yokohama Arena on 11/26, I want to grow as much as I can!!  

Today is my birthday!  
Thank you for always supporting me.  

I'll do my best to bring happiness to everyone!

昨日は11/11 #thebassdaylive2023 に出演させて頂きました！

とても楽しくて、みんなそれぞれのステージングがかっこく、ものすごく酒が進みました。

吉田一郎さん、前田遊野さん、一緒に演奏してくれて本当にありがとうございました。

特別な一日に感謝！
en:
Yesterday, we had the honor of performing at #thebassdaylive2023 on 11/11! 

It was so much fun, and everyone’s staging was super cool, making the drinks flow even more! 

A huge thank you to Ichirō Yoshida and Yūno Maeda for playing with us. 

Grateful for such a special day!

jp:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY
TOUR in JAPAN

2023.9.30@高松MONSTER

28日がお誕生日だったKANAMI🎸
お誕生日おめでとう🥳🎂

みんなでお祝い楽しかったー！
お面まで用意してるの笑ったw

かなみが作る曲で私は日々成長させてもらっています！いつもありがとう！

数年前にもう10年以上の付き合いだね〜早くてビックリだね〜とか話してたけど、一緒にバンド結成してから10年経ったよ！こっちの方がビックリだ！

この先
en:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY  
TOUR in JAPAN  

2023.9.30 @ Takamatsu MONSTER  

On the 28th, it was KANAMI's birthday 🎸  
Happy Birthday! 🥳🎂  

It was so much fun celebrating together! I laughed at how we even prepared masks, lol.  

Thanks to the songs KANAMI creates, I get to grow every day! Always grateful!  

A few years ago, we were talking about how we've known each other for over 10 years—time flies, right? But it's been 10 years since we formed the band! That's even more surprising!  

From here on out...

BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY

jp:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY
TOUR in JAPAN

2023.10.15@小樽GOLD STONE

MISAお誕生日おめでとう🎉
今年も0時ピッタリの瞬間にみんなで集まってお祝い出来て嬉しかったな！！

MISAと私はソウルメイトらしい。(診断結果で出たってMISAが言ってた)

リズム隊の相方がソウルメイトだなんて最強最高じゃないの！！

もう10年以上の付き合いだけど、ずっと赤ちゃんみたいで可愛くて尊い👶
いつも癒してくれて＆笑わせてくれ
en:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY  
TOUR in JAPAN  

2023.10.15 @ Otaru GOLD STONE  

Happy Birthday, MISA! 🎉  
I was so happy that we could all gather together to celebrate right at midnight this year!!  

MISA said that she and I are soulmates (that was the result of a quiz).  

How amazing is it that my rhythm section partner is my soulmate?!  

We've been together for over 10 years, but she's still like a cute little baby, precious as ever 👶.  
Always healing me and making me laugh!

jp:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY
TOUR in JAPAN

2023.10.20@なんばHATCH

お誕生日前日がお給仕だった鳩様🕊️
ミクのお誕生日も0時ピッタリにみんなでお祝い出来て嬉しかったなー！
お誕生日おめでとう🐦🎂🎉❤️

結成当初、慣れない環境でものすごく緊張していた私を優しく暖かく迎え入れてくれて、とっても救われました。頼しさは10年経った今も変わらず！

顔可愛いのに中身は男前のミクに、これからもいっぱい甘えさせてもらいます！
en:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY  
TOUR in JAPAN  

2023.10.20 @ Namba HATCH  

The day before the birthday was an okyuji for our dove 🕊️  
I was so happy that we could all celebrate Miku's birthday right at midnight! Happy birthday! 🐦🎂🎉❤️  

When we first formed, I was so nervous in the unfamiliar environment, but everyone welcomed me so warmly and kindly, and it really saved me. My trust in you hasn't changed even after 10 years!  

I’ll keep relying on Miku, who looks cute but has a strong heart!

jp:

残すは11月26日ツアーファイナル、横浜アリーナ。

念願のステージ。

8ヶ月間の10周年ツアーと、結成10年間の想いを全て届けます。

横アリで会いましょう！
en:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY  
TOUR in JAPAN  

2023.10.13 @ Sapporo PANNY LANE (📷1~3)  
2023.10.25 @ Nagoya DIAMOND HALL (📷4~7)  

The only date left is the tour finale on November 26 at Yokohama Arena.  

A long-awaited stage.  

We’ll deliver all our feelings from the 8-month-long 10th anniversary tour and our 10 years as a band.  

See you at Yokohama Arena!

2023 11.26 横浜アリーナありがとうございました！
ずっと夢だった横浜アリーナでお給仕が出来て、本当に本当に幸せな時間でした。

10年間BAND-MAIDをこの5人でやれたのは、
沢山の人のサポートのお陰です。

BAND-MAIDチームは本当に暖かく優しい人ばかりで、いつも親身に相談に乗ってくれて、時には厳しく率直に意見を言ってくれる人たちです。このチームだから、ここまで成長出来ました。感謝しかありません。
BAND-MAIDチームのみんなが大好きです、、
これからも頑張ります
en:
Thank you so much for Yokohama Arena on November 26, 2023! It was truly a dream come true to perform at Yokohama Arena, and I had such a happy time.

Being able to spend the last 10 years as BAND-MAID with these five members is all thanks to the support of so many people.

The BAND-MAID team is filled with warm and kind individuals who always listen to me and offer advice with genuine care. They can also be strict and straightforward when needed. It's because of this team that we've been able to grow so much. I can only express my gratitude. I love everyone in the BAND-MAID team so much... I’ll keep doing my best from here on out!

#g

BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY TOUR FINAL
2023.11.26@YOKOHAMA ARENA

横浜アリーナありがとうございました！

私が初めて生でライブを観て、バンドの素晴らしさを知ったのがこの場所でした。

いつか自分もこのステージに立ちたいという大きな夢と目標を持ってドラムを始めた、青春の思い出がたくさん詰まった場所。

BAND-MAIDで横浜アリーナのステージに立てた事が本当に嬉しくて幸せです。

熱しやすく冷めやすい私が10年もバンドを
en:
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIVERSARY TOUR FINAL  
2023.11.26 @ YOKOHAMA ARENA  

Thank you, Yokohama Arena!  

This is the place where I first watched a live concert and discovered the greatness of bands.  

It’s filled with memories of my youth, where I started drumming with a big dream and goal to someday stand on this stage.  

I’m truly happy and grateful to have stood on the Yokohama Arena stage with BAND-MAID.  

For someone like me, who easily gets fired up and then cools down, it’s incredible that I’ve been in this band for 10 years!

ᐝ
⁡
⁡
みんなはアドベントカレンダー好き？
私は好っき！
⁡
今年はLEGOのSTAR WARSアドベントカレンダーにしてまして、毎日小窓を開けて、組み立てて楽しんでいる
戦わせて遊んでいる
⁡
⁡
出だしから「パルパティーンまだかなまだかな」ってそわそわしてる
クリスマス特製コスチュームを手にとって早く見たい
見たい見たい見たい
やっぱりラストに出てくるつもりなのか。どうなんだろうな
⁡
⁡
#bandmaid
en:
Hey everyone, do you like Advent calendars? I love them! 

This year, I got the LEGO STAR WARS Advent Calendar, and I'm having a blast opening a little window every day and building the pieces. I'm even playing battles with them! 

From the start, I've been anxiously wondering, "Is Palpatine coming yet?" I can't wait to see the special Christmas costume! I really want to see it! I wonder if it's going to show up at the very end. What do you think? 

#bandmaid

jp:
こんばんは〜今年ももうすぐ終わりですね〜

今年は10周年ツアーで、GARDEN THEATERから始まり、たくさんの場所を巡りました。
ひとつひとつのお給仕を忘れないように忘れないように…と大切にギターを弾いてきたのですが、やっぱりライブというものは最高だと思えた一年でした🥲

ツアーファイナルの横浜アリーナをやって、また目標が色々できたのと、作りたい曲も増えましたので！

また来年も楽しみに待っていていただけると嬉しいです！

そうだ！
ツアーファイナル横浜アリーナの再配信もちょ
en:
Good evening~ The year is almost over, isn’t it? 

This year, we kicked off our 10th anniversary tour at GARDEN THEATER and traveled to many places. I’ve been cherishing each performance, making sure to remember every single one as I played my guitar… and I truly believe it was a year that reminded me just how amazing live shows are 🥲

After the tour finale at Yokohama Arena, I’ve set various new goals and have more songs I want to create!

I’d be so happy if you could look forward to next year as well!

Oh! By the way, the re-broadcast of the tour finale at Yokohama Arena is also…

[御礼]
2023年はBAND-MAIDにとっての結成10周年。

全てのご主人様、お嬢様にお力添えを頂きましたことで、10周年を素晴らしい年として終えることができました。
改めて皆様に感謝を申し上げます。

2024年は新章開幕の年となります。
来年もBAND-MAIDに大いにご期待ください。
良いお年を。

The year 2023 was the 10th anniversary for BAND-MAID, and with your help, we were able t
en:
o end this milestone year on a wonderful note. We sincerely thank all of our Masters and Princesses for your support.

The year 2024 will mark the beginning of a new chapter. Please look forward to more from BAND-MAID next year. Wishing you a Happy New Year! 🎉

#BANDMAID #10thAnniversary #NewChapter

[皆様へお詫びとお知らせ]
本日のKT Zepp yokohama公演で販売致しますFLAG LS-Tですが、製造業者のミスにより、一部誤ったバックプリントで納品がなされました。
メンバー・スタッフで協議しました結果、
本日だけの特別販売アイテムとして販売はそのまま行わさせていただきます。
正しいデザインのものは後日オンラインショップにて販売させていただきます。
小鳩ミクの着用画像は本日販売する一部誤ったバックプリントデザインのものとなります。
ご理解の程、宜しくお願い致します。
#band
en:
[Apology and Announcement to Everyone]  
We would like to inform you that the FLAG LS-T that will be sold at today's KT Zepp Yokohama performance has some incorrect back prints due to a manufacturing error.  
After discussions among the members and staff, we have decided to proceed with the sale as a special item for today only.  
The correct design will be available for sale at our online shop at a later date.  
The image of Kobato Miku wearing the item features one of the incorrect back print designs that will be sold today.  
Thank you for your understanding.  
#band

2024.2.22
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIV. TOUR 番外編
@ KT Zepp Yokohama

2024年、最高のお給仕始めをありがとうございました！！

今回は横浜アリーナの番外編お給仕という事で。

横アリのセットリストに入りきらなかった曲達を中心にお届けしました！

横アリの候補に挙がっていた曲を全部入れたら50曲以上になってしまうからね…泣く泣くセトリからさようならしたのですが。

こうして"番外編"という形でみんなに届ける事が出来てとても嬉しかっ
en:
2024.2.22  
BAND-MAID 10TH ANNIV. TOUR Spin-Off Okyuji  
@ KT Zepp Yokohama  

Thank you for starting off 2024 with the best okyuji!!  

This time, since it was a spin-off okyuji from Yokohama Arena, we focused on delivering the songs that couldn't fit into the setlist!  

If we had included all the songs that were considered for Yokohama Arena, it would have ended up being over 50 songs... so we sadly had to say goodbye to some in the setlist.  

I'm really happy we could deliver this in the form of a "spin-off"! 😊

🕊🌏
2024.3.20
アコースティックお給仕でしたっぽ。
有観客では2019年以来の2回目。
配信を含めると3回目。
すごく緊張したけど、
画像を見てつたわるように
素敵な時間でしたっぽ。
皆様にゆるやかで素敵な時間を
お届けできたでしょうかっぽ？？
メイドさんと森。良きですっぽねぇ。

It was an acoustic OKYUJI po.
It's the second time since 2019 in the audience po.
This is th
en:
e third time if you include the streaming po.  
I was really nervous, but as you can see from the pictures, it was a wonderful time po.  
I hope we were able to deliver a relaxing and lovely experience to everyone po??  
Maid and the forest. It was nice po, right?

2024.3.20
BAND-MAID ACOUSTIC OKYUJI@LINE CUBE SHIBUYA

アコースティックお給仕ありがとうございました！

久々のアコースティック、とっても楽しかったです。

メンバーの鳴らす音と歌声、一音一音に包まれるような感覚。演奏していてとても心地良かったなぁ。
みんなの拍手も暖かい音で鳴り響いていました。

ステージのセットも凄いでしょ🌳？
森の中で演奏しているような幻想的なステージ。

素敵な時間をみんなと過ごせて嬉しかったです！
en:
Thank you for the acoustic okyuji! 

It was so much fun to do an acoustic set after a long time. 

The sounds and voices from the members felt like they wrapped around me, and it was really comfortable to play. Everyone's applause resonated with such warm sounds. 

The stage setup was amazing, right? 🌳 It felt like we were performing in the middle of a forest, such a magical atmosphere. 

I was really happy to spend such a wonderful time with everyone!

jp:
𓇠
⁡
⁡
「3月はアコースティックお給仕だぁ、ドキドキするー」と過ごしていたなぁって
終わってからふと気付く。無我夢中に少しばかりのがむしゃらで鍵盤と向き合っていたなぁ。皆さまのやわらかい表情を想像しながら。なーんて言葉を置いてこ
⁡
⁡
私の活力は、皆さまの反応でしかない。喜んでくれたらいいなって素敵な時間を一緒に過ごせたらいいなって見た事ない景色をこれからも一緒に。って感じ
なーんて言葉も置いてこ置いてこ
⁡
⁡
お給仕は歌のアプローチに変化をつけて
言葉がより届く様に歌っ
en:
𓇠

"I was thinking, 'March is going to be an acoustic okyuji, I'm so nervous!' and then it hit me after it was all over. I was so focused, almost lost in the moment, facing the keyboard. Imagining everyone's soft expressions. Just leaving those words behind.

My energy comes solely from everyone's reactions. I hope you enjoyed it, and I hope we can share wonderful times together, seeing new sights from now on. Just leaving those words behind too.

During the okyuji, I changed up my approach to the songs to make the words resonate even more."

jp:
アコースティックライブの思い出を少しずつ載せていきますね。

ほんと、素敵なセットだったね。

お客さん側から自分たちの演奏してるところ、観たいなぁとか思っている。（一生無理）

みんな本当にありがとう！！

📷 @pickles_0808
en:
I'll be sharing memories from the acoustic live little by little. 

It was such a wonderful set, wasn't it? 

I sometimes think it would be nice to see ourselves performing from the audience's perspective. (But that's impossible for life!) 

Thank you all so much!! 

📷 @pickles_0808

jp:
2024.3.20
BAND-MAID ACOUSTIC OKYUJI

素敵な空間でとっても久しぶりに有観客でのアコースティックお給仕ができました

アルバム制作もあるので色々並行しつつでしたが、
横アリ終わってからすぐに準備し始めたんです〜

アコースティックアレンジは難しいけど、
いつものスタイルとは違う表現が出来るので
それがまた面白くてハマってしまいますね、、

できれば年1でやりたい、、♡

心地よく感じて癒されていただけたなら嬉しいです♡
ご帰宅ありがとうござい
en:
2024.3.20  
BAND-MAID ACOUSTIC OKYUJI

We were finally able to hold an acoustic okyuji with an audience in a wonderful space after such a long time! 

With album production going on, we were juggling a lot, but we started preparing right after Yokohama Arena! 

Acoustic arrangements are challenging, but they allow us to express ourselves in a way that's different from our usual style, which is really interesting and addictive... 

If possible, I’d love to do this once a year... ♡ 

I’m so happy if you felt comfortable and were able to relax! ♡  
Thank you for coming home!

たくさんの笑顔に囲まれて、きょんこちゃんらしくて本当に素敵な卒業コンサート。

en:
#Hinatazaka46 #SaitoKyokoGraduationConcert  
I had the privilege of witnessing it.  

The stage was filled with Kyoko-chan's love, and you could really feel her emotions.  

Surrounded by so many smiles, it was a truly wonderful graduation concert that was so very Kyoko-chan.  

It was absolutely beautiful.  

I hope your future is overflowing with happiness.  

Congratulations on your graduation, Kyoko-chan! 🤍🤍

jp:
皆様お久しぶりですっぽ🕊
cluppoですっぽ。
この度、スマホゲーム東方LostWordの
MVプロジェクトにボーカルアーティストとして
参加させていただきましたっぽ！
歌詞にはcluppoらしさも
感じられるようにしていただき光栄ですっぽ♡
MVの為に描き下ろしてくださった
秦こころちゃんもとっても可愛いっぽ〜！
鳩のお面なんだっぽぉ！！🕊🕊
かわかっこよい楽曲、
沢山見て聴いて欲しいですっぽ〜

そして明日、30日に4周年を迎える東方LostWord！
記念すべき日
en:
Hello everyone, it's been a while! 🕊  
This is cluppo.  
I'm excited to share that I've participated as a vocal artist in the MV project for the mobile game Touhou LostWord!  
I'm honored that the lyrics reflect my style as well! ♡  
The artwork for the MV by Koto Hata is super cute!  
It's a pigeon mask! 🕊🕊  
I hope you all get to see and listen to this cool and stylish song!  

And tomorrow, on the 30th, Touhou LostWord will celebrate its 4th anniversary!  
A momentous day!

2024.5.1
INCUBUS ASIA TOUR 2024 in JAPAN

INCUBUS来日公演のSPECIAL GUESTとして出演させていただきました。

お給仕で初披露したMike Einzigerさんとのコライト曲「Bestie」では、Mikeyがギターを弾いてくれて一緒に演奏をして。夢のようなお給仕でした。

6人で演奏している時、Mikeyとの出会いやコライト期間中に経験させてもらった数え切れない程の思い出が溢れてきて、胸が熱くなりました。

INCUBUSの皆様、
en:
2024.5.1  
INCUBUS ASIA TOUR 2024 in JAPAN  

We had the honor of performing as a SPECIAL GUEST at the INCUBUS concert!  

During our okyuji, we debuted our co-written song "Bestie" with Mike Einziger, who played guitar for us. It felt like a dream come true.  

As we played together as a six-member band, countless memories from my encounters with Mikey and our co-writing period flooded back, and my heart swelled with emotion.  

Thank you to everyone at INCUBUS!

jp:
つい最近、FREE THE TONEにボードを組んでもらったので
今日写真を公開しちゃう。

5月から使っております。

ボリュームペダルと電源をフリーザトーンのものに変えたら
音が格段に良くなりました。
スイッチャーも新しくレベルアップ。

今日もメイドの日のライブで使いましたよーん。

フリーザトーン様最高です、ありがとう！！！🇯🇵

#bandmaid #freethetone
en:
I recently had a board put together by FREE THE TONE, so I'm sharing a photo today! 

I've been using it since May. 

After switching to a volume pedal and power supply from Free The Tone, the sound has improved dramatically. The switcher has also been upgraded to a new level. 

I used it again today for the Maid Day live performance! 

FREE THE TONE is the best, thank you!!! 🇯🇵 

#bandmaid #freethetone

jp:
2024.5.10
BAND-MAID "THE DAY OF MAID 2024"

メイドの日ありがとうございました！！

今年はみんなとお給仕が出来て嬉しかったです！

メイドの日らしいセトリだったよね〜凄かったわ〜(色々と)

遊びまくってしまったけど大丈夫だった？みんなついてこれてた？

MCが一番体力もっていかれました。あー！楽しかった！

メイドの日最高！
小鳩先輩の筋肉も最高！

Photo by @pickles_0808 

#bandmaid #メ
en:
2024.5.10  
BAND-MAID "THE DAY OF MAID 2024"

Thank you for Maid Day!!

I was so happy to be able to serve with everyone this year!

The setlist was totally fitting for Maid Day—it was amazing! (In so many ways)

I had a blast, but was it okay? Could everyone keep up?

The MC took the most energy out of me. Ah! It was so much fun!

Maid Day was the best!  
Kobato-senpai's muscles are the best too!

Photo by @pickles_0808 

#bandmaid #メ

jp:
2024.05.10 
"BAND-MAID THE DAY OF MAID 2024"

1曲目からBLACK HOLEでなかなか大変でした、、
今回のセットリストは難しい曲が多くて、よく頑張ったと思うのです><
(頑張ったね〜って褒めてくだせぇ、、🙂💕)

1枚目は演奏中ではなくMCでただ遊んでるだけですすみません

8枚目は小鳩の筋肉ファンがたくさんいると思うので、サービスショットですありがとうございますありがとうございます…！！

10枚目は新入り#prsguitar く
en:
2024.05.10  
"BAND-MAID THE DAY OF MAID 2024"

It was quite a challenge starting with BLACK HOLE from the very first song...  
This time, the setlist had a lot of difficult songs, and I think we did really well ><  
(Please praise us for our hard work~ 🙏💕)

The first photo is just us having fun during the MC, sorry about that!

The eighth photo is a special shot for all the Kobato muscle fans out there, thank you so much...!!

The tenth photo features our new member #prsguitar!

jp:
メイドの日
あたすビール飲んでライブ大好きね

なんとメイドの日の有観客は5年ぶりだそうで
とても楽しゅうございましてん。

セトリがえげつなかったので
もう振り切って遊びまくってたけど笑笑
強すぎセトリ、楽しかったなあ。

またレベルアップできたような気がします。

ああもっとライブやりたい！
足りないわ！！！

📷 @pickles_0808
en:
Maid Day  
I love drinking beer and live shows!  

It seems that this is the first time in 5 years that we have an audience for Maid Day, and it was so much fun!  

The setlist was insane, so I just let loose and had a blast, haha!  
The setlist was too strong; it was such a good time.  

I feel like I've leveled up again.  

Ah, I want to do more live shows!  
It's just not enough!!!  

📷 @pickles_0808

ZEPP TOURのリベンジマッチで

en:
Memory...🕊po  
2024.5.10  
"BAND-MAID THE DAY OF MAID 2024"

It felt like a day full of fun and laughter.  
Looking at the photos makes me miss the okyuji so much! 🕊  
It’s been 5 years since we had a real Maid Day event.  
As expected, the okyuji is just the most fun! 🕊  

ZEPP HANEDA was a long-awaited rematch for the ZEPP TOUR we had planned for 2020, and we finally made it happen! Clap clap! 👏  

It was a day where we la...

𓇠
⁡
⁡
⁡
またあっという間に時は流れているのに
⁡
まだまだメイドの日余韻のわたしです
⁡
楽しそうなわたしをご覧になって
⁡
⁡
4枚目はMCの時だけど
KANAMIちゃんと話しながら「目が、目が大きいねぇ、本当にとてつもなくでかい、まんまるだぁ、どうなってんだ？瞳まで綺麗だなぁ、おっと！吸い込まれそう」と思っておりましたことをここに記録しとこ。そうしとこ
⁡
⁡
⁡

@pickles_0808
⁡
#bandmaid
en:
𓇠

Time has flown by once again, but I'm still lingering in the afterglow of Maid Day.

Seeing my happy self!

The fourth photo is from when we were doing MC, but while talking with KANAMI-chan, I thought, "Wow, her eyes are so big! They're truly enormous and perfectly round. What's going on? Even her pupils are beautiful! Oh wow, I could just get lost in them." Just wanted to record that here. 

Thank you!  
@pickles_0808

#bandmaid

jp:
さぁ、届きました。

BLACK SMOKER MISAモデル！！！！！

1番感動したのは
シゲネチャーなのにレリック加工あり、
ピックガードの削り加工あり
すごいです。私のベースとほとんど同様。
本当に完成度が高くて、なんならかなり良く鳴ってくれるようなので
ライブで一軍で使用するかも。
まずはレコーディングで使って家でたくさん弾いて育てよっと。

いつもですが…こちらのベースもかなりデザインこだわらせてもらってね、、要望そのままを作ってもらいました！

ケースもかっこいい
en:
Alright, it has arrived!

The BLACK SMOKER MISA model!!!!!!!

What impressed me the most is that even though it's a Shige signature, it has relic processing and a carved pickguard. It's amazing! It's almost identical to my own bass. The level of craftsmanship is really high, and it sounds fantastic, so I might use it as my main bass for live shows. First, I'll use it for recording and play it a lot at home to get it well-acquainted.

As always... I was really particular about the design of this bass, and they made it just as I requested!

The case is cool too!

[Thank you]

"BAND-MAID × The Warning" Special Show in Japan
皆様ご来場ありがとうございました！

今夏発売のアルバムに収録予定の、
BAND-MAIDとThe Warningとのコラボレーション曲
"SHOW THEM"　をサプライズで初披露！

BAND-MAID x The Warning” Special Show in Japan
Thank you very much for coming to our show!
en:
"BAND-MAID × The Warning" Special Show in Japan  
Thank you all for coming!  

We surprised everyone with the first live performance of our collaboration song "SHOW THEM" with The Warning, which will be included in our album set to release this summer!

jp:
2024.06.12
BAND-MAID × The Warning" Special Show in Japan

忘れられない日になりました…
「一緒にライブをしよう」と話してから、本当に実現できました！
そして曲も一緒に作り、8人で演奏しました。
8人の力で最高にロックな曲が出来てしまったです…!!
(観た人も観れなかった人も聴きたいですよね？楽しみに待っててください！)

6/1から一緒に過ごして、Dany、Pau、Aleの事が大好きになり、ライブが終わった時に寂しく涙が止まりま
en:
2024.06.12  
BAND-MAID × The Warning" Special Show in Japan

It became an unforgettable day...  
After talking about "Let's do a live show together," it really came true!  
We even created songs together and performed as eight people.  
With the power of all eight of us, we ended up making an incredibly rockin' song...!!  
(Those who saw it and those who couldn't are probably eager to hear it, right? Please look forward to it!)

Since spending time together from June 1st, I've grown to love Dany, Pau, and Ale so much, and when the live ended, I couldn't stop the tears of loneliness...

jp:
2024.6.12
"BAND-MAID × The Warning" Special Show in Japan

大好きなThe Warningとの2マンライブを実現する事が出来て、本当に嬉しくて楽しくて感動の1日でした。

8人で作って演奏した「SHOW THEM」最高だったね。
Pauとのツインドラム、大興奮でした。

みんなと過ごした濃密で楽しい時間は、忘れられない大切な思い出です。みんなの事がもっと大好きになって絆が深まりました。

また必ず一緒にライブしようね！
メキシ
en:
2024.6.12  
"BAND-MAID × The Warning" Special Show in Japan  

I’m really happy, excited, and moved that we were able to hold a two-man live show with my beloved The Warning.  

The performance of "SHOW THEM," created and played by all eight of us, was absolutely amazing. The twin drums with Pau were exhilarating!  

The intense and fun time spent together is an unforgettable and precious memory. I’ve grown to love everyone even more, and our bond has deepened.  

Let’s definitely do another live show together again!  
Mexico 🇲🇽

jp:
The Warningとの思い出☺︎
制作期間中、アニメトークで盛り上がってオタ活して、ラーメンと焼肉食べに行った！Danyとは3回ラーメン行った🍜

みんながメキシコの可愛いお人形とお菓子をプレゼントしてくれました！私達5人をイメージして選んでくれたんだって！嬉しすぎる…！

大切に飾っています。Gracias♥️

#bandmaid #thewarning
en:
Memories with The Warning ☺︎  
During the production period, we got really into anime talks and had some otaku fun, plus we went out for ramen and yakiniku! I went for ramen with Dany three times 🍜  

Everyone gifted us cute dolls and sweets from Mexico! They chose them with the five of us in mind! I'm so happy...!  

I'm cherishing them on display. Gracias♥️  

#bandmaid #thewarning

jp:
TVアニメ『グレンダイザーU』の完成披露試写会にご招待いただき、第一話を観てきました！

大迫力の戦闘シーンとストーリー展開に終始興奮。
見入っていたらあっという間に本編が終わり、ED映像と楽曲のリンクに感動して…感情大忙しでした。

EDテーマ「Protect You」と共に作品を盛り上げていきたいです！

2024年7月5日(金)放送開始！

そして、放送開始日の7月5日に「Protect You」デジタルリリースが決定しました！

ティザー映像や配信ジャケットのアートワークも公
en:
I was invited to the premiere screening of the TV anime "Grendizer U" and got to watch the first episode!

The intense battle scenes and story development kept me on the edge of my seat the whole time. Before I knew it, the main episode was over, and I was moved by the connection between the ending visuals and the song... my emotions were all over the place!

I want to elevate the project along with the ending theme "Protect You"!

It starts airing on July 5, 2024 (Friday)!

And on the same day, July 5, the digital release of "Protect You" has been confirmed!

Teaser visuals and the artwork for the distribution jacket will also be revealed!

"BAND-MAID × The Warning"  
Special Show in Japan  

I was so happy to have the best night!  
We surprised everyone with the debut of our collaboration song "SHOW THEM," which will be included in our upcoming album, and I'm thrilled it was well-received! I hope you're looking forward to its release!  

I can't wait to do okyuji with The Warning again! I'm looking forward to the day we can meet again.

2024.6.28
"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024"@名古屋市公会堂

ホールツアーが始まったぞーーーー！
ツアー初日、名古屋ありがとうございました！

初日から飛ばしまくり、最高のスタートをきりました。
かなみの覚醒を久しぶりに見た気がする。凄かった。笑

会場のみんなのノリの良さと対応力の高さに拍手！
楽しかったね！いっぱい笑ったね！

今回も自信満々のセトリで挑んでおります。

新曲「Protect You」
en:
2024.6.28  
"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024" @ Nagoya City Hall  

The hall tour has begunーーーー!  
Thank you, Nagoya, for an amazing first day!  

We kicked off with a bang right from the start. I feel like I saw Kanami's awakening after a long time. It was incredible. LOL  

A round of applause for everyone in the venue for their great energy and responsiveness!  
We had so much fun! We laughed a lot!  

We're coming at you with a setlist full of confidence this time too.  
There are many new challenges, and it's packed with excitement.  

New song "Protect You" 🎶

"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024"@フェニーチェ堺 大ホール

大阪ありがとうございました！

晴れ女パワー発揮しちゃって天気良過ぎ！(猛暑)
会場のみんなの熱量もすご過ぎ！あっちぃ〜

アニメ愛も語れて満足です。

激アツな1日サイコーーーーー！！

集合写真のポーズなんだか分かる？
メンバーが大好きなアレとアレね。
大阪で爆食いしましたよ。

お次はツアーファイナル、神奈川県民ホール！

学生時代の青春の地。
吹奏楽コンクールの
en:
2024.7.5  
"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024" @ Fenice Sakai Large Hall  

Thank you, Osaka!  

The sunny girl power really showed, and the weather was too nice! (Scorching heat)  
The energy from everyone at the venue was incredible! So hot~  

I’m satisfied that we got to talk about our love for anime.  

What an intense day, it was psychoooooo!!  

Can you guess the pose in the group photo?  
It’s something the members love, that and that.  
We had a feast in Osaka!  

Next up is the tour finale at Kanagawa Prefectural Hall!  

The place of my youthful days in school.  
The wind ensemble competition...

jp:
BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024
2024.6.28
愛知・名古屋市公会堂

この日はかなみちゃんが覚醒した日っぽ。
ついに始まったBAND-MAID初のホールツアー。
激しさ伝わる夜だったのではないでしょうかっぽ？！
かなみちゃんの犯行現場は最後の2枚に、、。

It seems like this day was the day Kanami awakened po!
BAND-MAID's first hall tour has finally begun po.

2024.6.28

It seems like this day was the day Kanami-chan awakened po!  
BAND-MAID's first hall tour has finally begun po.  
It must have been a night filled with intensity, don't you think?!  
Kanami-chan's crime scene is in the last two photos... 😊

jp:
2024.7.5
BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024
大阪・フェニーチェ堺　大ホール

大阪の夜はいつも沢山の笑いがありますっぽねぇ！
さいちゃんの🐯のお歌も聞けましたっぽね！
ホールはいつもの会場とはまた違った雰囲気で
皆様楽しんでいただけでますでしょうかっぽ？！
ステージもかっこいいでしょっぽ？！

さて、ここで問題ですっぽ！
一枚目の写真は大阪の何を表しているでしょうかっぽ？！？
ちなみに2枚目はたこ焼きですっぽ🕊
メンバーみんな好きなんですっぽー！！
en:
2024.7.5  
BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024  
Osaka, Fenice Sakai Large Hall  

The nights in Osaka are always filled with so much laughter, aren’t they?!  
We got to hear Sai-chan’s 🐯 singing too!  
The hall has a different vibe from our usual venues—  
I hope everyone is enjoying themselves?!  
The stage looks cool, right?!  

Now, here’s a question!  
What does the first photo represent about Osaka?!?  
By the way, the second photo is takoyaki! 🕊  
All the members love it so much!!

jp:
2024.7.14🕊
BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024
神奈川県民ホール

早いものでホールツアー最終日から
もう6日が経ちましたっぽ。
ホールツアーはいかがでしたかっぽ？！
この日は私のEVHちゃんの
テンションが上がりすぎてしまったみたいで
2曲目から音が鳴らなくなって
サプライズでしたっぽ。w
でも、ちゃんと伝書鳩さんなので
帰ってきてくれましたっぽね。
良かったよかったっぽ。
トラブルも生ならではの特別ということで
また一つ思い出が増えましたっぽね。
en:
2024.7.14🕊  
BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024  
Kanagawa Prefectural Hall  

Time flies! It’s already been 6 days since the final day of the hall tour. How was the tour for you?! On that day, it seems my EVH-chan got a little too excited, and the sound stopped working from the second song—what a surprise! 😂 But, being the reliable carrier pigeon that she is, she came back to us! Thank goodness! It’s great that even the troubles became a special part of the live experience, adding another memory to cherish.

jp:
2024.7.14
"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024"@神奈川県民ホール

ホールツアー無事完走！
ありがとうございました！

ずっとやりたかった初ホールツアーは、嬉しい事がたくさん。そして笑顔がたくさんのツアーでした。

爆上げセトリも良かったでしょ？
最高だったわー！

何が起こるか分からないし、同じ日なんて存在しない。
だからライブって本当に楽しい！生き甲斐だ！

また私達はパワーアップした！
まだまだいくぞー！

お知らせも盛り沢山〜

アル
en:
2024.7.14  
"BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024" @ Kanagawa Prefectural Hall  

We successfully completed the hall tour!  
Thank you so much!  

Our first hall tour, which we’ve wanted to do for so long, was filled with so many happy moments and smiles.  

The setlist was totally explosive, right? It was the best!  

You never know what’s going to happen, and no two days are the same.  
That’s why live shows are so much fun! They’re my reason for living!  

We’ve powered up again!  
We’re not done yet!  

We have lots of announcements coming up~  

Album...

jp:
中学・高校時代にトロンボーンを吹いていた私へ。

2024年の夏は吹奏楽コンクールではなく、BAND-MAIDのホールツアーで神奈川県民ホールのステージに立つことが出来たよ。

ただいまカナケン！
ドラマーとして帰ってくるという夢が叶ったね。

おめでとう私！ありがとうみんな！

音楽を続けてきて本当に良かった！

Photo by @pickles_0808
en:
To me, who played the trombone in middle and high school:

This summer of 2024, instead of a concert competition, I got to stand on the stage of Kanagawa Prefectural Hall for BAND-MAID's hall tour!

I'm back in Kanaken! My dream of returning as a drummer has come true.

Congratulations to me! Thank you, everyone!

I'm so glad I continued with music!

Photo by @pickles_0808

en:
I totally forgot to post this even though A-chan took so many great photos! Sorry, Mincho-san... 

Anyway, better late than never! 
Here’s the wonderful outfit I wore in the MV for "Bestie," coordinated by SAIKI-sensei! ♡♡

On September 25, 2024, our new album "Epic Narratives" will be released, and it will include "Bestie," which also has an MV. So please look forward to it a lot! 🫶♡

jp:
Aleが可愛くて可愛くて、可愛かったです。
二人ともシャイだからいざ話すとなると緊張してなかなか話せない二人。
でも最終日は沢山話せて、バイバイする時はとても寂しくて泣いた。

また会いたいなぁ。　

他にもAleとの写真あるのでまた載せるね〜

#bandmaid #TheWarning #SHOWTHEM #bassist #shygirl
en:
Ale was so cute, incredibly cute, just adorable! Both of them are shy, so when it comes to talking, they get nervous and can’t really chat. But on the last day, we were able to talk a lot, and when it was time to say goodbye, I felt really lonely and cried. 

I want to see them again. 

I have more photos with Ale, so I’ll share those later~ 

#bandmaid #TheWarning #SHOWTHEM #bassist #shygirl

jp:
本日はSUMMER SONIC 2024

昨日はRISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2024 in EZO

なんと夏フェス2日連続でした♡♡

なんとも暑くて熱くて溶けそうな夏フェスが大好きでたまらんのです！！♡

#サマソニ は5回目との事で！たくさん出演させていただき本当に嬉しいです！🫶💚

#ライジング は前回台風で出演出来なかったのですが、今回リベンジが出来て本当に嬉しかったです！🫶💙

9/25にリリース予定のNew Album "Epic Na
en:
Today is SUMMER SONIC 2024!

Yesterday was RISING SUN ROCK FESTIVAL 2024 in EZO.

Can you believe it? Two summer festivals back-to-back! ♡♡

I absolutely love summer festivals that are hot and intense to the point of melting! ♡

This is our 5th time at #サマソニ, and I’m truly thrilled to be performing so much! 🫶💚

For #ライジング, we couldn’t perform last time due to a typhoon, so I’m really happy we got to make a comeback this time! 🫶💙

Our New Album "Epic Na" is set to release on 9/25!

en: It looks like the okyuji is about to start!

jp:
[お知らせ]

本日はお足元の悪い中、皆様ご来場ありがとうございました。

今公演では大変多くのお申し込みをいただきまして、誠にありがとうございます。
また台風などの影響により、本日ご来場が叶わなかったお客様も多数いらっしゃることと存じております。

そこで三日間という短い期間ではございますが、
いつも支えてくださっているお盟主様の会の皆様に向けて、後日、本公演の一部の無料動画配信を行わさせていただきます。

詳細は後日発表させていただきます。

今後ともBAND-MAIDへの応援
en:
[Announcement]

Thank you all for coming today despite the bad weather.

We received an overwhelming number of applications for this performance, and we truly appreciate it. We also understand that many of our customers were unable to attend today due to the impact of the typhoon.

Therefore, although it's a short three-day period, we will be providing a free video stream of some parts of this performance for the members of OMEISYUSAMA-NO-KAI who always support us.

Details will be announced later.

We look forward to your continued support for BAND-MAID!

jp:
New Album "Epic Narratives"が
9月25日に発売しますので♡

みんなで発売日が楽しみ〜♡♡を共有したいのです！
今日から少しづつ投稿していくので、ふお〜とご覧くださいまし！

01-Magie 
BAND-MAIDらしくハードなリフやハードなギターソロは欠かせない！と思い意識しつつ。。でもサビはみんなでジャンプして踊れるイメージを大切に作りました♡
リフはスライドを駆使していて、意外と難しいのです。

お給仕で盛り上がる定番曲になったら嬉しいなーと思っている
en:
Our new album "Epic Narratives" will be released on September 25th! ♡

I want to share everyone's excitement for the release day! ♡♡ Starting today, I’ll be posting little by little, so please stay tuned!

01-Magie  
I thought it was essential to have hard-hitting riffs and intense guitar solos, just like BAND-MAID! But I also focused on creating a chorus that everyone can jump and dance to. ♡  
The riffs use slides, and they’re surprisingly challenging!

I’d be so happy if it becomes a classic song that gets everyone hyped during our okyuji!

jp:
New Album "Epic Narratives"が
9月25日に発売しますので♡少しづつ曲紹介をしていますよ〜！

03-Protect You
TVアニメ「グレンダイザーU」のEDテーマということもあり、疾走感はありつつ激しすぎない楽曲になるよう意識しましたとさ！
ド頭から思わず歌いたくなってしまうようなメロディをイメージしてるので、お給仕でも是非歌って貰いたいのです！！ギターソロはメロディアスかつテクニカル意識して作っていて、弾いていて楽しいので是非カバーしてもらいたいです♡

0
en:
Our new album "Epic Narratives" will be released on September 25th, so we're gradually introducing the songs! ♡

03 - Protect You
Since this is the ending theme for the TV anime "Grendizer U," I aimed to create a song that has a sense of speed but isn't too intense! I envisioned a melody that makes you want to sing right from the start, so I really hope you’ll sing it during okyuji!! The guitar solo is both melodic and technical, and it’s a lot of fun to play, so I’d love for you to cover it! ♡

jp:
③New Album "Epic Narratives"が
9月25日に発売しますので♡少しづつ曲紹介をしていますよ〜！

06-Bestie

INCUBUSのMike Einzigerとさんと共作させていただきました。フェスをきっかけにこんな光栄な事があるなんて…マイキーちゃんは本当に優しくて、周りの人を自然と笑顔にしてしまう素敵な人なんです。
マイキーちゃんが来てくれて、たくさん色んなお話をして、私たちにたくさんのアイディアをくれました。そして今回このBestieはマイキーちゃんのくれた
en:
Our new album "Epic Narratives" will be released on September 25th, so we're gradually introducing the songs! ♡

06-Bestie

I had the honor of co-writing this with Mike Einziger from INCUBUS. It's such a privilege to have this opportunity thanks to a festival... Mikey is truly kind and has a wonderful ability to make everyone around him smile naturally. He came to visit us, shared so many stories, and gave us tons of ideas. And this time, "Bestie" is inspired by what Mikey shared with us!

jp:
9月25日発売のNew Album "Epic Narratives"！
もう少しですね〜🥹楽しみ！！！
少しづつ曲紹介をしていますよ〜♡

07-Brigthest star 
久しぶりの小鳩曲！「POPな私」をテーマに小鳩の可愛さを引き立たせられたらと思い作りました！お給仕でギターソロを小鳩がメインで、それを一緒に弾けたら嬉しいな〜という気持ちで入れています♡
カッティング増し増しで弾いていて楽しいのですが、小鳩曲だからこそ出せる遊び心ありの曲になりまちた！
お給仕でももう聴けた方いら
en:
The new album "Epic Narratives" is set to release on September 25th! Just a little longer now~ 🥹 I'm so excited!!! We're gradually introducing the songs too~ ♡

07 - Brightest Star
It's been a while since we had a Kobato song! I created this with the theme of "the poppy me," aiming to highlight Kobato's cuteness! During the okyuji, Kobato takes the lead on the guitar solo, and I would be so happy if we could play it together~ ♡ 
It's super fun to play with lots of cutting, and since it's a Kobato song, it turned into a playful track that really shines! Have any of you already heard it during the okyuji?

en:
Here’s the rehearsal version of "Forbidden Tale."  
This is the chorus.  

Since this song has a lot of twists and turns, I think the impression will change dramatically when you listen to it all the way through.  

I can't wait to see everyone's reactions!  

Only a little bit longer until the release of "Epic Narratives" on 9/25!!!!  

#bandmaid

jp:
2024.8.30
"BAND-MAID番外編お給仕 Medium in Summer" @Spotify O-EAST

最高に楽しい夏の思い出。

遊びに来てくれたみんな、お盟主様限定配信で観てくれたみんな、ありがとうございました！

ミディアムテンポの曲を中心にお届けしました。
新鮮だったでしょ？感動しちゃったでしょ？

配信を観ながら夏の終わりに浸っていたよ。

番外編ならではの特別なお給仕になりました。

次回の番外編お給仕は、福岡と札幌。
地方でも番外編をやれるな
en:
2024.8.30  
"BAND-MAID Spin-Off Okyuji Medium in Summer" @Spotify O-EAST  

What an incredibly fun summer memory!  

Thank you to everyone who came to hang out and to all the Masters who watched the exclusive stream!  

We focused on medium-tempo songs. It was refreshing, right? You were moved, weren't you?  

I was soaking in the end of summer while watching the stream.  

It turned into a special okyuji that you can only experience in a spin-off.  

The next spin-off okyuji will be in Fukuoka and Sapporo.  
We can definitely do spin-offs in the regions too!

jp:
9月25日発売のNew Album "Epic Narratives"について今夜も紹介していきます♡

10-Memorable 
USツアー中にメロディを作りました。
久しぶりに有観客でのお給仕が出来て、みんなの笑顔を久しぶりにステージから見ることが出来て、、とても幸せでした。
そんな暖かい気持ちを想いを残せたらと思って作りましたが、今ではたくさんこの曲をお給仕でみんなと共有できる事がまた幸せになっています。

お給仕では、小鳩がアコースティックギターを弾いて、私はサビに入るまでシングル
en:
Tonight, we're continuing to introduce our new album "Epic Narratives," which will be released on September 25th! ♡

10-Memorable
I created this melody during our US tour. It was such a joy to perform in front of an audience again after a long time and to see everyone's smiles from the stage... I was truly happy. I wanted to capture that warm feeling, and now I'm even happier to share this song with everyone during our performances.

During the shows, Kobato plays the acoustic guitar, and I sing until we get to the chorus.

「Epic Narratives」から「TAMAYA!」の今日のリハーサル風景です。

本日フラゲした方もいることでしょう。

ちなみにこの曲は、スラップとピックの切り替えが激しくて
弾きごたえがとてもあるので

#bandmaid #EpicNarratives #5strings #ベース
en:
Here’s a glimpse of today’s rehearsal for "TAMAYA!" from "Epic Narratives." It's fresh and exciting! 

Some of you might have gotten an early listen today. 

By the way, this song has a lot of intense switching between slap and pick techniques, making it super satisfying to play. It could be fun to check that out in the audio too! 

#bandmaid #EpicNarratives #5strings #bass

en: @misa_bandmaid The way you switch between the pick and slap is just amazing! I can't help but watch every time!

jp:
11-Go easy 
Unleashとほぼ同じ時期に制作していました！Unleashとはまたテイストの違うBAND-MAIDらしい疾走感を追い求めた曲なのです。
イントロ頭のメロディをみんなで一緒に歌いたいなと思って入れているので、是非覚えてくださいまし♪
お給仕でも何度か披露していますね！
疾走感があるイントロのギター短音フレーズと、Bメロの短音フレーズは弾いてて楽しくお気に入りです♡♡

#bandmaid
en:
11-Go easy  
We were working on this around the same time as Unleash! It's a song that captures a different vibe from Unleash while still embodying that signature BAND-MAID rush.  
I hope everyone can join in and sing along to the melody at the beginning of the intro, so please remember it! ♪  
We've performed it a few times during our okyuji too!  
The short guitar phrases in the intro have such a lively feel, and I really enjoy playing the short phrases in the B section as well! ♡♡  

#bandmaid
