jp:
#bandmaid
#EpicNarratives

#bandmaid
#EpicNarratives

9/25 Epic  Narratives リリースしましたー
ぱちぱちぱち

3年半かけて想いを注いで出来たアルバムは、とても深くて。
一曲一曲への気持ちはずっしり重いね。

「Toi et moi」はデモの段階でライブしてる私たちが想像できてテンション上がった記憶がある。
ベースラインもシンプルだけど音含めて耳に残りやすいというのを意識して作った。弾いていて楽しい。
まあ要は、、、ワタシのお気に入りの一曲です。

で、さっき練習がてらに弾いてみたので暇な時見てください！

#b
en:
We’ve released "Epic Narratives" on 9/25! 🎉🎉🎉

This album, which we poured our hearts into over three and a half years, is incredibly deep. Each song carries a heavy emotional weight.

I remember getting really excited during the demo stage of "Toi et moi," imagining how we would perform it live. The bass line is simple, but I made sure it sticks in your ears along with the sound. It’s fun to play!

In short... it’s one of my favorite songs! 

I just played it during practice, so check it out when you have some free time! 

#b

jp:
本日9月25日New Album "Epic Narratives"が発売されましたー！！✨パチパチぱちぱち👏

お給仕で披露してない新曲についてはまだなの〜？！と待っていたご主人様、お嬢様〜♡

今夜から新曲達を紹介していきます♡

08.Letters to you
毎日を一生懸命過ごしていると、大変なことも疲れることも落ち込むこともあると思うのです。
そんな時、心に染み渡るような
聴いてくれてるあなたに寄り添えるような曲が作れたら、、と思い作りました。

さいちゃんは曲を聴い
en:
Today, September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" has been released! ✨ Clap, clap, clap! 👏

To all the Masters and Princesses who have been waiting for the new songs that we haven't performed during our okyuji yet, it's finally time! ♡

Starting tonight, we'll be introducing the new tracks! ♡

08. Letters to you  
I believe that when you're living each day to the fullest, there can be tough times, exhausting moments, and times when you feel down.  
During those times, I wanted to create a song that resonates with your heart and can be by your side as you listen to it.  

Sai-chan is listening to the song...

jp:
9月25日New Album "Epic Narratives"が発売されましたー！！
もう聴いてくれてますか？💚💚

今夜も曲紹介していきますね🫶

9.The one
実は横浜アリーナの最後でやる曲を作ったら？と言われて作り始めた曲。
実際には横浜アリーナではやらなかったんですが、最後にやるなら…というか、
もし横浜アリーナが最後になってしまう事があったとしても悔いはない！と思って作りました。

永遠はないかもしれないけど、人と人との繋がりがずっと続けばそれが存在すると私は思
en:
On September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" was released!! Have you listened to it yet? 💚💚

Tonight, I'll be introducing a song 🫶

9. The one  
This song was actually created after I was asked, "What if you made a song for the last performance at Yokohama Arena?" Although we didn't end up performing it there, I thought, if it were to be our last, I wouldn't have any regrets! 

Eternity might not exist, but I believe that as long as the connections between people continue, that is what truly matters.

9月25日New Album "Epic Narratives"が発売されました♡
曲紹介もあと数曲、、
たくさん作ってきたな〜🥹

12-Toi et moi
BAND-MAIDらしい力強いリフと少しダークな楽曲。アルバムにこういう曲は欠かせないかなと思い制作しました！
リフは何パターンかやり直してこのパターンに決定しまして、最初の小鳩シャウトに合わせてギターもシャウトさせるイメージで入れました。
ギターソロは、コピーしていただき易いフレーズで、尚且つ弾いてて楽しいフレーズにしましたので
en:
On September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" was released! ♡  
We still have a few more songs to introduce... We've created so many! 🥹  

12 - Toi et moi  
This track features a powerful riff typical of BAND-MAID, with a slightly dark vibe. I thought it was essential to have a song like this on the album, so I worked on it!  
We went through several variations of the riff before settling on this one, and I envisioned the guitar shouting along with Kobato's initial shout.  
The guitar solo is designed to be easy to copy while also being fun to play!

jp:
KANAMI
#bandmaid

今日は私のお誕生日でした〜💚💚💚

みなさまお祝いのメッセージ本当にありがとうございます！！

"アルバム発売お疲れ様会!"と共に少し前にメンバーと食事に行ってお祝いしてもらってたのです🥂💕

気を使う事なく美味しい物をゆっくり味わえるし、どうでもいい話でゲラゲラ笑いあえるメンバーと過ごせるのは最高なのです〜〜🫶

そして今日はMISAちゃんの家でゆっくり過ごさせてもらいました♡♡
ここ数年、自分の誕生日も作業に追われお仕事ばかりだったので…こんなにもゆっくり過ごせたお誕生日
en:
Today was my birthday~ 💚💚💚

Thank you so much for all the birthday messages, everyone!!

I celebrated with the members a little while ago with a "Album Release Celebration!" dinner 🥂💕

There's nothing better than being able to enjoy delicious food slowly without worrying about anything, and spending time with members who can make me laugh with silly stories~ 🫶

And today, I got to relax at MISA-chan's house♡♡ 
For the past few years, my birthdays have been filled with work and deadlines... so this has been the most relaxing birthday ever!

jp:
9月25日New Album "Epic Narratives"が発売されました♡曲紹介ですが、今回で一旦少しお休みです…!!
(なんでかはもう少しお楽しみに……♡)

14-Get to the top
SAIKI先生から、やはりアルバム曲にはインスト曲が必要だと言われ、今回のアルバムで最後に作った曲になりました！
前回のインスト曲"from now on"はダークロックだったので今回は真逆の方向性にしたく、メロディラインを明るめに…まるでサーカスを見ているようなドキドキ感？や、胸が躍る楽曲を
en:
On September 25th, our new album "Epic Narratives" was released! ♡ As for the song introductions, we're taking a little break this time...!! (You'll find out why soon... ♡)

14 - Get to the top  
SAIKI-sensei told us that an instrumental track is essential for the album, so this became the last song we created for it! Since the previous instrumental track "from now on" had a dark rock vibe, I wanted to go in the completely opposite direction this time, making the melody line brighter... It’s like experiencing the thrill of a circus, a song that makes your heart dance!

And also,

If you're coming,

jp: New Music Video!!!!

BAND-MAID / Forbidden taleのMVが公開されました！

素敵な場所で撮影させていただき、そして美しいMVが完成しました🥹

9月25日にリリースしたNew Album "Epic Narratives"の楽曲紹介を長らくしておりましたが、Forbidden taleの紹介で最後になります！

05-Forbidden tale
「人生」とは「生きるとは」など
BAND-MAID史上一番大きいテーマで制作させていただきました。
3年半色々ありました。
その中で考
en:
BAND-MAID / The music video for "Forbidden tale" has been released!

We had the opportunity to shoot in a wonderful location, and the beautiful MV has been completed 🥹

We've been introducing the songs from our new album "Epic Narratives," which was released on September 25, and this will be the final introduction with "Forbidden tale"!

05 - Forbidden tale
The theme of "life" and "what it means to live" is the biggest theme we've tackled in BAND-MAID's history. It's been a journey of three and a half years, and during that time, we've thought a lot about...

jp:
先日、 @blacksmokerguitar にお邪魔してきました！
今後出荷されるシグネチャーベースに数本ですがサインをさせて頂きましたー！
とても嬉しかった。

長い期間待っていてくれている方もいると言うことで、
少しでも感謝の気持ちが伝わればいいなぁ、と。

ちなみにピックガードの内側の方にサインしたので笑
探してみてください！！！

#bandmaid #blackcloud #blacksmoker
en:
The other day, I visited @blacksmokerguitar!  
I signed a few of the signature basses that will be shipped out soon!  
I was really happy to do it.  

I know there are some of you who have been waiting for a long time, so I hope my gratitude comes through, even just a little.  

By the way, I signed on the inside of the pickguard, so make sure to look for it!!!  

#bandmaid #blackcloud #blacksmoker

Thank you to everyone who came to ZEPP TOUR!!

photo by @pickles_0808 

#bandmaid #東京

今の衣装で、懐かしの黒ベースを弾いたのは初めて
なんだか感慨深い。
この子は今回バラード、ミドルな曲で使ったよ。
弾き比べたら、もう一本のメインの黄色いJBがトゲトゲイケイケな音に比べて、黒ベースは落ち着いた低音も強い丸みがある優しい音でした。
シグネチャーになっているPJもいつも通りがっつり使いました。

全部キャラが違って面白いよね！
BAND-MAIDは幅広い曲が揃っているので、ベースチェンジしがいがある。

zeppツアーみんなありがとう！！！！！！

今も制作中で、ベースラ
en:
It's the first time I've played the nostalgic black bass in this outfit. It feels quite sentimental. I used this one for a ballad and a mid-tempo song this time. When I compared it to my main yellow JB, which has a sharp and edgy sound, the black bass had a calm low end with a strong, rounded, and gentle tone. I also used my signature PJ as usual.

Each one has a different character, which is really interesting! BAND-MAID has such a wide range of songs, so it's great for switching up basses.

Thank you everyone for the Zepp tour!!!!!!!!!

I'm still in the process of creating, and the bass... 🎸

It's been a while! Here’s a clothing post. 

I treated myself to a reward from my dream brand, COMME des GARÇONS, because I worked really hard this year!

#bandmaid

jp:
先日、The Verbsを観にbillboard Tokyoに行ってきまして。
スティーブ・ジョーダンさんのドラムが本当にえげつなくて堪らなかったです。一人で観に行ってたんだけどもう、楽しくて、、本当に心の中で興奮していました。

母が昔から「ほんとに！グルーヴが凄すぎて止まりそうなドラムなのよ！」ってずっと熱弁していたのが、深く理解できた次第です。

やっと観に行けて幸せなひと時でした。

このバンドではギターに徹する奥田民生さんも素晴らしかった〜
私は民生さんの歌声、センスも好きだけど
en:
The other day, I went to Billboard Tokyo to see The Verbs. Steve Jordan's drumming was absolutely insane and I couldn't get enough of it. I went alone, but I was having so much fun... I was genuinely excited inside my heart.

My mom has always passionately said, "Really! The groove is so incredible, it feels like the drums could stop at any moment!" and now I truly understand what she meant.

It was a happy moment finally getting to see them.

Okuda Tamio, who focused on guitar in this band, was also amazing~ I love his singing voice and sense too!

やっぱり会話が酒の肴。

幸せなひと時でした…
ありがとうございました。また。

#bandmaid #tokie #yoshidaichirountouchableworld
en:
The other day, I’m sharing a memory photo from when I had drinks with TOKIE and Ichiro Yoshida. 

As always, conversation is the best accompaniment to drinks. 

It was a happy moment… Thank you, and see you again! 

#bandmaid #tokie #yoshidaichirountouchableworld

jp:
本日、誕生日を迎えました🎂
沢山のあたたかいお祝いメッセージ、本当にありがとうございます！毎年感動しながら読んでいるよ！

今年の誕生日はMISAのお家でメンバー達がお祝いしてくれました！

私の大好物のご飯やケーキなどをいっぱい準備してくれて、みんなからお花とネックレスをプレゼントしてもらえて。本当に嬉しいなぁ。一生大切にするね！

可愛いクリスマスブーケも25日まで枯らさず大切に飾る⛄️🎄💐

メンバーとゆっくり過ごす誕生日、とても幸せでした☺︎

常に目標と夢をもち続けて
en:
Today, I celebrated my birthday! 🎂 Thank you so much for all the warm birthday messages! I read them every year with so much emotion! 

This year, the members celebrated at MISA's house! 

They prepared a ton of my favorite food and cake, and I received flowers and a necklace from everyone. I'm really so happy! I'll cherish them forever! 

I'll make sure to keep the cute Christmas bouquet fresh and displayed until the 25th! ⛄️🎄💐 

Spending my birthday slowly with the members was such a joy! ☺︎ 

I’ll always keep my goals and dreams alive!

jp:

2024.11.25 ZEPP TOUR 2024
ZEPP HANEDA Day1

ツアファイのDay1🕊
メイドの日にやったZEPP HANEDAに
また帰って来れて、
ご主人様お嬢様でいっぱいのお給仕は
最高に楽しかったっぽ！
1日目終わって、
また明日もお給仕だって思ったら
なんだか嬉しい＆気合いがましたっぽ！

髪色や髪の長さも新しくして挑んだんですが、
さいちゃんに小鳩ではなく子犬と呼ばれて、
　おて　しましたっぽ。

1枚目は幕の内側から
en:
Memory Post 🕊  
2024.11.25 ZEPP TOUR 2024  
ZEPP HANEDA Day 1  

Day 1 of the tour finale 🕊  
It was so much fun to return to ZEPP HANEDA on Maid Day, filled with our Masters and Princesses!  
After finishing the first day, just thinking about doing it all again tomorrow makes me so happy and fired up!  

I tried a new hair color and length for this, but Sai-chan called me a puppy instead of Kobato, and I was totally flustered!  

The first photo is from behind the curtain.

jp:
思い出投稿....🕊♡
2024.11.26
ZEPP TOUR 2024
ZEPP HANEDA day2

会場満員のご主人様お嬢様とすごした
ツアファイ。
今年最後のお給仕でしたっぽ。
とにかく楽しくてあつくて最高な夜でしたっぽ🕊

みんなで沢山叫んで、笑って、うたって、暴れて、、、
BAND-MAID最高！！ってなったっぽ？
なったでしょっぽ？？🕊
ギターソロも頑張りましたっぽ！

来年はもっともーっっとパワーアップして
沢山お給仕で跳びたいと思いますっぽ！
en:
Memory post....🕊♡  
2024.11.26  
ZEPP TOUR 2024  
ZEPP HANEDA day 2  

We spent the tour finale with a full house of Masters and Princesses.  
It felt like the last okyuji of the year.  
It was just an incredibly fun, passionate, and amazing night🕊  

We all shouted, laughed, sang, and went wild together...  
Wasn't it just the best BAND-MAID experience ever?!  
It definitely was, right?!🕊  
I also worked hard on the guitar solo!  

Next year, I want to power up even more and jump around a lot during our okyuji!

jp:
2024.11.3@Zepp Osaka Bayside

はじめましてBayside！
初めての会場はいつもドキドキする〜
だけどみんなの顔見たら安心する！

ケータリングで用意していただいた551を食べ、お給仕中にステージでも食べ、お給仕後にも食べ、自分のお土産として買って帰宅後にも食べ。

1日でこんなに551を食べたのも初めてでした。

好き過ぎてこの日限定3ピースバンド「551」結成。

お初だらけのツアー2本目、楽しすぎたよありがとう！

P.S. たこ焼きもいっぱ
en:
2024.11.3 @ Zepp Osaka Bayside

Nice to meet you, Bayside! 
I always get a little nervous when performing at a new venue, but seeing everyone's faces puts me at ease!

I had 551 prepared for us in catering, ate some on stage during the show, had more after the performance, and even bought some as a souvenir to enjoy at home later.

It was my first time eating so much 551 in one day!

I loved it so much that we formed a limited-time 3-piece band called "551" just for this day.

The second show of our tour, filled with firsts, was so much fun—thank you! 

P.S. I also had a lot of takoyaki!

2024.11.25,26@Zepp Haneda

BAND-MAID ZEPP TOUR 2024
TOUR FINAL東京2days！

最高の2日間をありがとうございました！

4年前中止になってしまったZEPP TOURのリベンジを果たすことが出来て嬉しい。

本当に濃密で楽しいツアーでした。

10周年を経て成長した今の私達だからこそ出来るツアーだったなと実感しています。

2024年はとても濃過ぎる一年でした。
365日中350日はドラム叩いてたはず。

20
en:
2024.11.25,26 @ Zepp Haneda

BAND-MAID ZEPP TOUR 2024
TOUR FINAL Tokyo 2 days!

Thank you for an amazing two days!

I’m so happy we were able to take revenge on the ZEPP TOUR that was canceled four years ago.

It was truly a rich and fun tour.

I really feel that this was a tour we could only do now, having grown after our 10th anniversary.

2024 has been an incredibly intense year.
I must have been drumming for 350 out of the 365 days. 

20

en:
Lately, I've been busy with recording, production, and practicing for next month's spin-off okyuji...!

The photo is from the MC on November 25 and 26, 2024, right after the okyuji 🫡 
A-chan gave me a piggyback ride! 
(I wonder how you say "piggyback" in English~)

In the next photo, I was talking about the KANAMI signature model during the MC, and I ended up tearing up. Oh dear, I'm blowing my nose on stage! 
(@pickles_0808, it's so cute and funny that you captured that moment~ ♡)

In the following photo, I was trying to doodle on Kobato's iPad, but it had the latest specs, and...

#bandmaid

WDBM UNIVERSITY-T
(Cracked Print)
#bandmaid

BM CHAINSTITCH CAP
#bandmaid

美し…

シグネチャーの準備風景が届いたのでUPします。
続々と届いてますか？　

今日はゲネだったよ〜。
アレンジ、REC、ライブ準備しながらなので
ちょっとばかし身体が疲れてたけども！
みんなに会ったらとっても元気が出ました🍺
終わった後は、たまこんにゃくとビールで晩酌を楽しんだ後
カレーを食べました。
明日はアコースティックのアレンジするよ！
billboardも楽しみだね。

まずは8年ぶり？！のリキッドルームー！
楽しもうね〜

音楽ってシアワセ〜

#b
en:
So beautiful...

I received some behind-the-scenes photos of the signature preparations, so I'm sharing them! Are they coming in one after another?

Today was the dress rehearsal~. I was a bit tired from all the arranging, recording, and live preparations! But seeing everyone really boosted my energy 🍺. After it was over, I enjoyed some tamakonnyaku and beer for dinner, followed by curry. 

Tomorrow, I'll be working on the acoustic arrangements! I'm looking forward to the billboard too.

First up, the Liquid Room for the first time in 8 years?! Let’s have fun~ 

Music is happiness~ 

#b

en:
🕊🌏🇯🇵  
2025.2.3🕊🇯🇵  
"BAND-MAID Spin-Off Okyuji"  
produced by SAIKI  
at Ebisu LIQUIDROOM  

It's our first okyuji of 2025!!  
The one-day event produced by SAIKI was packed with surprises, right?  
We laughed a ton, didn't we?  
You can feel the fun from the photos, can't you??  

The photos from the second half were from an unexpected karaoke time before the magic time, featuring cluppo songs! 😂  
(PEACE&LOVE and Flapping wings)  
Really!

Finally releasing tomorrow!
The streaming of "BAND-MAID HALL TOUR 2024 FINAL", held on July 14, 2024, will start on Saturday, March 1, at 1:00 PM(JST)!

https://bandmaid.tokyo/contents/893611

The BAND-MAID me

2025.2.3
"BAND-MAID番外編お給仕"produced by SAIKI

さいちゃんの無茶振りプロデュースの日でちたん

インスト3曲連続もなかなか体力的にキツかったですし

何より「煽りを入れて来い」というお言葉が、、！
(愛しのさいちゃんに言われたら頑張るしか…!!)

バンドマンなのにお恥ずかしながら、煽る事も大きな声を出すの苦手なので、お酒の力に頼りました、、
(最後の写真はお酒に頼った自分に反省してる顔…)

当分みなさんのネタになれば幸いであります🥹
en:
2025.2.3  
"BAND-MAID Spin-Off Okyuji" produced by SAIKI  

Today was the day of Sai-chan's wild production!  

Doing three instrumental songs in a row was quite a physical challenge, and more than anything, the words "Get the crowd hyped!" were...!  
(When my beloved Sai-chan says it, I have no choice but to give it my all…!!)  

Even though I'm a band member, I must admit I'm not great at hyping up the crowd or projecting my voice, so I had to rely on a little liquid courage...  
(The last photo shows my face reflecting on relying on alcohol...)  

I hope this can be a source of entertainment for everyone for a while! 🥹

jp:
2025.2.3&2.17
BAND-MAID番外編お給仕@恵比寿LIQUIDROOM

SAIKIプロデュース番外編、2公演ともサプライズ尽くしで最高に楽しいお給仕始めになりました！

17日の番外編にはなんと！
UNCHAIN谷川正憲さんがスペシャルゲストとして来てくれました！嬉しすぎるーーー
一緒にAwkwardを演奏して、さいちゃんと谷川さんのWonderも聴けて、幸せな時間だった〜

とっても刺激的な番外編ありがとうございました！！

photo by @pickles_0
en:
2025.2.3 & 2.17  
BAND-MAID Spin-Off Okyuji @ Ebisu LIQUIDROOM  

The SAIKI-produced spin-off was filled with surprises for both shows, making for an incredibly fun start to our okyuji!  

And on the 17th, we had a special guest—Masanori Tanigawa from UNCHAIN! I’m so happy!!! We performed "Awkward" together, and got to hear Sai-chan and Tanigawa-san's "Wonder." It was such a blissful time~  

Thank you for an incredibly stimulating spin-off okyuji!!  

Photo by @pickles_0

jp:
cluppoの強火オタ、cluppoのTOの私。

cluppoさんが2月3日の番外編お給仕にサプライズで登場してくれました🕊️

PEACE&LOVEとFlapping wingsが聴けるだなんて…！

手作りのファンサうちわとクルッポTを持参して、最前列で推しを拝ませていただきました。ファンサ貰っちゃった〜

終演後、一緒に写真撮って握手してもらいました。
推しに認知してもらえて嬉しかったです。

ずっと応援してます！大好きです🫶

photo by @pickles_0
en:
I'm a hardcore fan of cluppo and Tōno of cluppo. 

They surprised us by showing up at the Spin-Off okyuji on February 3rd! 🕊️ 

I can't believe I got to hear PEACE&LOVE and Flapping Wings...! 

I brought my handmade fan and my Kuruppo T-shirt, and I got to see my favorite up close in the front row. I even got some fan service! 

After the show, I took a photo and got a handshake. I was so happy to be recognized by my favorite! 

I’ll keep supporting you forever! I love you! 🫶 

Photo by @pickles_0

早押し1位のピリオドチャンピオンを獲得できました！さらに2位、6位も獲得！

en:
【Thank You】  
I had the honor of appearing on #AllStarThankYouFestival25Spring as BAND-MAID's Kobato Miku!  
I managed to secure the top spot in the buzzer round and became the Period Champion! I also took 2nd and 6th place!  
Thank you all for your support!  

Starting in April, the anime "Rock is a Lady's Pastime" will begin airing on the TBS television network.  
#RockLady  
Our latest song "Ready to Rock" will be the opening theme, so be sure to check it out!  
You can check out BAND-MAID's music here: youtube.com/@BANDMAI

jp:
🕊🇯🇵📺
#オールスター感謝祭25春　に
出演いたしましたっぽ🕊

６時間生放送でしたっぽ〜！
4月3日より放送開始の
TVアニメ『ロックは淑女の嗜みでして』の
OPテーマソングをBAND-MAIDが
務めさせていただく為
リリサ役の関根明良様と２人で
出演させていただきましたっぽ🕊
TVの生放送は初めてだったので
とっっても緊張しましたが、
明良様が隣で頑張れましたっぽ♡
なんと！！！
ピリオドチャンピオンにもなりまして！！
(2位と6位にも一回ずつなったっぽ
en:
🕊🇯🇵📺  
We appeared on #AllStarThankYouFestival25 this spring! 🕊  

It was a 6-hour live broadcast!  
We had the honor of performing the OP theme song for the TV anime "Rock is a Lady's Taste," which starts airing on April 3rd, alongside Akira Sekine, who plays the role of Ririsa. 🕊  
It was my first time on live TV, so I was super nervous, but with Akira by my side, I was able to do my best! ♡  
And guess what!!!  
I even became the Period Champion!!!  
(I also placed 2nd and 6th once each!)

en:
[NEWS]  
The TV anime "Rock is a Lady's Taste" will finally begin airing today, April 3rd (Thursday), on the TBS network at 23:56!  
The opening theme song "Ready to Rock" will be released worldwide on April 4th (Friday).  
PreAdd is currently available! We are also running a PreAdd campaign.  
PreAdd: https://BAND-MAID.lnk.to/Ready_to_Rock  
Campaign: https://bandmaid.tokyo/contents/898327  

And more! #ロック

jp:
【アニメ // ロックは淑女の嗜みでして】
⁡
本日4月3日（木）夜11:56より、TBS系28局ネットにて全国同時放送がスタートする新作アニメ『ロックは淑女の嗜みでして』。
⁡
そのオープニングテーマには、昨年シグネチャーモデルをリリースしたPRS ArtistのKANAMIが所属する、BAND-MAIDの新曲「Ready to Rock」が起用されています！
⁡
そして、このアニメに登場するギターは、なんとPRSがモチーフとなって描かれています✨

細部にまでこだわって描かれたギターも
en:
【Anime // Rock is a Lady's Hobby】 

Starting tonight, April 3rd (Thursday) at 11:56 PM, the new anime "Rock is a Lady's Hobby" will begin its nationwide simultaneous broadcast on 28 TBS network stations. 

The opening theme features a new song by BAND-MAID titled "Ready to Rock," performed by KANAMI, who released her signature model with PRS last year! 

And guess what? The guitars that appear in this anime are actually inspired by PRS✨ 

The attention to detail in the depiction of the guitars is just amazing!

jp:
2025.3.20

BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour OSAKA

お盟主様限定お給仕でしたね！
とても距離が近くて、実は緊張しました🥹

アレンジもアンサンブルの練習もみんなで頑張って来たのです！！いかがでしたか、、？
私はとっても楽しかったです！！♡♡
次は4/13 東京公演です！こちらは後日配信もあるので、来れない方も楽しみに待っててくださいね💚

そしてそして本日4月3日（木）夜11:56より
TBS系28局ネットにて新作ア
en:
March 20, 2025

BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour OSAKA

It was an exclusive okyuji for our Masters! The distance felt so close, and to be honest, I was really nervous 🥹

We all worked hard on the arrangements and ensemble practice!! How did you like it...? I had so much fun!! ♡♡ 
Next up is the Tokyo performance on April 13! There will also be a later streaming for those who can't make it, so please look forward to it 💚

And also, today, April 3 (Thursday) at 11:56 PM, a new work will be aired on TBS and 28 other networks!

BAND-MAID、
9mm Parabellum Bulletさん とのスペシャルSession 「MICHINOKU HEAVY ROCK CARNIVAL」に
スペシャルなゲストアーティスト
大槻ケンヂさん(筋肉少女帯/特撮/オケミス)

en:
[Today]
"ARABAKI ROCK FEST.25"

BAND-MAID had a special session with 9mm Parabellum Bullet called "MICHINOKU HEAVY ROCK CARNIVAL," featuring special guest artists Kenji Otsuki (Muscle Girl Band/Tokusatsu/Okemis), Soichi Ohyama (BRADIO), and Takaaki Myoujouji (BRADIO)! 
Thank you all for watching!

BAND-MAID's tour starts on May 10th!

jp:
2025.4.27 ARABAKI ROCK FEST.25 

9mm Parabellum Bullet × BAND-MAID
「MICHINOKU HEAVY ROCK CARNIVAL」

最高の1日すぎて長文になってしもたです🥹♡

ど頭から9mm先輩と一緒に『Protect You』を演奏しちゃいましたよ〜！！
先輩達の音圧がすごくてですね！きゃー！音圧すごいー！圧倒されるううう！でも負けない頑張るうう！と思いながら弾きました！みなさん曲を覚えてくださり感謝感激感動、、
en:
2025.4.27 ARABAKI ROCK FEST.25 

9mm Parabellum Bullet × BAND-MAID
"MICHINOKU HEAVY ROCK CARNIVAL"

It was such an amazing day that I ended up writing a long post 🥹♡

Right from the start, we performed "Protect You" together with the seniors from 9mm! Their sound pressure was incredible! Whoa! The sound pressure was overwhelming! But I thought, I won’t lose, I’ll do my best! While playing, I was so grateful and moved that everyone remembered the song...

jp:
🕊🌏🇯🇵
振り返り投稿...

2025.3.20 & 4.13
BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour 

大阪と東京の2ヶ所にて行った
お盟主様限定お給仕

Billboardでのいつもと違った雰囲気で
とても贅沢な時間をお送りいたしましたっぽ。
緊張したけど、素敵な時間でしたっぽ。
ご帰宅してくださったご主人様お嬢様
ありがとうございましたっぽ。
アコースティックならではのアレンジで
いつもと違った私達の曲を
楽しんでいた
en:
🕊🌏🇯🇵  
Looking back...

2025.3.20 & 4.13  
BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour

We held a special okyuji just for our OMEISYUSAMA at two locations, Osaka and Tokyo.

It was a luxurious time in a different atmosphere than usual at Billboard. I was nervous, but it was a wonderful experience.  
Thank you to all the Masters and Princesses who came home to us!  
We hope you enjoyed our songs with unique arrangements that only an acoustic performance can offer!

jp:
みなさんご機嫌いかがでしょうか？🫶
「Ready to Rock」イントロ弾いてみたチャレンジキャンペーンを開催なのです〜♡

TVアニメ「#ロックは淑女の嗜みでして」のOPテーマ『Ready to Rock』をお聞きいただきありがとうございます!
このギターリフがですね!
とても弾きごたえあるものなのでぜひ挑戦してみていただきたいのです♡
弾いてみたをみてみたいなあ〜〜💚

弾き方のアドバイスとしては、4弦2F人差し指をプリングから始まって4弦の開放弦をたくさん使いますので、
en:
How's everyone doing? 🫶  
We're launching a "Ready to Rock" intro play challenge campaign! ♡

Thank you for listening to the OP theme of the TV anime "#RockIsForLadies" - "Ready to Rock"!  
This guitar riff is super fun to play, so we really want you to give it a try! ♡  
I can't wait to see your performances! 💚

As for some tips on how to play it, start with a pull-off on the 2nd fret of the 4th string using your index finger, and make sure to use the open 4th string a lot!

jp:
TVアニメ「#ロックは淑女の嗜みでして」第五話で登場した「宝島」をわたくしBAND-MAID AKANEが叩いてみましたわ🥁

宝島は、私の青春の思い出が詰まった大好きな曲です！
そんな宝島でドラムソロを叩けてとっても嬉しかったです！！

I, BAND-MAID AKANE, played the drums for “Takarajima” which appeared in episode 5 of the TV anime "Rock Is a Lady's Modesty.”
en: “Takarajima” is a song filled with memories from my youth, and I absolutely love it! I was so happy to be able to play a drum solo for such a cherished song!! 🥁 #ロックは淑女の嗜みでして #BANDMAID

jp:
TVアニメ「#ロックは淑女の嗜みでして」
第五話で登場した「宝島」を
わたくしBAND-MAID KANAMIを弾いてみましたの!

宝島をロックに演奏してしまう、第五話のりりさちゃん音羽ちゃんも可愛いかっこよかった〜🥹🫶💚

モーションキャプチャーでは私たちについてきなさーい！と弾いてるイメージで撮影しましたよ♡

来週も楽しみです♡♡

#弾いてみた #bandmaid #ロックレディ #rocklady  #guitar
en:
I played "Treasure Island," which appeared in the fifth episode of the TV anime "#RockIsALady'sTaste"! 

Ririsa-chan and Otowa-chan were so cute and cool rocking out to "Treasure Island" in the fifth episode! 🥹🫶💚 

During the motion capture, we filmed with the image of saying "Follow along with us!" while playing! ♡ 

I’m looking forward to next week too! ♡♡

#IPlayedIt #bandmaid #RockLady #guitar

jp:
2025.3.20&4.13
"BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour"

お盟主様限定TOUR
大阪と東京の2公演、ありがとうございました！

初のBillboardでのアコースティックお給仕
ずっと出演したかった場所なので本当に嬉しかったです！

ドレスコードのあるお給仕は新鮮だったね
お盟主様、とっても素敵でした！

5人で演奏する曲も増えてアレンジの幅が広がり、楽しみながら成長する事ができました。

またBillboardでお給仕や
en:
2025.3.20 & 4.13  
"BAND-MAID Billboard Live Acoustic Tour"

Exclusive TOUR for our OMEISYUSAMA  
Thank you for the two shows in Osaka and Tokyo!

It was our first acoustic okyuji at Billboard, a place we've always wanted to perform, so I was truly happy!

The dress code for the okyuji was refreshing. Our OMEISYUSAMA looked absolutely wonderful!

With more songs performed by all five of us, we were able to expand our arrangements and grow while having fun.

I hope we can do okyuji at Billboard again!

2025.4.27
"ARABAKI ROCK FEST.25"

9mm Parabellum Bullet × BAND-MAID 
MICHINOKU HEAVY ROCK CARNIVAL

9mm先輩とのスペシャルSession 最高でした！感激！

スペシャルゲストに 大槻ケンヂさん(筋肉少女帯/特撮/オケミス)、大山聡一さん＆真行寺貴秋さん(BRADIO)という豪華すぎるメンバー！

コラボ曲では、9mm先輩と一緒に「Protect You」、BRADIOのお二方と「Go
en:
2025.4.27  
"ARABAKI ROCK FEST.25"

9mm Parabellum Bullet × BAND-MAID  
MICHINOKU HEAVY ROCK CARNIVAL

The special session with 9mm Senpai was amazing! I'm so moved! 

We had the incredible honor of having special guests Kenji Otsuki (Muscle Girl Band/Tokusatsu/Okemis), Sōichi Ōyama, and Takaaki Myōgōji (BRADIO)! 

For our collaboration songs, we performed "Protect You" with 9mm Senpai and "Go" with the two members from BRADIO! 🎸✨

みんなのおかげで最高のスタートきれました！
今年もたくさんお給仕しに行くからね〜

12月のツアーファイナルまで全力で駆け抜けるので遊びに来てねっ！

お給仕でお待ちしてます！
en:
Thank you for an amazing first day of the "BAND-MAID TOUR 2025" and Maid Day! 

Thanks to everyone, we had the best start! We’ll be serving you a lot this year too~ 

We’ll be giving it our all until the tour finale in December, so come and hang out with us! 

We’ll be waiting for you at our okyuji!

jp:
🇯🇵BAND-MAID TOUR 2025🕊️
2025.5.17 HIROSHIMA	CLUB QUATTRO 　
2025.5.18 OKAYAMA	CRAZYMAMA KINGDOM

久々の全国ツアー。
やっぱり地方もいいですっぽねぇ！
あついあついあつさで爆発するかと思ったっぽ。
でもこれがライブハウスだなぁって
とても最高でしたっぽ。
両日共にSold Out感謝っぽ！
ツアーはまだまだ続きますっぽ！
チケットもまだ発売中なので
ぜひ皆様お給仕を体感しにきてっぽ！
en:
🇯🇵BAND-MAID TOUR 2025🕊️  
2025.5.17 HIROSHIMA CLUB QUATTRO  
2025.5.18 OKAYAMA CRAZYMAMA KINGDOM  

It’s been a while since our nationwide tour.  
Local shows are just the best, aren’t they?!  
I thought I might explode from the intense heat!  
But that’s what live houses are all about,  
and it was absolutely amazing!  
Thank you for the sold-out shows on both days!  
The tour is still going strong!  
Tickets are still on sale, so please come and experience our okyuji!

jp:
TVアニメ「ロックは淑女の嗜みでして」
OP主題歌と、黒鉄音羽のモーションアクターを担当させていただきました！

音羽と共に過ごした日々は宝物です。

OP、劇中曲レコーディング、モーションアクター、夢のような経験をさせてもらえて幸せです。

ずっとやってみたかったモーションアクター。
BAND-MAIDメンバーと一緒に挑戦して演奏出来た事がとても嬉しかったです。心強かった。

初めての撮影時、どうやって音羽を表現するか悩んでいた時に「あかねさんがもうすでに音羽だからそのままで大丈夫！
en:
I had the honor of being the OP theme song artist and motion actor for the TV anime "Rock wa Shukujo no Tashimi de Shite." 

The days I spent with Otowa are treasures to me. 

I'm so happy to have had the dream-like experience of recording the OP and in-show songs, as well as being a motion actor. 

Being a motion actor has always been something I wanted to try. I was thrilled to take on this challenge and perform alongside the BAND-MAID members. It gave me a lot of strength. 

During my first filming, I was struggling with how to express Otowa, and someone said, "Akane-san, you're already Otowa, so just be yourself!"

jp:
2025.6.20,21@GORILLA HALL
大阪2daysありがとうございました！

初のGORILLA HALL嬉しかったです！
2日間楽しすぎたよーーー！！

会場にいるゴリラ様の手の上に座らせてもらいゴリラパワーをもらいました🦍🔥
ゴリラ亭も最高！

たこ焼きと551も最高！

みんな最高！！

また大阪行くからねー！
10月24日なんばHatchで会いましょう！

P.S.最後のチェキの文字はMISAが書いてくれたよ♡可愛いね♡

Photo by
en:
Thank you for the two days at GORILLA HALL in Osaka on June 20-21, 2025! 

I was so happy to perform at GORILLA HALL for the first time! It was so much fun over those two days—woohoo!!

I got to sit on the hands of the gorillas in the venue and received some gorilla power 🦍🔥. The gorilla-themed café was amazing too!

The takoyaki and 551 were the best!

Everyone was awesome!!

I’ll be back in Osaka, so let’s meet again on October 24 at Namba Hatch!

P.S. The message on the last cheki was written by MISA! Isn’t it cute? ♡

Photo by

2025.6.28@SENDAI GIGS
仙台ありがとうございました！

大好きなGIGSにてFirst Round終了！
みんなのおかげでFirst Round全公演SOLD OUTという最高に嬉しい楽しいツアーだ！

みんなからの温かいメッセージボード、とっても嬉しかったです！愛をたっぷり受け取りました！！

明日7月12日からSecond Roundがスタート！

Second Roundのセトリもビックリするよ？
全力で楽しもうね！

豊洲PITでお待ちしてます！
en:
Thank you, Sendai! 

The First Round has come to an end at my beloved GIGS! Thanks to everyone, all performances of the First Round were SOLD OUT, making this the most joyful and fun tour ever!

I was so happy to receive the warm message boards from everyone! I felt all the love!!

The Second Round kicks off tomorrow, July 12th!

Are you ready for some surprises in the Second Round setlist? Let’s have an amazing time together!

We’ll be waiting for you at Toyosu PIT!

en:
Reflecting back on memories 🕊️  
🇯🇵 BAND-MAID TOUR 2025 🕊️  
2025 6.20 & 6.21 OSAKA GORILLA HALL  
2025 6.28 SENDAI GIGS  

The Final Round is completely sold out! So happy! 🕊️  
We were able to return to GIGS at GORILLA HALL for the first time with a sold-out show.  
Thanks to everyone for coming back home!!!  
Thank you for an amazing night!  

The Second Round started yesterday!  
We'll keep pushing forward from here!!!!

en:
Here's a sneak peek of our rehearsal at Toyosu PIT! 🫣  
The sound check is mostly for "Unleash!!!!!"!

So, what day is it today~?

It's the release day of the anime #Tōgenankai ending theme song,  
BAND-MAID's new digital single "What is justice?!"  
Finally, finally! It's out! The MV has also been released!!  
Be sure to check it out on YouTube!  
We expressed a battle vibe with the guitar riffs, and it turned into an incredibly high-energy song in every sense! ♡

Let's deliver it to the whole world~~

jp:
"BAND-MAID TOUR 2025"
First Round 2025.05.10 LINE CUBE  SHIBUYA

月日が流れるのは早いもので…
いつの間にかもう8月も中旬ですね。

Second Roundが終わり、急いで制作へ…
あとでやろう、いや来週やろう、いや来月やろう…と後回しにしまくっていたボーカルトラックを急いで作って
ボーカル二人に共有しました。
本当に遅くなってごめんなさい、、
でも二人なら大丈夫…!!!(コラ)

まだまだ暑い日が続きますので、お身
en:
"BAND-MAID TOUR 2025"  
First Round 2025.05.10 LINE CUBE SHIBUYA  

Time flies, doesn’t it?  
Before we know it, it’s already mid-August.  

With the Second Round wrapped up, I rushed into production…  
I kept putting off the vocal tracks, saying I’d do it later, or next week, or next month… but I finally hurried to create them and shared them with the two vocalists.  
I’m really sorry for the delay…  
But with the two of them, I’m sure it’ll be fine!!! (Just kidding)  

The hot days are still continuing, so please take care of yourselves!

Second Round終了！

Second Roundも全公演SOLD OUT
嬉しすぎる！みんな本当にありがとう！！

"BAND-MAID TOUR 2025"  
2025.8.8-9 @ Nagoya DIAMOND HALL  

The Second Round has ended!  
Thank you so much for the two days in Nagoya!  

All shows in the Second Round were SOLD OUT!  
I'm so happy! Thank you all so much!!  

I was completely overwhelmed by the amazing cheers over these two days.  
I soaked up everyone's energy with my whole body!  

Now we only have 3 shows left in the Final Round.  
Don't miss it!!!  

Preparations for the Final Round and the EP production are progressing smoothly!
